GE09ram_02pu:0: kasyacit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam /
GE09ram_02pu:3: tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava // Ram_2,1.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:7: mātṝṃś cāpi naraśreṣṭhaḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // Ram_2,1.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:9: svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha // Ram_2,1.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:10: sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:12: tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:13: bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // Ram_2,1.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:14: rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau /
GE09ram_02pu:16: sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:17: svaśarīrād vinirvṛttāś catvāra iva bāhavaḥ // Ram_2,1.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:18: teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:19: svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ // Ram_2,1.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:20: gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:23: cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // Ram_2,1.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:26: evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:28: sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate /
GE09ram_02pu:31: na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā // Ram_2,1.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:33: kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api // Ram_2,1.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:35: vṛddhair abhivinītaś ca dvijair dharmārthadarśibhiḥ // Ram_2,1.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:41: śraiṣṭhyaṃ śāstrasamūheṣu prāpto vyāmiśrakeṣv api // Ram_2,1.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:42: arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:47: apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ // Ram_2,1.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:48: anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī /
GE09ram_02pu:49: na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ // Ram_2,1.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:50: evaṃ śreṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:52: buddhyā bṛhaspates tulyo vīryeṇāpi śacīpateḥ // Ram_2,1.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:54: guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // Ram_2,1.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:57: etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam /
GE09ram_02pu:58: dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_2,1.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:59: eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi samparivartate /
GE09ram_02pu:60: kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam // Ram_2,1.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:62: mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // Ram_2,1.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:64: mahīdharasamo dhṛtyāṃ mattaś ca guṇavattaraḥ // Ram_2,1.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:65: mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam /
GE09ram_02pu:66: anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām // Ram_2,1.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:67: taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:68: niścitya sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ yuvarājam amanyata // Ram_2,1.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:72: rājānam evābhimukhā niṣedur niyatā nṛpāḥ // Ram_2,1.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:73: sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ purālayair jānapadaiś ca mānavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:74: upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:76: hitam uddharṣaṇaṃ cedam uvācāpratimaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,2.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:78: svareṇa mahatā rājā jīmūta iva nādayan // Ram_2,2.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:80: śreyasā yoktukāmo 'smi sukhārham akhilaṃ jagat // Ram_2,2.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:82: prajā nityam atandreṇa yathāśakty abhirakṣatā // Ram_2,2.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:83: idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam /
GE09ram_02pu:84: pāṇḍur asyātapatrasya chāyāyāṃ jaritaṃ mayā // Ram_2,2.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:88: pariśrānto 'smi lokasya gurvīṃ dharmadhuraṃ vahan // Ram_2,2.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:89: so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite /
GE09ram_02pu:90: saṃnikṛṣṭān imān sarvān anumānya dvijarṣabhān // Ram_2,2.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:91: anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:93: taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam /
GE09ram_02pu:95: anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:96: trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram // Ram_2,2.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:97: anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm /
GE09ram_02pu:98: gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai // Ram_2,2.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:99: iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam /
GE09ram_02pu:100: vṛṣṭimantaṃ mahāmeghaṃ nardantam iva barhiṇaḥ // Ram_2,2.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:102: ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // Ram_2,2.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:104: sa rāmaṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣiñcasva pārthivam // Ram_2,2.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:105: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam /
GE09ram_02pu:106: ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,2.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:107: kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati /
GE09ram_02pu:108: bhavanto draṣṭum icchanti yuvarājaṃ mamātmajam // Ram_2,2.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:109: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02pu:110: bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te // Ram_2,2.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:112: ikṣvākubhyo hi sarvebhyo 'py atirakto viśāmpate // Ram_2,2.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:114: dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca śīlavān anasūyakaḥ // Ram_2,2.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:116: mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ // Ram_2,2.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:117: priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:119: tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate /
GE09ram_02pu:121: yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā /
GE09ram_02pu:123: saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā /
GE09ram_02pu:124: paurān svajanavan nityaṃ kuśalaṃ paripṛcchati // Ram_2,2.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:126: nikhilenānupūrvyā ca pitā putrān ivaurasān // Ram_2,2.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:127: śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:128: iti naḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ sadā rāmo 'bhibhāṣate // Ram_2,2.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:130: utsaveṣu ca sarveṣu piteva parituṣyati // Ram_2,2.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:132: vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:133: diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ // Ram_2,2.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:134: balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:135: āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā // Ram_2,2.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:136: abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:137: striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyamprātaḥ samāhitāḥ // Ram_2,2.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:139: teṣām āyācitaṃ deva tvatprasādāt samṛdhyatām // Ram_2,2.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:142: taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam /
GE09ram_02pu:143: hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam arhasi //
GE09ram_02pu:145: pratigṛhyābravīd rājā tebhyaḥ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,3.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:147: yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha // Ram_2,3.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:148: iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:149: vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca teṣām evopaśṛṇvatām // Ram_2,3.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:150: caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:152: kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim /
GE09ram_02pu:154: tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:155: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīyatām iti // Ram_2,3.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:157: rāmaṃ tatrānayāṃcakre rathena rathināṃ varam // Ram_2,3.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:158: atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02pu:159: prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ // Ram_2,3.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:160: mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:161: upāsāṃcakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam // Ram_2,3.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:162: teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:169: na tatarpa samāyāntaṃ paśyamāno narādhipaḥ // Ram_2,3.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:171: pituḥ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt // Ram_2,3.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:173: āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,3.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:174: sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike /
GE09ram_02pu:175: nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ // Ram_2,3.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:176: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:177: gṛhyāñjalau samākṛṣya sasvaje priyam ātmajam // Ram_2,3.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:179: dideśa rājā ruciraṃ rāmāya paramāsanam // Ram_2,3.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:181: svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ // Ram_2,3.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:184: taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam /
GE09ram_02pu:186: sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:187: uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ // Ram_2,3.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:188: jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:189: utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ // Ram_2,3.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:190: tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:191: tasmāt tvaṃ puṣyayogena yauvarājyam avāpnuhi // Ram_2,3.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:192: kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi /
GE09ram_02pu:193: guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam // Ram_2,3.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:194: bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:200: tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara // Ram_2,3.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:201: tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:202: tvaritāḥ śīghram abhyetya kausalyāyai nyavedayan // Ram_2,3.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:203: sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:206: yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ // Ram_2,3.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:207: te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tac chrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya /
GE09ram_02pu:208: narendram āmantrya gṛhāṇi gatvā devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:209: gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:210: mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam // Ram_2,4.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:211: śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyas tu me sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:212: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo yauvarājya iti prabhuḥ // Ram_2,4.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:214: sūtam ājñāpayāmāsa rāmaṃ punar ihānaya // Ram_2,4.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:215: pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau /
GE09ram_02pu:216: rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,4.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:218: śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat // Ram_2,4.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:219: praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:220: yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,4.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:221: tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02pu:222: śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā // Ram_2,4.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:224: prayayau rājabhavanaṃ punar draṣṭuṃ nareśvaram // Ram_2,4.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:225: taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:226: praveśayāmāsa gṛhaṃ vivikṣuḥ priyam uttamam // Ram_2,4.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:227: praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:228: dadarśa pitaraṃ dūrāt praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ // Ram_2,4.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:230: pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt // Ram_2,4.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:231: rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:233: jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02pu:234: dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama // Ram_2,4.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:235: anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:238: ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_2,4.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:239: adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam /
GE09ram_02pu:240: atas tvāṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣekṣyāmi putraka // Ram_2,4.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:241: api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān /
GE09ram_02pu:242: sanirghātā maholkāś ca patantīha mahāsvanāḥ // Ram_2,4.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:243: avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:246: rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati // Ram_2,4.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:247: tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:248: tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ // Ram_2,4.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:249: adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum /
GE09ram_02pu:250: śvaḥ puṣyayogaṃ niyataṃ vakṣyante daivacintakāḥ // Ram_2,4.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:252: śvas tvāham abhiṣekṣyāmi yauvarājye paraṃtapa // Ram_2,4.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:255: suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:256: bhavanti bahuvighnāni kāryāṇy evaṃvidhāni hi // Ram_2,4.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:257: viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:258: tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama // Ram_2,4.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:259: kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:261: kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:262: satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava // Ram_2,4.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:264: vrajeti rāmaḥ pitaram abhivādyābhyayād gṛham // Ram_2,4.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:266: tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau // Ram_2,4.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:267: tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm /
GE09ram_02pu:268: vāgyatāṃ devatāgāre dadarśa yācatīṃ śriyam // Ram_2,4.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:269: prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:270: sītā cānāyitā śrutvā priyaṃ rāmābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,4.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:271: tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā /
GE09ram_02pu:276: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā // Ram_2,4.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:278: bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ // Ram_2,4.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:280: evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā // Ram_2,4.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:281: yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane /
GE09ram_02pu:282: tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya // Ram_2,4.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:284: harṣabāṣpakalaṃ vākyam idaṃ rāmam abhāṣata // Ram_2,4.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:285: vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:286: jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya // Ram_2,4.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:287: kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka /
GE09ram_02pu:288: yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā // Ram_2,4.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:289: amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe /
GE09ram_02pu:290: yeyam ikṣvākurājyaśrīḥ putra tvāṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // Ram_2,4.41 //
GE09ram_02pu:291: ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhrātaram abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:292: prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva // Ram_2,4.42 //
GE09ram_02pu:293: lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02pu:294: dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā // Ram_2,4.43 //
GE09ram_02pu:295: saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:296: jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye // Ram_2,4.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:297: ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:298: abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // Ram_2,4.45 //
GE09ram_02pu:300: purohitaṃ samāhūya vasiṣṭham idam abravīt // Ram_2,5.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:303: tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:304: svayaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān yayau rāmaniveśanam // Ram_2,5.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:306: tisraḥ kakṣyā rathenaiva viveśa munisattamaḥ // Ram_2,5.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:307: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:308: mānayiṣyan sa mānārhaṃ niścakrāma niveśanāt // Ram_2,5.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:311: sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambhāṣyābhiprasādya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:312: priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ // Ram_2,5.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:313: prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi /
GE09ram_02pu:314: upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā // Ram_2,5.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:315: prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:316: pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā // Ram_2,5.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:317: ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam /
GE09ram_02pu:318: mantravat kārayāmāsa vaidehyā sahitaṃ muniḥ // Ram_2,5.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:319: tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:321: suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:322: sabhājito viveśātha tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,5.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:326: nirgatya dadṛśe mārgaṃ vasiṣṭho janasaṃvṛtam // Ram_2,5.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:334: rāmābhiṣekam ākāṅkṣann ākāṅkṣann udayaṃ raveḥ // Ram_2,5.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:336: utsuko 'bhūj jano draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyāmahotsavam // Ram_2,5.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:338: vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rājakulaṃ yayau // Ram_2,5.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:341: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:342: papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat // Ram_2,5.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:343: guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam /
GE09ram_02pu:344: viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājā siṃho giriguhām iva // Ram_2,5.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:346: vidīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:348: saha patnyā viśālākṣyā nārāyaṇam upāgamat // Ram_2,6.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:349: pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:351: śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam /
GE09ram_02pu:352: dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ svāstīrṇe kuśasaṃstare // Ram_2,6.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:354: śrīmaty āyatane viṣṇoḥ śiśye naravarātmajaḥ // Ram_2,6.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:358: pūrvāṃ saṃdhyām upāsīno jajāpa yatamānasaḥ // Ram_2,6.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:363: kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:364: ayodhyānilayaḥ śrutvā sarvaḥ pramudito janaḥ // Ram_2,6.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:366: prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,6.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:368: catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu caityeṣv aṭṭālakeṣu ca // Ram_2,6.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:370: kuṭumbināṃ samṛddheṣu śrīmatsu bhavaneṣu ca // Ram_2,6.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:371: sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca /
GE09ram_02pu:372: dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā // Ram_2,6.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:374: manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ // Ram_2,6.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:375: rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:376: rāmābhiṣeke samprāpte catvareṣu gṛheṣu ca // Ram_2,6.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:378: rāmābhiṣekasaṃyuktāś cakrur eva mithaḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,6.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:380: rājamārgaḥ kṛtaḥ śrīmān paurai rāmābhiṣecane // Ram_2,6.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:382: dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,6.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:385: sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca /
GE09ram_02pu:386: kathayanto mithas tatra praśaśaṃsur janādhipam // Ram_2,6.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:388: jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,6.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:389: sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:392: yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,6.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:396: digbhyo 'pi śrutavṛttāntāḥ prāptā jānapadā janāḥ // Ram_2,6.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:397: te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam /
GE09ram_02pu:398: rāmasya pūrayāmāsuḥ purīṃ jānapadā janāḥ // Ram_2,6.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:399: janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:401: tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:402: samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam //
GE09ram_02pu:403: jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā /
GE09ram_02pu:406: ayodhyāṃ mantharā tasmāt prāsādād anvavaikṣata // Ram_2,7.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:408: siktāṃ candanatoyaiś ca śiraḥsnātajanair vṛtām // Ram_2,7.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:409: avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā /
GE09ram_02pu:411: rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ samprayacchati /
GE09ram_02pu:412: atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me /
GE09ram_02pu:413: kārayiṣyati kiṃ vāpi samprahṛṣṭo mahīpatiḥ // Ram_2,7.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:415: ācacakṣe 'tha kubjāyai bhūyasīṃ rāghave śriyam // Ram_2,7.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:418: dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā /
GE09ram_02pu:421: śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,7.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:422: uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate /
GE09ram_02pu:423: upaplutamahaughena kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase // Ram_2,7.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:425: calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyāḥ srota ivoṣṇage // Ram_2,7.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:426: evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:427: kubjayā pāpadarśinyā viṣādam agamat param // Ram_2,7.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:428: kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare /
GE09ram_02pu:429: viṣaṇṇavadanāṃ hi tvāṃ lakṣaye bhṛśaduḥkhitām // Ram_2,7.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:430: mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram /
GE09ram_02pu:432: sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02pu:433: viṣādayantī provāca bhedayantī ca rāghavam // Ram_2,7.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:438: tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet /
GE09ram_02pu:439: tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,7.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:441: ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase // Ram_2,7.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:442: dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:443: śuddhabhāve na jānīṣe tenaivam atisaṃdhitā // Ram_2,7.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:445: arthenaivādya te bhartā kausalyāṃ yojayiṣyati // Ram_2,7.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:446: apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu /
GE09ram_02pu:447: kālyaṃ sthāpayitā rāmaṃ rājye nihatakaṇṭake // Ram_2,7.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:449: āśīviṣa ivāṅkena bāle paridhṛtas tvayā // Ram_2,7.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:450: yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:451: rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā // Ram_2,7.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:453: rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi // Ram_2,7.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:454: sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02pu:455: trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane // Ram_2,7.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:456: mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā /
GE09ram_02pu:457: evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham // Ram_2,7.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:458: dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā /
GE09ram_02pu:459: kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam // Ram_2,7.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:460: idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02pu:461: etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te // Ram_2,7.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:462: rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye /
GE09ram_02pu:463: tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,7.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:464: na me paraṃ kiṃcid itas tvayā punaḥ priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ vaco varam /
GE09ram_02pu:465: tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ vṛṇu //
GE09ram_02pu:466: mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat /
GE09ram_02pu:468: harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe /
GE09ram_02pu:471: yauvarājyena mahatā śvaḥ puṣyeṇa dvijottamaiḥ // Ram_2,8.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:472: prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam /
GE09ram_02pu:473: upasthāsyasi kausalyāṃ dāsīva tvaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // Ram_2,8.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:474: hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:475: aprahṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti snuṣās te bharatakṣaye // Ram_2,8.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:476: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:477: rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha // Ram_2,8.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:478: dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:479: rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati // Ram_2,8.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:480: bhrātṝn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:481: saṃtapyase kathaṃ kubje śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,8.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:482: bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param /
GE09ram_02pu:484: sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare /
GE09ram_02pu:486: kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām // Ram_2,8.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:488: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,8.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:491: bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:492: rājavaṃśāt tu bharataḥ kaikeyi parihāsyate // Ram_2,8.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:493: na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini /
GE09ram_02pu:494: sthāpyamāneṣu sarveṣu sumahān anayo bhavet // Ram_2,8.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:495: tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:496: sthāpayanty anavadyāṅgi guṇavatsv itareṣv api // Ram_2,8.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:498: anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale // Ram_2,8.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:499: sāhaṃ tvadarthe samprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase /
GE09ram_02pu:500: sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi // Ram_2,8.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:501: dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02pu:502: deśāntaraṃ nāyayitvā lokāntaram athāpi vā // Ram_2,8.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:503: bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:504: saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api // Ram_2,8.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:505: goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:506: aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam // Ram_2,8.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:507: tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃcit kariṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:508: rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,8.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:509: tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:510: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava // Ram_2,8.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:511: evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:512: yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati // Ram_2,8.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:513: sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:514: samṛddhārthasya naṣṭārtho jīviṣyati kathaṃ vaśe // Ram_2,8.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:516: pracchādyamānaṃ rāmeṇa bharataṃ trātum arhasi // Ram_2,8.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:518: rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet // Ram_2,8.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:519: yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:520: ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje parasya cādyaiva vivāsakāraṇam //
GE09ram_02pu:521: evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā /
GE09ram_02pu:522: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:523: adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham /
GE09ram_02pu:525: idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare /
GE09ram_02pu:526: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // Ram_2,9.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:527: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī /
GE09ram_02pu:528: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:529: hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me /
GE09ram_02pu:530: yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam // Ram_2,9.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:531: śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī /
GE09ram_02pu:532: kiṃcid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:534: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // Ram_2,9.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:535: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī /
GE09ram_02pu:536: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kubjā vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,9.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:537: tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:538: agacchat tvām upādāya devarājasya sāhyakṛt // Ram_2,9.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:539: diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati /
GE09ram_02pu:540: vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ // Ram_2,9.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:541: sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:542: dadau śakrasya saṃgrāmaṃ devasaṃghair anirjitaḥ // Ram_2,9.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:543: tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:544: apavāhya tvayā devi saṃgrāmān naṣṭacetanaḥ // Ram_2,9.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:545: tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:546: tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane // Ram_2,9.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:547: sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau /
GE09ram_02pu:548: gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02pu:549: anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā // Ram_2,9.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:551: pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa // Ram_2,9.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:554: mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ // Ram_2,9.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:555: dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:556: tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam // Ram_2,9.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:557: na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum /
GE09ram_02pu:558: tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet // Ram_2,9.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:559: na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:562: dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // Ram_2,9.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:563: yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt /
GE09ram_02pu:564: tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet // Ram_2,9.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:565: yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:566: vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam // Ram_2,9.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:567: rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca /
GE09ram_02pu:568: bharataḥ kriyatāṃ rājā pṛthivyāṃ pārthivarṣabhaḥ // Ram_2,9.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:570: bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,9.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:571: yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:572: tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:573: saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca suhṛdbhiḥ sārdham ātmavān // Ram_2,9.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:574: prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā /
GE09ram_02pu:576: anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā /
GE09ram_02pu:577: hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:579: pṛthivyām asi kubjānām uttamā buddhiniścaye // Ram_2,9.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:580: tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02pu:581: nāhaṃ samavabudhyeyaṃ kubje rājñaś cikīrṣitam // Ram_2,9.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:583: tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā // Ram_2,9.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:584: uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam /
GE09ram_02pu:585: adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam // Ram_2,9.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:587: jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau // Ram_2,9.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:589: agrato mama gacchantī rājahaṃsīva rājase // Ram_2,9.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:590: tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam /
GE09ram_02pu:591: matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te // Ram_2,9.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:592: atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm /
GE09ram_02pu:593: abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate // Ram_2,9.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:595: labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu // Ram_2,9.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:596: mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02pu:597: kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // Ram_2,9.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:600: gamiṣyasi gatiṃ mukhyāṃ garvayantī dviṣajjanam // Ram_2,9.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:602: pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama // Ram_2,9.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:603: iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:604: śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva // Ram_2,9.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:606: uttiṣṭha kuru kalyāṇaṃ rājānam anudarśaya // Ram_2,9.41 //
GE09ram_02pu:607: tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha /
GE09ram_02pu:610: avamucya varārhāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // Ram_2,9.43 //
GE09ram_02pu:611: tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyavaśaṃ gatā /
GE09ram_02pu:612: saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:613: iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi /
GE09ram_02pu:614: vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim // Ram_2,9.45 //
GE09ram_02pu:615: athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī /
GE09ram_02pu:616: asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ tadādhiśiśye patiteva kiṃnarī // Ram_2,9.46
GE09ram_02pu:618: narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā //
GE09ram_02pu:620: priyārhāṃ priyam ākhyātuṃ viveśāntaḥpuraṃ vaśī // Ram_2,10.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:621: tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām /
GE09ram_02pu:622: pratapta iva duḥkhena so 'paśyaj jagatīpatiḥ // Ram_2,10.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:623: sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm /
GE09ram_02pu:625: kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane /
GE09ram_02pu:626: mahāgaja ivāraṇye snehāt parimamarśa tām // Ram_2,10.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:628: kāmī kamalapattrākṣīm uvāca vanitām idam // Ram_2,10.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:629: na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam /
GE09ram_02pu:630: devi kenābhiyuktāsi kena vāsi vimānitā // Ram_2,10.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:631: yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu /
GE09ram_02pu:632: bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇacetasi /
GE09ram_02pu:634: santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:635: sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini // Ram_2,10.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:636: kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:637: kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam // Ram_2,10.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:638: avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām /
GE09ram_02pu:639: daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiñcanaḥ // Ram_2,10.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:640: ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:641: na te kaṃcid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe // Ram_2,10.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:643: yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā // Ram_2,10.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:644: tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam /
GE09ram_02pu:646: nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kenacin na vimānitā /
GE09ram_02pu:647: abhiprāyas tu me kaścit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam // Ram_2,10.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:648: pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi /
GE09ram_02pu:649: atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā // Ram_2,10.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:650: evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:651: tām uvāca mahātejāḥ kaikeyīm īṣadutsmitaḥ // Ram_2,10.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:652: avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama /
GE09ram_02pu:653: manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate // Ram_2,10.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:654: bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśyoddharasva me /
GE09ram_02pu:655: etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase // Ram_2,10.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:656: balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:657: kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape // Ram_2,10.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:658: tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:660: yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:661: tac chṛṇvantu trayastriṃśad devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ // Ram_2,10.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:662: candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:663: jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā // Ram_2,10.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:665: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava // Ram_2,10.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:667: varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ // Ram_2,10.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:669: tataḥ param uvācedaṃ varadaṃ kāmamohitam // Ram_2,10.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:670: varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate /
GE09ram_02pu:671: tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ // Ram_2,10.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:674: nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:677: adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane // Ram_2,10.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:678: tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:679: vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ // Ram_2,10.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:681: aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:683: cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:684: kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā // Ram_2,10.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:686: kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā // Ram_2,10.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:687: sadā te jananītulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:688: tasyaiva tvam anarthāya kiṃnimittam ihodyatā // Ram_2,10.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:690: avijñānān nṛpasutā vyālī tīkṣṇaviṣā yathā // Ram_2,10.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:692: aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam // Ram_2,10.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:693: kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam /
GE09ram_02pu:694: jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam // Ram_2,10.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:695: parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam /
GE09ram_02pu:696: apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā // Ram_2,10.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:697: tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā /
GE09ram_02pu:698: na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam // Ram_2,10.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:699: tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye /
GE09ram_02pu:700: api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me // Ram_2,10.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:701: sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat striyā gṛhīto hṛdaye 'timātrayā /
GE09ram_02pu:702: papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas tathā //
GE09ram_02pu:704: yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam // Ram_2,11.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:706: punar ākārayāmāsa tam eva varam aṅganā // Ram_2,11.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:708: mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi // Ram_2,11.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:709: evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:710: pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva // Ram_2,11.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:711: mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave /
GE09ram_02pu:712: hantānārye mamāmitre rāmaḥ pravrājito vanam // Ram_2,11.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:713: yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:714: akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me // Ram_2,11.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:716: astam abhyagamat sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // Ram_2,11.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:718: rājño vilapamānasya na vyabhāsata śarvarī // Ram_2,11.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:722: atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām /
GE09ram_02pu:723: nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yat kṛte vyasanaṃ mahat // Ram_2,11.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:724: evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:725: prasādayāmāsa punaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,11.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:727: prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,11.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:729: kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi // Ram_2,11.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:731: śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam //
GE09ram_02pu:732: tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm /
GE09ram_02pu:733: samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta duḥkhitaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:735: viveṣṭamānam udīkṣya saikṣvākam idam abravīt // Ram_2,12.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:736: pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam /
GE09ram_02pu:737: śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_2,12.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:738: āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:739: satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ // Ram_2,12.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:740: saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:741: pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām // Ram_2,12.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:742: tathā hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage /
GE09ram_02pu:743: yācamāne svake netre uddhṛtyāvimanā dadau // Ram_2,12.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:744: saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:745: satyānurodhāt samaye velāṃ svāṃ nātivartate // Ram_2,12.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:746: samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi /
GE09ram_02pu:747: agratas te parityaktā parityakṣyāmi jīvitam // Ram_2,12.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:749: nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā // Ram_2,12.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:751: sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā // Ram_2,12.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:752: vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:753: kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,12.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:754: yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:755: taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā // Ram_2,12.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:757: uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ vākyajñā roṣamūrchitā // Ram_2,12.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:758: kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam /
GE09ram_02pu:759: ānāyayitum akliṣṭaṃ putraṃ rāmam ihārhasi // Ram_2,12.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:760: sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram /
GE09ram_02pu:761: niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi // Ram_2,12.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:762: sa nunna iva tīkṣṇeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:763: rājā pracodito 'bhīkṣṇaṃ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,12.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:764: dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā /
GE09ram_02pu:765: jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam // Ram_2,12.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:766: iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram /
GE09ram_02pu:767: svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya // Ram_2,12.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:768: tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02pu:770: sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02pu:771: pragṛhītāñjaliḥ kiṃcit tasmād deśād apākraman // Ram_2,12.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:772: yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:773: tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha // Ram_2,12.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:774: sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram /
GE09ram_02pu:775: sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca // Ram_2,12.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:778: iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:780: tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan /
GE09ram_02pu:781: dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān upasthitān dvāram upetya viṣṭhitān //
GE09ram_02pu:782: te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:784: amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:789: rāmaś ca samyagāstīrṇo bhāsvatā vyāghracarmaṇā // Ram_2,13.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:791: yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca // Ram_2,13.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:793: tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,13.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:794: kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:798: sajjaṃ tiṣṭhati rāmasya vālavyajanam uttamam // Ram_2,13.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:801: pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:802: prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate // Ram_2,13.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:804: vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare // Ram_2,13.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:808: apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet // Ram_2,13.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:809: na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:810: yauvarājyābhiṣekaś ca sajjo rāmasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,13.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:812: abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ // Ram_2,13.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:813: ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham /
GE09ram_02pu:817: gatā bhagavatī rātrir ahaḥ śivam upasthitam /
GE09ram_02pu:818: budhyasva nṛpaśārdūla kuru kāryam anantaram // Ram_2,13.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:819: brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa /
GE09ram_02pu:821: stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam /
GE09ram_02pu:822: pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,13.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:823: na caiva saṃprasupto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:824: iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ // Ram_2,13.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:825: sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam /
GE09ram_02pu:826: nirjagāma nṛpāvāsān manyamānaḥ priyaṃ mahat // Ram_2,13.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:828: sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,13.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:835: sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan /
GE09ram_02pu:836: tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva sārathiḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:838: avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam //
GE09ram_02pu:840: praviviktāṃ tataḥ kakṣyām āsasāda purāṇavit // Ram_2,14.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:844: dadarśa viṣṭhitān dvāri stryadhyakṣān susamāhitān // Ram_2,14.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:850: dadarśa sūtaḥ paryaṅke sauvarṇe sottaracchade // Ram_2,14.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:854: upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā // Ram_2,14.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:856: vavande varadaṃ bandī niyamajño vinītavat // Ram_2,14.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:859: kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02pu:860: mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // Ram_2,14.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:861: evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:862: tataḥ saṃmānayāmāsa sītām idam uvāca ha // Ram_2,14.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:863: devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare /
GE09ram_02pu:867: yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:868: dhruvam adyaiva māṃ rājā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,14.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:869: hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatim /
GE09ram_02pu:870: saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āsva ramasva ca // Ram_2,14.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:873: sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:878: prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā // Ram_2,14.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:880: niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ // Ram_2,14.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:882: jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ // Ram_2,14.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:885: sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya /
GE09ram_02pu:886: ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya // Ram_2,14.24
GE09ram_02pu:887: eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya rājaprasādād vipulāṅgam iṣyan /
GE09ram_02pu:888: ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā /
GE09ram_02pu:889: lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ cirāya //
GE09ram_02pu:890: sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:891: mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā yayau //
GE09ram_02pu:893: prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ mahāpatham //
GE09ram_02pu:899: saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api // Ram_2,15.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:901: yathārhaṃ cāpi sampūjya sarvān eva narān yayau // Ram_2,15.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:904: yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:905: tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani // Ram_2,15.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:906: alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:907: yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam // Ram_2,15.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:908: ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:910: etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:911: ātmasaṃpūjanīḥ śṛṇvan yayau rāmo mahāpatham // Ram_2,15.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:912: na hi tasmān manaḥ kaścic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt /
GE09ram_02pu:913: naraḥ śaknoty apākraṣṭum atikrānte 'pi rāghave // Ram_2,15.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:914: sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām /
GE09ram_02pu:915: caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ // Ram_2,15.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:917: rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan // Ram_2,15.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:919: saṃnivartya janaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhāntaḥpuram abhyagāt // Ram_2,15.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:920: tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje /
GE09ram_02pu:921: pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:922: sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe /
GE09ram_02pu:924: sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat /
GE09ram_02pu:925: tato vavande caraṇau kaikeyyāḥ susamāhitaḥ // Ram_2,16.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:927: śaśāka nṛpatir dīno nekṣituṃ nābhibhāṣitum // Ram_2,16.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:928: tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham /
GE09ram_02pu:929: rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam // Ram_2,16.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:933: upaplutam ivādityam uktānṛtam ṛṣiṃ yathā // Ram_2,16.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:934: acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan /
GE09ram_02pu:935: babhūva saṃrabdhataraḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // Ram_2,16.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:936: cintayāmāsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:937: kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati // Ram_2,16.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:938: anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati /
GE09ram_02pu:939: tasya mām adya samprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate // Ram_2,16.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:941: kaikeyīm abhivādyaiva rāmo vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,16.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:942: kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā /
GE09ram_02pu:943: kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya // Ram_2,16.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:944: vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_02pu:945: śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate /
GE09ram_02pu:946: saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham // Ram_2,16.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:947: kaccin na kiṃcid bharate kumāre priyadarśane /
GE09ram_02pu:948: śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātṝṇāṃ vā mamāśubham // Ram_2,16.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:949: atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:950: muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe // Ram_2,16.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:952: kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate // Ram_2,16.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:953: kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃcid abhimānāt pitā mama /
GE09ram_02pu:954: ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,16.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:955: etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:957: ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake /
GE09ram_02pu:958: bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave /
GE09ram_02pu:959: niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca // Ram_2,16.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:960: tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam /
GE09ram_02pu:961: kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate // Ram_2,16.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:963: uvāca rāmaṃ kaikeyī vacanaṃ bhṛśadāruṇam // Ram_2,16.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:964: purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:965: rakṣitena varau dattau saśalyena mahāraṇe // Ram_2,16.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:967: gamanaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye tava cādyaiva rāghava // Ram_2,16.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:968: yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi /
GE09ram_02pu:969: ātmānaṃ ca naraśreṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu // Ram_2,16.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:970: sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam /
GE09ram_02pu:971: tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca // Ram_2,16.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:972: sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:973: abhiṣekam imaṃ tyaktvā jaṭācīradharo vasa // Ram_2,16.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:977: śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,16.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:978: evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:980: idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:982: manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:983: yāsyāmi bhava suprītā vanaṃ cīrajaṭādharaḥ // Ram_2,16.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:984: hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca /
GE09ram_02pu:985: niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam // Ram_2,16.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:986: alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me /
GE09ram_02pu:987: svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,16.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:988: ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:989: hṛṣṭo bhrātre svayaṃ dadyāṃ bharatāyāpracoditaḥ // Ram_2,16.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:990: kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:991: tava ca priyakāmārthaṃ pratijñām anupālayan // Ram_2,16.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:992: tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:997: avicārya pitur vākyaṃ samāvastuṃ caturdaśa // Ram_2,16.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:998: sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikeyī /
GE09ram_02pu:999: prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayāmāsa rāghavam // Ram_2,16.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:1000: evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1002: tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1003: rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi // Ram_2,16.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:1004: vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate /
GE09ram_02pu:1005: naitat kiṃcin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām // Ram_2,16.41 //
GE09ram_02pu:1006: yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran /
GE09ram_02pu:1007: pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā // Ram_2,16.42 //
GE09ram_02pu:1008: dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1009: mūrchito nyapatat tasmin paryaṅke hemabhūṣite // Ram_2,16.43 //
GE09ram_02pu:1011: kaśayevāhato vājī vanaṃ gantuṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // Ram_2,16.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:1013: śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,16.45 //
GE09ram_02pu:1014: nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe /
GE09ram_02pu:1015: viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam // Ram_2,16.46 //
GE09ram_02pu:1016: yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃcic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:1017: prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat // Ram_2,16.47 //
GE09ram_02pu:1018: na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃcid asti mahattaram /
GE09ram_02pu:1019: yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā // Ram_2,16.48 //
GE09ram_02pu:1021: vane vatsyāmi vijane varṣāṇīha caturdaśa // Ram_2,16.49 //
GE09ram_02pu:1022: na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃcid āśaṃsase guṇam /
GE09ram_02pu:1023: yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī // Ram_2,16.50 //
GE09ram_02pu:1024: yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham /
GE09ram_02pu:1025: tato 'dyaiva gamiṣyāmi daṇḍakānāṃ mahad vanam // Ram_2,16.51 //
GE09ram_02pu:1026: bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā /
GE09ram_02pu:1027: tathā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // Ram_2,16.52 //
GE09ram_02pu:1028: sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā /
GE09ram_02pu:1029: śokād aśaknuvan bāṣpaṃ praruroda mahāsvanam // Ram_2,16.53 //
GE09ram_02pu:1030: vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:1031: kaikeyyāś cāpy anāryāyā niṣpapāta mahādyutiḥ // Ram_2,16.54 //
GE09ram_02pu:1032: sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02pu:1033: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt svaṃ dadarśa suhṛjjanam // Ram_2,16.55 //
GE09ram_02pu:1037: śanair jagāma sāpekṣo dṛṣṭiṃ tatrāvicālayan // Ram_2,16.57 //
GE09ram_02pu:1039: lokakāntasya kāntatvaṃ śītaraśmer iva kṣapā // Ram_2,16.58 //
GE09ram_02pu:1040: na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02pu:1042: dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1044: praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim āgatām /
GE09ram_02pu:1045: na caiva rāmo 'tra jagāma vikriyāṃ suhṛjjanasyātmavipattiśaṅkayā //
GE09ram_02pu:1046: rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1047: jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī // Ram_2,17.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1049: upaviṣṭaṃ gṛhadvāri tiṣṭhataś cāparān bahūn // Ram_2,17.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1050: praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1052: praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1053: striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ // Ram_2,17.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1054: vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1055: nyavedayanta tvaritā rāmamātuḥ priyaṃ tadā // Ram_2,17.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1056: kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā /
GE09ram_02pu:1057: prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī // Ram_2,17.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1059: agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā // Ram_2,17.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1060: praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02pu:1061: dadarśa mātaraṃ tatra hāvayantīṃ hutāśanam // Ram_2,17.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1063: abhicakrāma saṃhṛṣṭā kiśoraṃ vaḍabā yathā // Ram_2,17.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1064: tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1065: kausalyā putravātsalyād idaṃ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,17.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1067: prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule // Ram_2,17.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1069: adyaiva hi tvāṃ dharmātmā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,17.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1071: sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ // Ram_2,17.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1072: devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1073: idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca // Ram_2,17.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1074: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane /
GE09ram_02pu:1075: madhumūlaphalair jīvan hitvā munivad āmiṣam // Ram_2,17.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1077: māṃ punar daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ vivāsayati tāpasam // Ram_2,17.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1078: tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva /
GE09ram_02pu:1084: yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:1085: na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā // Ram_2,17.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1086: eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1087: aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate // Ram_2,17.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1088: na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe /
GE09ram_02pu:1089: api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā // Ram_2,17.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:1091: ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī /
GE09ram_02pu:1092: ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,17.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:1093: tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā /
GE09ram_02pu:1094: kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me // Ram_2,17.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:1095: yo hi māṃ sevate kaścid atha vāpy anuvartate /
GE09ram_02pu:1096: kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate // Ram_2,17.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:1097: daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:1099: upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1100: duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā // Ram_2,17.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:1101: sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate /
GE09ram_02pu:1102: prāvṛṣīva mahānadyāḥ spṛṣṭaṃ kūlaṃ navāmbhasā // Ram_2,17.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:1103: mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama /
GE09ram_02pu:1104: yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ mṛgīm iva //
GE09ram_02pu:1105: sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate /
GE09ram_02pu:1106: anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate //
GE09ram_02pu:1107: idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi /
GE09ram_02pu:1108: tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam ūṣare //
GE09ram_02pu:1109: yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā labheta kaścid guruduḥkhakarśitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1110: gatāham adyaiva paretasaṃsadaṃ vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai //
GE09ram_02pu:1111: bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:1112: vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī //
GE09ram_02pu:1113: tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram /
GE09ram_02pu:1114: uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,18.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1115: na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1116: tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,18.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1117: viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1118: nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ // Ram_2,18.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1120: yena nirvāsyate rāṣṭrād vanavāsāya rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,18.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1121: na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1122: amitro 'pi nirasto 'pi yo 'sya doṣam udāharet // Ram_2,18.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1123: devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam /
GE09ram_02pu:1124: avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt // Ram_2,18.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1125: tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1126: putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran // Ram_2,18.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1127: yāvad eva na jānāti kaścid artham imaṃ naraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1128: tāvad eva mayā sārdham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam // Ram_2,18.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1129: mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:1130: kaḥ samartho 'dhikaṃ kartuṃ kṛtāntasyeva tiṣṭhataḥ // Ram_2,18.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1132: kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye // Ram_2,18.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1133: bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati /
GE09ram_02pu:1134: sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate // Ram_2,18.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1135: tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam /
GE09ram_02pu:1136: kasya śaktiḥ śriyaṃ dātuṃ bharatāyāriśāsana // Ram_2,18.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1138: satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape // Ram_2,18.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1139: dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate /
GE09ram_02pu:1140: praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya // Ram_2,18.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1141: harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1142: devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu // Ram_2,18.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1143: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1144: uvāca rāmaṃ kausalyā rudantī śokalālasā // Ram_2,18.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1145: bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:1146: yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate // Ram_2,18.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1147: na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1148: vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ // Ram_2,18.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:1149: dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi /
GE09ram_02pu:1150: śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam // Ram_2,18.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1151: śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan /
GE09ram_02pu:1152: pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,18.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1153: yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham /
GE09ram_02pu:1154: tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam // Ram_2,18.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1155: tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā /
GE09ram_02pu:1156: tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam // Ram_2,18.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:1157: yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām /
GE09ram_02pu:1158: ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum // Ram_2,18.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:1159: tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam /
GE09ram_02pu:1160: brahmahatyām ivādharmāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // Ram_2,18.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:1161: vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1162: uvāca rāmo dharmātmā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam // Ram_2,18.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:1163: nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama /
GE09ram_02pu:1164: prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam // Ram_2,18.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:1165: ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā /
GE09ram_02pu:1166: gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā // Ram_2,18.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:1167: asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1168: khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ // Ram_2,18.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:1171: na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1172: pūrvair ayam abhipreto gato mārgo 'nugamyate // Ram_2,18.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:1173: tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā /
GE09ram_02pu:1174: pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaścin nāma hīyate // Ram_2,18.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:1175: tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1176: tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam /
GE09ram_02pu:1177: abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca // Ram_2,18.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:1178: dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1179: dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam // Ram_2,18.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:1180: saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā /
GE09ram_02pu:1181: na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā // Ram_2,18.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:1182: so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum /
GE09ram_02pu:1183: pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ // Ram_2,18.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:1185: dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām // Ram_2,18.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:1186: tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1187: uvāca bhūyaḥ kausalyāṃ prāñjaliḥ śirasānataḥ // Ram_2,18.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:1188: anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1189: śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me /
GE09ram_02pu:1190: tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm // Ram_2,18.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:1191: yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam /
GE09ram_02pu:1192: adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:1193: prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ parākramāj jigamiṣur eva daṇḍakān /
GE09ram_02pu:1194: athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam //
GE09ram_02pu:1195: atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1197: āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02pu:1198: uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān // Ram_2,19.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1202: mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru // Ram_2,19.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1203: tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe /
GE09ram_02pu:1206: mātṝṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam // Ram_2,19.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1208: paralokabhayād bhīto nirbhayo 'stu pitā mama // Ram_2,19.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1209: tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte /
GE09ram_02pu:1210: satyaṃ neti manastāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām // Ram_2,19.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1212: anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,19.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1214: sutaṃ bharatam avyagram abhiṣecayitā tataḥ // Ram_2,19.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1216: gate 'raṇyaṃ ca kaikeyyā bhaviṣyati manaḥsukham // Ram_2,19.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1217: buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1218: tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram // Ram_2,19.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1219: kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane /
GE09ram_02pu:1220: rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane // Ram_2,19.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1221: kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane /
GE09ram_02pu:1222: yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet // Ram_2,19.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1223: jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram /
GE09ram_02pu:1224: bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā // Ram_2,19.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1226: ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye // Ram_2,19.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1228: brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau // Ram_2,19.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1229: yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate /
GE09ram_02pu:1230: vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ // Ram_2,19.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:1231: kaścid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān /
GE09ram_02pu:1232: yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃcit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate // Ram_2,19.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1234: yasya kiṃcit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat // Ram_2,19.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1235: vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate /
GE09ram_02pu:1236: tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām /
GE09ram_02pu:1238: na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā /
GE09ram_02pu:1239: daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam //
GE09ram_02pu:1240: iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1241: śrutvā madhyaṃ jagāmeva manasā duḥkhaharṣayoḥ // Ram_2,20.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1242: tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1243: niśaśvāsa mahāsarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ // Ram_2,20.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1245: babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham // Ram_2,20.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1246: agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1247: tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām // Ram_2,20.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1248: agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1249: asthāne sambhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam // Ram_2,20.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1251: kathaṃ hy etad asambhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati // Ram_2,20.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1253: kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi // Ram_2,20.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1254: pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate /
GE09ram_02pu:1255: santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase // Ram_2,20.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1257: yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate /
GE09ram_02pu:1258: sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi // Ram_2,20.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1259: yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam /
GE09ram_02pu:1260: tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate // Ram_2,20.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1261: viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate /
GE09ram_02pu:1262: vīrāḥ saṃbhāvitātmāno na daivaṃ paryupāsate // Ram_2,20.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1264: na daivena vipannārthaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'vasīdati // Ram_2,20.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1265: drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1266: daivamānuṣayor adya vyaktā vyaktir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,20.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1267: adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1268: yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,20.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1270: pradhāvitam ahaṃ daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa nivartaye // Ram_2,20.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1272: na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā // Ram_2,20.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1273: yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1274: araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā // Ram_2,20.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1275: ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava /
GE09ram_02pu:1277: madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:1278: prabhaviṣyati duḥkhāya yathograṃ pauruṣaṃ mama // Ram_2,20.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1280: āryaputrāḥ kariṣyanti vanavāsaṃ gate tvayi // Ram_2,20.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1282: prajā nikṣipya putreṣu putravat paripālane // Ram_2,20.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1284: naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani // Ram_2,20.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:1285: pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk /
GE09ram_02pu:1286: rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram // Ram_2,20.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:1287: maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava /
GE09ram_02pu:1288: aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt // Ram_2,20.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:1289: na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me /
GE09ram_02pu:1292: na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama // Ram_2,20.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:1294: pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye // Ram_2,20.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:1298: patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ // Ram_2,20.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:1300: kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite // Ram_2,20.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:1301: bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān /
GE09ram_02pu:1304: rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho // Ram_2,20.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:1306: vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca // Ram_2,20.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:1307: anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1309: bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1310: yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:1311: vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1312: uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:1313: taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane /
GE09ram_02pu:1314: kausalyā bāṣpasaṃruddhā vaco dharmiṣṭham abravīt // Ram_2,21.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1316: mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet // Ram_2,21.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1317: yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate /
GE09ram_02pu:1318: kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam // Ram_2,21.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1319: ka etacchraddadhecchrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam /
GE09ram_02pu:1320: guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate // Ram_2,21.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1321: tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān /
GE09ram_02pu:1322: pradhakṣyati yathā kakṣaṃ citrabhānur himātyaye // Ram_2,21.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1323: kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati /
GE09ram_02pu:1324: ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi yatra putra gamiṣyasi // Ram_2,21.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1325: tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1326: śrutvā rāmo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // Ram_2,21.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1327: kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02pu:1328: bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati // Ram_2,21.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1329: bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1330: sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ // Ram_2,21.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1331: yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1332: śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // Ram_2,21.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1333: evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubhadarśanā /
GE09ram_02pu:1334: tathety uvāca suprītā rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam // Ram_2,21.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1335: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1336: bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // Ram_2,21.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1337: mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1338: rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // Ram_2,21.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1339: imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1340: varṣāṇi paramaprītaḥ sthāsyāmi vacane tava // Ram_2,21.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1341: evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:1342: uvāca paramārtā tu kausalyā putravatsalā // Ram_2,21.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1343: āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam /
GE09ram_02pu:1344: naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyāṃ mṛgīṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02pu:1345: yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā // Ram_2,21.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1346: tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1347: jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1348: bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ // Ram_2,21.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1350: bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā // Ram_2,21.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:1351: yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1352: śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃcid apramattā tathā kuru // Ram_2,21.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1354: bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet // Ram_2,21.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1355: śuśrūṣām eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā /
GE09ram_02pu:1356: eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ // Ram_2,21.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1357: pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1359: prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati /
GE09ram_02pu:1360: yadi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho dhārayiṣyati jīvitam // Ram_2,21.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:1363: gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho // Ram_2,21.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:1364: tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā /
GE09ram_02pu:1365: uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī //
GE09ram_02pu:1366: sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci /
GE09ram_02pu:1367: cakāra mātā rāmasya maṅgalāni manasvinī // Ram_2,22.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1368: svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1369: svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā // Ram_2,22.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1370: ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1371: dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā // Ram_2,22.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1372: smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1373: skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ // Ram_2,22.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1374: saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1375: nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1377: plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane /
GE09ram_02pu:1378: sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava // Ram_2,22.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1379: mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1380: mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka // Ram_2,22.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1382: mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā sampūjitās tv iha // Ram_2,22.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1383: āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1384: sarvasampattayo rāma svastimān gaccha putraka // Ram_2,22.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1385: svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1386: sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ // Ram_2,22.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1388: ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam // Ram_2,22.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1389: iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02pu:1392: vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // Ram_2,22.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1394: amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // Ram_2,22.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1396: cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca // Ram_2,22.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1398: avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham // Ram_2,22.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1400: paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani // Ram_2,22.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1402: abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava //
GE09ram_02pu:1403: itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_02pu:1404: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje //
GE09ram_02pu:1405: tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1406: jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā //
GE09ram_02pu:1407: abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1408: kṛtasvastyayano mātrā dharmiṣṭhe vartmani sthitaḥ // Ram_2,23.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1411: vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02pu:1412: tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,23.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1413: devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā /
GE09ram_02pu:1417: atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim /
GE09ram_02pu:1420: āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho // Ram_2,23.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1421: adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:1422: procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ // Ram_2,23.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1427: vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvāṃ nararṣabha /
GE09ram_02pu:1428: stuvanto nādya dṛśyante maṅgalaiḥ sūtamāgadhāḥ // Ram_2,23.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1429: na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1430: mūrdhni mūrdhāvasiktasya dadhati sma vidhānataḥ // Ram_2,23.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1431: na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1434: mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ // Ram_2,23.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1435: na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1437: na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana /
GE09ram_02pu:1439: abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02pu:1440: apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate // Ram_2,23.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1442: sīte tatrabhavāṃs tātaḥ pravrājayati māṃ vanam // Ram_2,23.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:1444: śṛṇu jānaki yenedaṃ krameṇābhyāgataṃ mama // Ram_2,23.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1446: kaikeyyai prītamanasā purā dattau mahāvarau // Ram_2,23.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1448: pracoditaḥ sa samayo dharmeṇa pratinirjitaḥ // Ram_2,23.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1449: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:1450: pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1451: so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam // Ram_2,23.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:1452: bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadācana /
GE09ram_02pu:1453: ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam /
GE09ram_02pu:1454: tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama // Ram_2,23.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:1455: nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadācana /
GE09ram_02pu:1456: anukūlatayā śakyaṃ samīpe tasya vartitum // Ram_2,23.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:1457: ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan /
GE09ram_02pu:1458: vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini // Ram_2,23.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:1459: yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1461: kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi /
GE09ram_02pu:1462: vanditavyo daśarathaḥ pitā mama nareśvaraḥ // Ram_2,23.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:1463: mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā /
GE09ram_02pu:1464: dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ sammānam arhati // Ram_2,23.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:1465: vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1466: snehapraṇayasambhogaiḥ samā hi mama mātaraḥ // Ram_2,23.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:1468: tvayā lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau prāṇaiḥ priyatarau mama // Ram_2,23.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:1469: vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadācana /
GE09ram_02pu:1470: sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca // Ram_2,23.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:1473: aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1474: samarthān sampragṛhṇanti janān api narādhipāḥ // Ram_2,23.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:1475: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini /
GE09ram_02pu:1476: yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasyacit tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama //
GE09ram_02pu:1477: evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī /
GE09ram_02pu:1478: praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt // Ram_2,24.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1479: āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā /
GE09ram_02pu:1480: svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate // Ram_2,24.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1481: bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02pu:1482: ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api // Ram_2,24.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1483: na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1484: iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā // Ram_2,24.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1485: yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:1486: agratas te gamiṣyāmi mṛdnantī kuśakaṇṭakān // Ram_2,24.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1488: naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate // Ram_2,24.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1491: anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam /
GE09ram_02pu:1492: nāsmi samprati vaktavyā vartitavyaṃ yathā mayā // Ram_2,24.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1493: sukhaṃ vane nivatsyāmi yathaiva bhavane pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1494: acintayantī trīṃl lokāṃś cintayantī pativratam // Ram_2,24.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1496: saha raṃsye tvayā vīra vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu // Ram_2,24.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1497: tvaṃ hi kartuṃ vane śakto rāma samparipālanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1498: anyasyāpi janasyeha kiṃ punar mama mānada // Ram_2,24.11 //
