GE09ram_02pu:1500: na te duḥkhaṃ kariṣyāmi nivasantī saha tvayā // Ram_2,24.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1501: icchāmi saritaḥ śailān palvalāni vanāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1502: draṣṭuṃ sarvatra nirbhītā tvayā nāthena dhīmatā // Ram_2,24.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1504: iccheyaṃ sukhinī draṣṭuṃ tvayā vīreṇa saṃgatā // Ram_2,24.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1506: evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ vāhaṃ tvayā saha // Ram_2,24.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1507: svarge 'pi ca vinā vāso bhavitā yadi rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:1508: tvayā mama naravyāghra nāhaṃ tam api rocaye // Ram_2,24.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1509: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ sudurgamaṃ mṛgāyutaṃ vānaravāraṇair yutam /
GE09ram_02pu:1510: vane nivatsyāmi yathā pitur gṛhe tavaiva pādāv upagṛhya saṃmatā //
GE09ram_02pu:1511: ananyabhāvām anuraktacetasaṃ tvayā viyuktāṃ maraṇāya niścitām /
GE09ram_02pu:1512: nayasva māṃ sādhu kuruṣva yācanāṃ na te mayāto gurutā bhaviṣyati //
GE09ram_02pu:1513: tathā bruvāṇām api dharmavatsalo na ca sma sītāṃ nṛvaro ninīṣati /
GE09ram_02pu:1514: uvāca caināṃ bahu saṃnivartane vane nivāsasya ca duḥkhitāṃ prati //
GE09ram_02pu:1515: sa evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1516: nivartanārthe dharmātmā vākyam etad uvāca ha // Ram_2,25.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1517: sīte mahākulīnāsi dharme ca niratā sadā /
GE09ram_02pu:1518: ihācara svadharmaṃ tvaṃ mā yathā manasaḥ sukham // Ram_2,25.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1519: sīte yathā tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tathā kāryaṃ tvayābale /
GE09ram_02pu:1520: vane doṣā hi bahavo vadatas tān nibodha me // Ram_2,25.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1522: bahudoṣaṃ hi kāntāraṃ vanam ity abhidhīyate // Ram_2,25.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1524: sadā sukhaṃ na jānāmi duḥkham eva sadā vanam // Ram_2,25.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1526: siṃhānāṃ ninadā duḥkhāḥ śrotuṃ duḥkham ato vanam // Ram_2,25.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1528: rātriṣu śramakhinnena tasmād duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1531: atīva vātas timiraṃ bubhukṣā cātra nityaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1532: bhayāni ca mahānty atra tato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1533: sarīsṛpāś ca bahavo bahurūpāś ca bhāmini /
GE09ram_02pu:1534: caranti pṛthivīṃ darpād ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1536: tiṣṭhanty āvṛtya panthānam ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1537: pataṃgā vṛścikāḥ kīṭā daṃśāś ca maśakaiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02pu:1538: bādhante nityam abale sarvaṃ duḥkham ato vanam // Ram_2,25.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1539: drumāḥ kaṇṭakinaś caiva kuśakāśāś ca bhāmini /
GE09ram_02pu:1540: vane vyākulaśākhāgrās tena duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1541: tad alaṃ te vanaṃ gatvā kṣamaṃ na hi vanaṃ tava /
GE09ram_02pu:1542: vimṛśann iha paśyāmi bahudoṣataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1543: vanaṃ tu netuṃ na kṛtā matis tadā babhūva rāmeṇa yadā mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02pu:1544: na tasya sītā vacanaṃ cakāra tat tato 'bravīd rāmam idaṃ suduḥkhitā //
GE09ram_02pu:1545: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sītā rāmasya duḥkhitā /
GE09ram_02pu:1546: prasaktāśrumukhī mandam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,26.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1547: ye tvayā kīrtitā doṣā vane vastavyatāṃ prati /
GE09ram_02pu:1548: guṇān ity eva tān viddhi tava snehapuraskṛtān // Ram_2,26.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1549: tvayā ca saha gantavyaṃ mayā gurujanājñayā /
GE09ram_02pu:1550: tvadviyogena me rāma tyaktavyam iha jīvitam // Ram_2,26.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1551: na ca māṃ tvatsamīpasthām api śaknoti rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:1552: surāṇām īśvaraḥ śakraḥ pradharṣayitum ojasā // Ram_2,26.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1553: patihīnā tu yā nārī na sā śakṣyati jīvitum /
GE09ram_02pu:1554: kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ rāma tvayā mama vidarśitam // Ram_2,26.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1555: atha cāpi mahāprājña brāhmaṇānāṃ mayā śrutam /
GE09ram_02pu:1556: purā pitṛgṛhe satyaṃ vastavyaṃ kila me vane // Ram_2,26.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1559: ādeśo vanavāsasya prāptavyaḥ sa mayā kila /
GE09ram_02pu:1560: sā tvayā saha tatrāhaṃ yāsyāmi priya nānyathā // Ram_2,26.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1562: kālaś cāyaṃ samutpannaḥ satyavāg bhavatu dvijaḥ // Ram_2,26.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1563: vanavāse hi jānāmi duḥkhāni bahudhā kila /
GE09ram_02pu:1564: prāpyante niyataṃ vīra puruṣair akṛtātmabhiḥ // Ram_2,26.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1565: kanyayā ca pitur gehe vanavāsaḥ śruto mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:1566: bhikṣiṇyāḥ sādhuvṛttāyā mama mātur ihāgrataḥ // Ram_2,26.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1567: prasāditaś ca vai pūrvaṃ tvaṃ vai bahuvidhaṃ prabho /
GE09ram_02pu:1568: gamanaṃ vanavāsasya kāṅkṣitaṃ hi saha tvayā // Ram_2,26.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1569: kṛtakṣaṇāhaṃ bhadraṃ te gamanaṃ prati rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:1570: vanavāsasya śūrasya caryā hi mama rocate // Ram_2,26.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1572: bhartāram anugacchantī bhartā hi mama daivatam // Ram_2,26.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1573: pretyabhāve 'pi kalyāṇaḥ saṃgamo me saha tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:1574: śrutir hi śrūyate puṇyā brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśasvinām // Ram_2,26.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1575: iha loke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate /
GE09ram_02pu:1576: adbhir dattā svadharmeṇa pretyabhāve 'pi tasya sā // Ram_2,26.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1577: evam asmāt svakāṃ nārīṃ suvṛttāṃ hi pativratām /
GE09ram_02pu:1578: nābhirocayase netuṃ tvaṃ māṃ keneha hetunā // Ram_2,26.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1579: bhaktāṃ pativratāṃ dīnāṃ māṃ samāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1581: yadi māṃ duḥkhitām evaṃ vanaṃ netuṃ na cecchasi /
GE09ram_02pu:1582: viṣam agniṃ jalaṃ vāham āsthāsye mṛtyukāraṇāt // Ram_2,26.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1583: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ taṃ sā yācate gamanaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02pu:1584: nānumene mahābāhus tāṃ netuṃ vijanaṃ vanam // Ram_2,26.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1585: evam uktā tu sā cintāṃ maithilī samupāgatā /
GE09ram_02pu:1586: snāpayantīva gām uṣṇair aśrubhir nayanacyutaiḥ // Ram_2,26.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1587: cintayantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu nivartayitum ātmavān /
GE09ram_02pu:1588: krodhāviṣṭāṃ tu vaidehīṃ kākutstho bahv asāntvayat // Ram_2,26.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:1592: praṇayāc cābhimānāc ca paricikṣepa rāghavam // Ram_2,27.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1593: kiṃ tvāmanyata vaidehaḥ pitā me mithilādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1594: rāma jāmātaraṃ prāpya striyaṃ puruṣavigraham // Ram_2,27.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1596: tejo nāsti paraṃ rāme tapatīva divākare // Ram_2,27.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1597: kiṃ hi kṛtvā viṣaṇṇas tvaṃ kuto vā bhayam asti te /
GE09ram_02pu:1598: yat parityaktukāmas tvaṃ mām ananyaparāyaṇām // Ram_2,27.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1600: sāvitrīm iva māṃ viddhi tvam ātmavaśavartinīm // Ram_2,27.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1601: na tv ahaṃ manasāpy anyaṃ draṣṭāsmi tvadṛte 'nagha /
GE09ram_02pu:1602: tvayā rāghava gaccheyaṃ yathānyā kulapāṃsanī // Ram_2,27.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1603: svayaṃ tu bhāryāṃ kaumārīṃ ciram adhyuṣitāṃ satīm /
GE09ram_02pu:1604: śailūṣa iva māṃ rāma parebhyo dātum icchasi // Ram_2,27.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1605: sa mām anādāya vanaṃ na tvaṃ prasthātum arhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:1606: tapo vā yadi vāraṇyaṃ svargo vā syāt saha tvayā // Ram_2,27.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1607: na ca me bhavitā tatra kaścit pathi pariśramaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1608: pṛṣṭhatas tava gacchantyā vihāraśayaneṣv api // Ram_2,27.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1610: tūlājinasamasparśā mārge mama saha tvayā // Ram_2,27.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1612: rajo ramaṇa tan manye parārdhyam iva candanam // Ram_2,27.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1614: kuthāstaraṇatalpeṣu kiṃ syāt sukhataraṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,27.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1615: pattraṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ yat tvam alpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu /
GE09ram_02pu:1616: dāsyasi svayam āhṛtya tan me 'mṛtarasopamam // Ram_2,27.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1617: na mātur na pitus tatra smariṣyāmi na veśmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1618: ārtavāny upabhuñjānā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca // Ram_2,27.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1619: na ca tatra gataḥ kiṃcid draṣṭum arhasi vipriyam /
GE09ram_02pu:1620: matkṛte na ca te śoko na bhaviṣyāmi durbharā // Ram_2,27.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1621: yas tvayā saha sa svargo nirayo yas tvayā vinā /
GE09ram_02pu:1622: iti jānan parāṃ prītiṃ gaccha rāma mayā saha // Ram_2,27.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1623: atha mām evam avyagrāṃ vanaṃ naiva nayiṣyasi /
GE09ram_02pu:1624: viṣam adyaiva pāsyāmi mā viśaṃ dviṣatāṃ vaśam // Ram_2,27.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:1625: paścād api hi duḥkhena mama naivāsti jīvitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1626: ujjhitāyās tvayā nātha tadaiva maraṇaṃ varam // Ram_2,27.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1627: idaṃ hi sahituṃ śokaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe /
GE09ram_02pu:1628: kiṃ punar daśavarṣāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca duḥkhitā // Ram_2,27.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1629: iti sā śokasaṃtaptā vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu /
GE09ram_02pu:1630: cukrośa patim āyastā bhṛśam āliṅgya sasvaram // Ram_2,27.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1631: sā viddhā bahubhir vākyair digdhair iva gajāṅganā /
GE09ram_02pu:1635: tāṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ visaṃjñām iva duḥkhitām /
GE09ram_02pu:1636: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmaḥ pariviśvāsayaṃs tadā // Ram_2,27.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:1637: na devi tava duḥkhena svargam apy abhirocaye /
GE09ram_02pu:1638: na hi me 'sti bhayaṃ kiṃcit svayambhor iva sarvataḥ // Ram_2,27.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:1640: vāsaṃ na rocaye 'raṇye śaktimān api rakṣaṇe // Ram_2,27.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:1641: yat sṛṣṭāsi mayā sārdhaṃ vanavāsāya maithili /
GE09ram_02pu:1642: na vihātuṃ mayā śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā // Ram_2,27.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:1643: dharmas tu gajanāsoru sadbhir ācaritaḥ purā /
GE09ram_02pu:1644: taṃ cāham anuvarte 'dya yathā sūryaṃ suvarcalā // Ram_2,27.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:1645: eṣa dharmas tu suśroṇi pitur mātuś ca vaśyatā /
GE09ram_02pu:1646: ataś cājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,27.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:1647: sa māṃ pitā yathā śāsti satyadharmapathe sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1648: tathā vartitum icchāmi sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1649: anugacchasva māṃ bhīru sahadharmacarī bhava // Ram_2,27.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:1650: brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ratnāni bhikṣukebhyaś ca bhojanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1651: dehi cāśaṃsamānebhyaḥ saṃtvarasva ca māciram // Ram_2,27.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:1652: anukūlaṃ tu sā bhartur jñātvā gamanam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1653: kṣipraṃ pramuditā devī dātum evopacakrame // Ram_2,27.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:1654: tataḥ prahṛṣṭā paripūrṇamānasā yaśasvinī bhartur avekṣya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1655: dhanāni ratnāni ca dātum aṅganā pracakrame dharmabhṛtāṃ manasvinī //
GE09ram_02pu:1657: sthitaṃ prāggāminaṃ vīraṃ yācamānaṃ kṛtāñjalim // Ram_2,28.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1658: mayādya saha saumitre tvayi gacchati tad vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1659: ko bhariṣyati kausalyāṃ sumitrāṃ vā yaśasvinīm // Ram_2,28.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1660: abhivarṣati kāmair yaḥ parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm iva /
GE09ram_02pu:1662: sā hi rājyam idaṃ prāpya nṛpasyāśvapateḥ sutā /
GE09ram_02pu:1663: duḥkhitānāṃ sapatnīnāṃ na kariṣyati śobhanam // Ram_2,28.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1664: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā /
GE09ram_02pu:1665: pratyuvāca tadā rāmaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam // Ram_2,28.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1667: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca prayato nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,28.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1668: kausalyā bibhṛyād āryā sahasram api madvidhān /
GE09ram_02pu:1669: yasyāḥ sahasraṃ grāmāṇāṃ samprāptam upajīvanam // Ram_2,28.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1671: agratas te gamiṣyāmi panthānam anudarśayan // Ram_2,28.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1672: āhariṣyāmi te nityaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1673: vanyāni yāni cānyāni svāhārāṇi tapasvinām // Ram_2,28.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1674: bhavāṃs tu saha vaidehyā girisānuṣu raṃsyate /
GE09ram_02pu:1675: ahaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi jāgrataḥ svapataś ca te // Ram_2,28.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1676: rāmas tv anena vākyena suprītaḥ pratyuvāca tam /
GE09ram_02pu:1677: vrajāpṛcchasva saumitre sarvam eva suhṛjjanam // Ram_2,28.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1678: ye ca rājño dadau divye mahātmā varuṇaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02pu:1683: sa tvam āyudham ādāya kṣipram āvraja lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,28.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1687: rāmāya darśayāmāsa saumitriḥ sarvam āyudham // Ram_2,28.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1688: tam uvācātmavān rāmaḥ prītyā lakṣmaṇam āgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:1689: kāle tvam āgataḥ saumya kāṅkṣite mama lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,28.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1690: ahaṃ pradātum icchāmi yad idaṃ māmakaṃ dhanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1691: brāhmaṇebhyas tapasvibhyas tvayā saha paraṃtapa // Ram_2,28.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:1693: teṣām api ca me bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ copajīvinām // Ram_2,28.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1694: vasiṣṭhaputraṃ tu suyajñam āryaṃ tvam ānayāśu pravaraṃ dvijānām /
GE09ram_02pu:1695: abhiprayāsyāmi vanaṃ samastān abhyarcya śiṣṭān aparān dvijātīn //
GE09ram_02pu:1696: tataḥ śāsanam ājñāya bhrātuḥ śubhataraṃ priyam /
GE09ram_02pu:1697: gatvā sa praviveśāśu suyajñasya niveśanam // Ram_2,29.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1699: sakhe 'bhyāgaccha paśya tvaṃ veśma duṣkarakāriṇaḥ // Ram_2,29.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1700: tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyāśu gatvā saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02pu:1701: juṣṭaṃ tat prāviśal lakṣmyā ramyaṃ rāmaniveśanam // Ram_2,29.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1702: tam āgataṃ vedavidaṃ prāñjaliḥ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02pu:1705: sahemasūtrair maṇibhiḥ keyūrair valayair api // Ram_2,29.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1706: anyaiś ca ratnair bahubhiḥ kākutsthaḥ pratyapūjayat /
GE09ram_02pu:1707: suyajñaṃ sa tadovāca rāmaḥ sītāpracoditaḥ // Ram_2,29.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1708: hāraṃ ca hemasūtraṃ ca bhāryāyai saumya hāraya /
GE09ram_02pu:1709: raśanāṃ cādhunā sītā dātum icchati te sakhe // Ram_2,29.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1711: tam apīcchati vaidehī pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ tvayi // Ram_2,29.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1712: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma mātulo yaṃ dadau mama /
GE09ram_02pu:1713: taṃ te gajasahasreṇa dadāmi dvijapuṃgava // Ram_2,29.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1714: ity uktaḥ sa hi rāmeṇa suyajñaḥ pratigṛhya tat /
GE09ram_02pu:1716: atha bhrātaram avyagraṃ priyaṃ rāmaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1717: saumitriṃ tam uvācedaṃ brahmeva tridaśeśvaram // Ram_2,29.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1718: agastyaṃ kauśikaṃ caiva tāv ubhau brāhmaṇottamau /
GE09ram_02pu:1719: arcayāhūya saumitre ratnaiḥ sasyam ivāmbubhiḥ // Ram_2,29.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1720: kausalyāṃ ca ya āśīrbhir bhaktaḥ paryupatiṣṭhati /
GE09ram_02pu:1721: ācāryas taittirīyāṇām abhirūpaś ca vedavit // Ram_2,29.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1722: tasya yānaṃ ca dāsīś ca saumitre saṃpradāpaya /
GE09ram_02pu:1723: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi yāvat tuṣyati sa dvijaḥ // Ram_2,29.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1725: toṣayainaṃ mahārhaiś ca ratnair vastrair dhanais tathā // Ram_2,29.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1726: śālivāhasahasraṃ ca dve śate bhadrakāṃs tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:1727: vyañjanārthaṃ ca saumitre gosahasram upākuru // Ram_2,29.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1728: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02pu:1729: yathoktaṃ brāhmaṇendrāṇām adadād dhanado yathā // Ram_2,29.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1732: lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama /
GE09ram_02pu:1733: aśūnyaṃ kāryam ekaikaṃ yāvadāgamanaṃ mama // Ram_2,29.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1734: ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam /
GE09ram_02pu:1736: tato 'sya dhanam ājahruḥ sarvam evopajīvinaḥ // Ram_2,29.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1737: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1739: tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1740: ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaścid avārayat // Ram_2,29.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:1741: sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1743: uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti // Ram_2,29.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:1745: gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:1746: parikṣipasi daṇḍena yāvat tāvad avāpsyasi // Ram_2,29.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:1747: sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām /
GE09ram_02pu:1748: āvidhya daṇḍaṃ cikṣepa sarvaprāṇena vegitaḥ // Ram_2,29.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:1749: uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan /
GE09ram_02pu:1750: manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama // Ram_2,29.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:1751: tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya moditaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1753: dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu /
GE09ram_02pu:1754: jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // Ram_2,30.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1758: adhiruhya janaḥ śrīmān udāsīno vyalokayat // Ram_2,30.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1759: na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1760: āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam // Ram_2,30.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1761: padātiṃ varjitacchattraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1763: yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02pu:1764: tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,30.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1765: aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1766: necchaty evānṛtaṃ kartuṃ pitaraṃ dharmagauravāt // Ram_2,30.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1767: yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api /
GE09ram_02pu:1768: tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ // Ram_2,30.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1770: varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām // Ram_2,30.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1771: adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate /
GE09ram_02pu:1772: na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati // Ram_2,30.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1774: kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam // Ram_2,30.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1775: ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1776: rāghavaṃ śobhayanty ete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam // Ram_2,30.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1779: pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1781: te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1782: gacchantam anugacchāmo yena gacchati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,30.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1783: udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1789: vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1790: asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam // Ram_2,30.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1792: asmattyaktaṃ prapadyantāṃ sevyamānaṃ tyajantu ca // Ram_2,30.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1794: śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasam // Ram_2,30.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1796: jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:1797: tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam /
GE09ram_02pu:1798: vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham //
GE09ram_02pu:1799: pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1800: sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me //
GE09ram_02pu:1802: praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha // Ram_2,31.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1804: rāmam evānuśocantaṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir āsadat // Ram_2,31.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1805: ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1806: brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā sarvaṃ caivopajīvinām // Ram_2,31.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1807: sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1808: sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate // Ram_2,31.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1810: vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ // Ram_2,31.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1812: ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam // Ram_2,31.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1813: sumantrānaya me dārān ye kecid iha māmakāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1814: dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam // Ram_2,31.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1815: so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1816: āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // Ram_2,31.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1817: evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā /
GE09ram_02pu:1818: pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam // Ram_2,31.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1820: kausalyāṃ parivāryātha śanair jagmur dhṛtavratāḥ // Ram_2,31.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1822: uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam // Ram_2,31.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1823: sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:1825: sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim /
GE09ram_02pu:1828: tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ // Ram_2,31.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1829: taṃ rāmo 'bhyapatat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1830: visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā // Ram_2,31.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1832: hā hā rāmeti sahasā bhūṣaṇadhvanimūrchitaḥ // Ram_2,31.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1833: taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau /
GE09ram_02pu:1834: paryaṅke sītayā sārdhaṃ rudantaḥ samaveśayan // Ram_2,31.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1837: āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1838: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām // Ram_2,31.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1839: lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1840: kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ // Ram_2,31.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1841: anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada /
GE09ram_02pu:1842: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ // Ram_2,31.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1844: uvāca rājā samprekṣya vanavāsāya rāghavam // Ram_2,31.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:1846: ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām // Ram_2,31.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:1847: evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1850: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam // Ram_2,31.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:1853: adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā /
GE09ram_02pu:1854: mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm /
GE09ram_02pu:1855: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ śvaḥkāle sādhayiṣyasi // Ram_2,31.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:1856: atha rāmas tathā śrutvā pitur ārtasya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1857: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dīno vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,31.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:1858: prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati /
GE09ram_02pu:1859: apakramaṇam evātaḥ sarvakāmair ahaṃ vṛṇe // Ram_2,31.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:1861: mayā visṛṣṭā vasudhā bharatāya pradīyatām // Ram_2,31.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:1862: apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1863: na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // Ram_2,31.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:1864: naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm /
GE09ram_02pu:1865: tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha // Ram_2,31.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:1866: puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya dīyatām /
GE09ram_02pu:1867: ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum //
GE09ram_02pu:1868: mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām /
GE09ram_02pu:1869: śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat //
GE09ram_02pu:1870: na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye /
GE09ram_02pu:1871: yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte 'nagha //
GE09ram_02pu:1872: tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm /
GE09ram_02pu:1873: na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā //
GE09ram_02pu:1874: phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1875: vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu nirvṛtiḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:1877: sabāṣpam atiniḥśvasya jagādedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,32.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1882: ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1883: teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya // Ram_2,32.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1884: nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu /
GE09ram_02pu:1885: nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati // Ram_2,32.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1886: dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaścid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1887: tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane // Ram_2,32.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1889: ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane // Ram_2,32.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1891: sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti // Ram_2,32.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1892: evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:1893: mukhaṃ cāpy agamacchoṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata // Ram_2,32.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1894: sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1895: rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva /
GE09ram_02pu:1899: vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite // Ram_2,32.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1900: kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1901: tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat /
GE09ram_02pu:1902: asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati // Ram_2,32.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1903: evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1904: vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata // Ram_2,32.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1905: tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1906: śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,32.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1907: asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān /
GE09ram_02pu:1908: sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ // Ram_2,32.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1909: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgarāḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan /
GE09ram_02pu:1910: asamañjaṃ vṛṇīṣvaikam asmān vā rāṣṭravardhana // Ram_2,32.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1911: tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam /
GE09ram_02pu:1912: tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan // Ram_2,32.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1913: krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1914: sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute // Ram_2,32.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:1915: sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa /
GE09ram_02pu:1916: taṃ tatyājāhitaṃ putraṃ tāsāṃ priyacikīrṣayā // Ram_2,32.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:1917: ity evam atyajad rājā sagaro vai sudhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1918: rāmaḥ kim akarot pāpaṃ yenaivam uparudhyate // Ram_2,32.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:1920: śokopahatayā vācā kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,32.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:1921: anuvrajiṣyāmy aham adya rāmaṃ rājyaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ dhanaṃ ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1922: sahaiva rājñā bharatena ca tvaṃ yathā sukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva cirāya rājyam //
GE09ram_02pu:1924: anvabhāṣata vākyaṃ tu vinayajño vinītavat // Ram_2,33.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1925: tyaktabhogasya me rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1926: kiṃ kāryam anuyātreṇa tyaktasaṅgasya sarvataḥ // Ram_2,33.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1927: yo hi dattvā dvipaśreṣṭhaṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kurute manaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1928: rajjusnehena kiṃ tasya tyajataḥ kuñjarottamam // Ram_2,33.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:1929: tathā mama satāṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ dhvajinyā jagatpate /
GE09ram_02pu:1930: sarvāṇy evānujānāmi cīrāṇy evānayantu me // Ram_2,33.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1932: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi vasato mama // Ram_2,33.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1933: atha cīrāṇi kaikeyī svayam āhṛtya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:1935: sa cīre puruṣavyāghraḥ kaikeyyāḥ pratigṛhya te /
GE09ram_02pu:1936: sūkṣmavastram avakṣipya munivastrāṇy avasta ha // Ram_2,33.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1937: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tatraiva vihāya vasane śubhe /
GE09ram_02pu:1938: tāpasāc chādane caiva jagrāha pitur agrataḥ // Ram_2,33.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1940: samīkṣya cīraṃ saṃtrastā pṛṣatī vāgurām iva // Ram_2,33.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1943: kathaṃ nu cīraṃ badhnanti munayo vanavāsinaḥ // Ram_2,33.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1944: kṛtvā kaṇṭhe ca sā cīram ekam ādāya pāṇinā /
GE09ram_02pu:1945: tasthau hy akuśalā tatra vrīḍitā janakātmajā // Ram_2,33.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1946: tasyās tat kṣipram āgamya rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1947: cīraṃ babandha sītāyāḥ kauśeyasyopari svayam // Ram_2,33.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1949: pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti // Ram_2,33.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:1950: sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1951: kaikeyi kuśacīreṇa na sītā gantum arhati // Ram_2,33.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1952: nanu paryāptam etat te pāpe rāmavivāsanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1953: kim ebhiḥ kṛpaṇair bhūyaḥ pātakair api te kṛtaiḥ // Ram_2,33.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1954: evaṃ bruvantaṃ pitaraṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1955: avākśirasam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,33.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1956: iyaṃ dhārmika kausalyā mama mātā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02pu:1957: vṛddhā cākṣudraśīlā ca na ca tvāṃ devagarhite // Ram_2,33.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1960: imāṃ mahendropamajātagarbhiṇīṃ tathā vidhātuṃ jananīṃ mamārhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:1961: yathā vanasthe mayi śokakarśitā na jīvitaṃ nyasya yamakṣayaṃ vrajet //
GE09ram_02pu:1962: rāmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā muniveṣadharaṃ ca tam /
GE09ram_02pu:1963: samīkṣya saha bhāryābhī rājā vigatacetanaḥ // Ram_2,34.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:1965: na cainam abhisamprekṣya pratyabhāṣata durmanāḥ // Ram_2,34.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:1966: sa muhūrtam ivāsaṃjño duḥkhitaś ca mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1968: manye khalu mayā pūrvaṃ vivatsā bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1969: prāṇino hiṃsitā vāpi tasmād idam upasthitam // Ram_2,34.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:1970: na tv evānāgate kāle dehāc cyavati jīvitam /
GE09ram_02pu:1971: kaikeyyā kliśyamānasya mṛtyur mama na vidyate // Ram_2,34.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:1973: vihāya vasane sūkṣme tāpasācchādam ātmajam // Ram_2,34.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:1974: ekasyāḥ khalu kaikeyyāḥ kṛte 'yaṃ kliśyate janaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1975: svārthe prayatamānāyāḥ saṃśritya nikṛtiṃ tv imām // Ram_2,34.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:1976: evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ bāṣpeṇa pihitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1977: rāmeti sakṛd evoktvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha // Ram_2,34.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:1978: saṃjñāṃ tu pratilabhyaiva muhūrtāt sa mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1979: netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sumantram idam abravīt // Ram_2,34.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:1980: aupavāhyaṃ rathaṃ yuktvā tvam āyāhi hayottamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1981: prāpayainaṃ mahābhāgam ito janapadāt param // Ram_2,34.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:1982: evaṃ manye guṇavatāṃ guṇānāṃ phalam ucyate /
GE09ram_02pu:1983: pitrā mātrā ca yat sādhur vīro nirvāsyate vanam // Ram_2,34.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:1985: yojayitvāyayau tatra ratham aśvair alaṃkṛtam // Ram_2,34.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:1989: uvāca deśakālajño niścitaṃ sarvataḥ śuci // Ram_2,34.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:1990: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:1991: varṣāṇy etāni saṃkhyāya vaidehyāḥ kṣipram ānaya // Ram_2,34.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:1992: narendreṇaivam uktas tu gatvā kośagṛhaṃ tataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:1993: prāyacchat sarvam āhṛtya sītāyai kṣipram eva tat // Ram_2,34.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:1994: sā sujātā sujātāni vaidehī prasthitā vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:1995: bhūṣayāmāsa gātrāṇi tair vicitrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ // Ram_2,34.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:1997: udyato 'ṃśumataḥ kāle khaṃ prabheva vivasvataḥ // Ram_2,34.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:1998: tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pariṣvajya śvaśrūr vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:1999: anācarantīṃ kṛpaṇaṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya maithilīm // Ram_2,34.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2002: sa tvayā nāvamantavyaḥ putraḥ pravrājito mama /
GE09ram_02pu:2003: tava daivatam astv eṣa nirdhanaḥ sadhano 'pi vā // Ram_2,34.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2005: kṛtāñjalir uvācedaṃ śvaśrūm abhimukhe sthitā // Ram_2,34.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2006: kariṣye sarvam evāham āryā yad anuśāsti mām /
GE09ram_02pu:2007: abhijñāsmi yathā bhartur vartitavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca me // Ram_2,34.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:2009: dharmād vicalituṃ nāham alaṃ candrād iva prabhā // Ram_2,34.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:2010: nātantrī vādyate vīṇā nācakro vartate rathaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2011: nāpatiḥ sukham edhate yā syād api śatātmajā // Ram_2,34.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:2012: mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2013: amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet // Ram_2,34.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:2015: ārye kim avamanyeyaṃ strīṇāṃ bhartā hi daivatam // Ram_2,34.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:2019: rāmaḥ paramadharmajño mātaraṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,34.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:2020: amba mā duḥkhitā bhūs tvaṃ paśya tvaṃ pitaraṃ mama /
GE09ram_02pu:2021: kṣayo hi vanavāsasya kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,34.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:2022: suptāyās te gamiṣyanti navavarṣāṇi pañca ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2023: sā samagram iha prāptaṃ māṃ drakṣyasi suhṛdvṛtam // Ram_2,34.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:2024: etāvad abhinītārtham uktvā sa jananīṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2025: trayaḥ śataśatārdhā hi dadarśāvekṣya mātaraḥ // Ram_2,34.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:2026: tāś cāpi sa tathaivārtā mātṝn daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2027: dharmayuktam idaṃ vākyaṃ nijagāda kṛtāñjaliḥ // Ram_2,34.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:2028: saṃvāsāt paruṣaṃ kiṃcid ajñānād vāpi yat kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:2029: tan me samanujānīta sarvāś cāmantrayāmi vaḥ // Ram_2,34.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:2030: jajñe 'tha tāsāṃ saṃnādaḥ krauñcīnām iva niḥsvanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2031: mānavendrasya bhāryāṇām evaṃ vadati rāghave // Ram_2,34.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:2033: vilapitaparidevanākulaṃ vyasanagataṃ tad abhūt suduḥkhitam // Ram_2,34.36
GE09ram_02pu:2034: atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2035: upasaṃgṛhya rājānaṃ cakrur dīnāḥ pradakṣiṇam // Ram_2,35.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2036: taṃ cāpi samanujñāpya dharmajñaḥ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02pu:2039: atha mātuḥ sumitrāyā jagrāha caraṇau punaḥ // Ram_2,35.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2040: taṃ vandamānaṃ rudatī mātā saumitrim abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:2041: hitakāmā mahābāhuṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya lakṣmaṇam // Ram_2,35.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2043: rāme pramādaṃ mā kārṣīḥ putra bhrātari gacchati // Ram_2,35.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2044: vyasanī vā samṛddho vā gatir eṣa tavānagha /
GE09ram_02pu:2045: eṣa loke satāṃ dharmo yaj jyeṣṭhavaśago bhavet // Ram_2,35.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2046: idaṃ hi vṛttam ucitaṃ kulasyāsya sanātanam /
GE09ram_02pu:2047: dānaṃ dīkṣā ca yajñeṣu tanutyāgo mṛdheṣu ca // Ram_2,35.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2048: rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām /
GE09ram_02pu:2049: ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi gaccha tāta yathāsukham // Ram_2,35.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2050: tataḥ sumantraḥ kākutsthaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:2051: vinīto vinayajñaś ca mātalir vāsavaṃ yathā // Ram_2,35.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2052: ratham āroha bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2053: kṣipraṃ tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi yatra māṃ rāma vakṣyasi // Ram_2,35.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2054: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyāni vane tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2055: tāny upakramitavyāni yāni devyāsi coditaḥ // Ram_2,35.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2056: taṃ rathaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ sītā hṛṣṭena cetasā /
GE09ram_02pu:2059: rathopasthe pratinyasya sacarmakaṭhinaṃ ca tat // Ram_2,35.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2061: sumantraḥ saṃmatān aśvān vāyuvegasamāñ jave // Ram_2,35.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2063: babhūva nagare mūrchā balamūrchā janasya ca // Ram_2,35.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2067: rāmam evābhidudrāva gharmārtaḥ salilaṃ yathā // Ram_2,35.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2069: bāṣpapūrṇamukhāḥ sarve tam ūcur bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ // Ram_2,35.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2070: saṃyaccha vājināṃ raśmīn sūta yāhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2071: mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi rāmasya durdarśaṃ no bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,35.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2073: yad devagarbhapratime vanaṃ yāti na bhidyate // Ram_2,35.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:2075: na jahāti ratā dharme merum arkaprabhā yathā // Ram_2,35.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2077: bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ yas tvaṃ paricariṣyasi // Ram_2,35.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2078: mahaty eṣā hi te siddhir eṣa cābhyudayo mahān /
GE09ram_02pu:2079: eṣa svargasya mārgaś ca yad enam anugacchasi /
GE09ram_02pu:2080: evaṃ vadantas te soḍhuṃ na śekur bāṣpam āgatam // Ram_2,35.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:2081: atha rājā vṛtaḥ strībhir dīnābhir dīnacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2082: nirjagāma priyaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīti bruvan gṛhāt // Ram_2,35.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:2084: yathā nādaḥ kareṇūnāṃ baddhe mahati kuñjare // Ram_2,35.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:2085: pitā ca rājā kākutsthaḥ śrīmān sannas tadā babhau /
GE09ram_02pu:2086: paripūrṇaḥ śaśī kāle graheṇopapluto yathā // Ram_2,35.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:2088: narāṇāṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ sīdantaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitam // Ram_2,35.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:2089: hā rāmeti janāḥ kecid rāmamāteti cāpare /
GE09ram_02pu:2090: antaḥpuraṃ samṛddhaṃ ca krośantaṃ paryadevayan // Ram_2,35.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:2095: dṛṣṭvā saṃcodayāmāsa śīghraṃ yāhīti sārathim // Ram_2,35.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:2096: na hi tat puruṣavyāghro duḥkhadaṃ darśanaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2097: mātuś ca sahituṃ śaktas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // Ram_2,35.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:2098: tathā rudantīṃ kausalyāṃ rathaṃ tam anudhāvatīm /
GE09ram_02pu:2099: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2100: asakṛt praikṣata tadā nṛtyantīm iva mātaram // Ram_2,35.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:2101: tiṣṭheti rājā cukrośa yāhi yāhīti rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2102: sumantrasya babhūvātmā cakrayor iva cāntarā // Ram_2,35.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:2104: ciraṃ duḥkhasya pāpiṣṭham iti rāmas tam abravīt // Ram_2,35.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:2105: rāmasya sa vacaḥ kurvann anujñāpya ca taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02pu:2106: vrajato 'pi hayāñ śīghraṃ codayāmāsa sārathiḥ // Ram_2,35.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:2107: nyavartata jano rājño rāmaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02pu:2108: manasāpy aśruvegaiś ca na nyavartata mānuṣam // Ram_2,35.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:2109: yam icchet punar āyāntaṃ nainaṃ dūram anuvrajet /
GE09ram_02pu:2110: ity amātyā mahārājam ūcur daśarathaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,35.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:2112: niśamya rājā kṛpaṇaḥ sabhāryo vyavasthitas taṃ sutam īkṣamāṇaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:2114: ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān // Ram_2,36.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2116: yo gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ cāsīt sa nāthaḥ kva nu gacchati // Ram_2,36.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2118: kruddhān prasādayan sarvān samaduḥkhaḥ kva gacchati // Ram_2,36.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2120: tathā yo vartate 'smāsu mahātmā kva nu gacchati // Ram_2,36.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2122: paritrātā janasyāsya jagataḥ kva nu gacchati // Ram_2,36.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2124: dharmyaṃ satyavrataṃ rāmaṃ vanavāse pravatsyati // Ram_2,36.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2125: iti sarvā mahiṣyas tā vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2126: ruruduś caiva duḥkhārtāḥ sasvaraṃ ca vicukruśuḥ // Ram_2,36.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2127: sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2130: vyasṛjan kavalān nāgā gāvo vatsān na pāyayan // Ram_2,36.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2132: dāruṇāḥ somam abhyetya grahāḥ sarve vyavasthitāḥ // Ram_2,36.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2134: viśākhāś ca sadhūmāś ca nabhasi pracakāśire // Ram_2,36.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2135: akasmān nāgaraḥ sarvo jano dainyam upāgamat /
GE09ram_02pu:2136: āhāre vā vihāre vā na kaścid akaron manaḥ // Ram_2,36.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2138: na hṛṣṭo lakṣyate kaścit sarvaḥ śokaparāyaṇaḥ // Ram_2,36.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2139: na vāti pavanaḥ śīto na śaśī saumyadarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2140: na sūryas tapate lokaṃ sarvaṃ paryākulaṃ jagat // Ram_2,36.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2141: anarthinaḥ sutāḥ strīṇāṃ bhartāro bhrātaras tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:2142: sarve sarvaṃ parityajya rāmam evānvacintayan // Ram_2,36.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2143: ye tu rāmasya suhṛdaḥ sarve te mūḍhacetasaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2144: śokabhāreṇa cākrāntāḥ śayanaṃ na jahus tadā // Ram_2,36.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:2145: tatas tv ayodhyā rahitā mahātmanā puraṃdareṇeva mahī saparvatā /
GE09ram_02pu:2146: cacāla ghoraṃ bhayabhārapīḍitā sanāgayodhāśvagaṇā nanāda ca // Ram_2,36.17
GE09ram_02pu:2147: yāvat tu niryatas tasya rajorūpam adṛśyata /
GE09ram_02pu:2149: yāvad rājā priyaṃ putraṃ paśyaty atyantadhārmikam /
GE09ram_02pu:2151: na paśyati rajo 'py asya yadā rāmasya bhūmipaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2152: tadārtaś ca viṣaṇṇaś ca papāta dharaṇītale // Ram_2,37.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2153: tasya dakṣiṇam anvagāt kausalyā bāhum aṅganā /
GE09ram_02pu:2154: vāmaṃ cāsyānvagāt pārśvaṃ kaikeyī bharatapriyā // Ram_2,37.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2155: tāṃ nayena ca sampanno dharmeṇa vinayena ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2156: uvāca rājā kaikeyīṃ samīkṣya vyathitendriyaḥ // Ram_2,37.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2157: kaikeyi mā mamāṅgāni sprākṣīs tvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī /
GE09ram_02pu:2158: na hi tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi na bhāryā na ca bāndhavī // Ram_2,37.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2159: ye ca tvām upajīvanti nāhaṃ teṣāṃ na te mama /
GE09ram_02pu:2160: kevalārthaparāṃ hi tvāṃ tyaktadharmāṃ tyajāmy aham // Ram_2,37.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2161: agṛhṇāṃ yac ca te pāṇim agniṃ paryaṇayaṃ ca yat /
GE09ram_02pu:2162: anujānāmi tat sarvam asmiṃl loke paratra ca // Ram_2,37.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2163: bharataś cet pratītaḥ syād rājyaṃ prāpyedam avyayam /
GE09ram_02pu:2164: yan me sa dadyāt pitrarthaṃ mā mā tad dattam āgamat // Ram_2,37.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2166: nyavartata tadā devī kausalyā śokakarśitā // Ram_2,37.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2167: hatveva brāhmaṇaṃ kāmāt spṛṣṭvāgnim iva pāṇinā /
GE09ram_02pu:2168: anvatapyata dharmātmā putraṃ saṃcintya tāpasam // Ram_2,37.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2170: rājño nātibabhau rūpaṃ grastasyāṃśumato yathā // Ram_2,37.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2171: vilalāpa ca duḥkhārtaḥ priyaṃ putram anusmaran /
GE09ram_02pu:2172: nagarāntam anuprāptaṃ buddhvā putram athābravīt // Ram_2,37.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2173: vāhanānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vahatāṃ taṃ mamātmajam /
GE09ram_02pu:2174: padāni pathi dṛśyante sa mahātmā na dṛśyate // Ram_2,37.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2175: sa nūnaṃ kvacid evādya vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2176: kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vāśmānam upadhāya śayiṣyate // Ram_2,37.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2180: rāmam utthāya gacchantaṃ lokanātham anāthavat // Ram_2,37.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2181: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi vidhavā rājyam āvasa /
GE09ram_02pu:2182: na hi taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vinā jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,37.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2187: tām avekṣya purīṃ sarvāṃ rāmam evānucintayan /
GE09ram_02pu:2188: vilapan prāviśad rājā gṛhaṃ sūrya ivāmbudam // Ram_2,37.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2190: rāmeṇa rahitaṃ veśma vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_2,37.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2191: kausalyāyā gṛhaṃ śīghraṃ rāmamātur nayantu mām /
GE09ram_02pu:2192: iti bruvantaṃ rājānam anayan dvāradarśinaḥ // Ram_2,37.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:2194: adhiruhyāpi śayanaṃ babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,37.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:2195: tac ca dṛṣṭvā mahārājo bhujam udyamya vīryavān /
GE09ram_02pu:2196: uccaiḥ svareṇa cukrośa hā rāghava jahāsi mām // Ram_2,37.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:2197: sukhitā bata taṃ kālaṃ jīviṣyanti narottamāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2198: pariṣvajanto ye rāmaṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // Ram_2,37.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:2199: na tvāṃ paśyāmi kausalye sādhu māṃ pāṇinā spṛśa /
GE09ram_02pu:2200: rāmaṃ me 'nugatā dṛṣṭir adyāpi na nivartate // Ram_2,37.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:2201: taṃ rāmam evānuvicintayantaṃ samīkṣya devī śayane narendram /
GE09ram_02pu:2202: upopaviśyādhikam ārtarūpā viniḥśvasantī vilalāpa kṛcchram // Ram_2,37.28
GE09ram_02pu:2203: tataḥ samīkṣya śayane sannaṃ śokena pārthivam /
GE09ram_02pu:2204: kausalyā putraśokārtā tam uvāca mahīpatim // Ram_2,38.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2206: vicariṣyati kaikeyī nirmukteva hi pannagī // Ram_2,38.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2208: trāsayiṣyati māṃ bhūyo duṣṭāhir iva veśmani // Ram_2,38.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2209: atha sma nagare rāmaś caran bhaikṣaṃ gṛhe vaset /
GE09ram_02pu:2210: kāmakāro varaṃ dātum api dāsaṃ mamātmajam // Ram_2,38.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2211: pātayitvā tu kaikeyyā rāmaṃ sthānād yatheṣṭataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2214: vanam āviśate nūnaṃ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,38.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2216: tyaktānāṃ vanavāsāya kā nv avasthā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,38.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2218: kathaṃ vatsyanti kṛpaṇāḥ phalamūlaiḥ kṛtāśanāḥ // Ram_2,38.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2219: apīdānīṃ sa kālaḥ syān mama śokakṣayaḥ śivaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2220: sabhāryaṃ yat saha bhrātrā paśyeyam iha rāghavam // Ram_2,38.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2224: nandiṣyati purī hṛṣṭā samudra iva parvaṇi // Ram_2,38.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2226: puraskṛtya rathe sītāṃ vṛṣabho govadhūm iva // Ram_2,38.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2229: kadā sumanasaḥ kanyā dvijātīnāṃ phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2230: pradiśantyaḥ purīṃ hṛṣṭāḥ kariṣyanti pradakṣiṇam // Ram_2,38.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2232: abhyupaiṣyati dharmajñas trivarṣa iva māṃ lalan // Ram_2,38.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2233: niḥsaṃśayaṃ mayā manye purā vīra kadaryayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2234: pātu kāmeṣu vatseṣu mātṝṇāṃ śātitāḥ stanāḥ // Ram_2,38.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:2235: sāhaṃ gaur iva siṃhena vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā /
GE09ram_02pu:2236: kaikeyyā puruṣavyāghra bālavatseva gaur balāt // Ram_2,38.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2237: na hi tāvad guṇair juṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam /
GE09ram_02pu:2238: ekaputrā vinā putram ahaṃ jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,38.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2239: na hi me jīvite kiṃcit sāmarthyam iha kalpyate /
GE09ram_02pu:2240: apaśyantyāḥ priyaṃ putraṃ mahābāhuṃ mahābalam // Ram_2,38.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2241: ayaṃ hi māṃ dīpayate samutthitas tanūjaśokaprabhavo hutāśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2242: mahīm imāṃ raśmibhir uttamaprabho yathā nidāghe bhagavān divākaraḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:2243: vilapantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu kausalyāṃ pramadottamām /
GE09ram_02pu:2244: idaṃ dharme sthitā dharmyaṃ sumitrā vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,39.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2245: tavārye sadguṇair yuktaḥ putraḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2246: kiṃ te vilapitenaivaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ruditena vā // Ram_2,39.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2247: yas tavārye gataḥ putras tyaktvā rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2248: sādhu kurvan mahātmānaṃ pitaraṃ satyavādinām // Ram_2,39.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2249: śiṣṭair ācarite samyak śaśvat pretya phalodaye /
GE09ram_02pu:2250: rāmo dharme sthitaḥ śreṣṭho na sa śocyaḥ kadācana // Ram_2,39.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2252: dayāvān sarvabhūteṣu lābhas tasya mahātmanaḥ // Ram_2,39.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2253: araṇyavāse yad duḥkhaṃ jānatī vai sukhocitā /
GE09ram_02pu:2255: kīrtibhūtāṃ patākāṃ yo loke bhrāmayati prabhuḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2256: damasatyavrataparaḥ kiṃ na prāptas tavātmajaḥ // Ram_2,39.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2257: vyaktaṃ rāmasya vijñāya śaucaṃ māhātmyam uttamam /
GE09ram_02pu:2258: na gātram aṃśubhiḥ sūryaḥ saṃtāpayitum arhati // Ram_2,39.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2262: raśmibhiḥ saṃspṛśañ śītaiś candramā hlādayiṣyati // Ram_2,39.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2263: dadau cāstrāṇi divyāni yasmai brahmā mahaujase /
GE09ram_02pu:2264: dānavendraṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā timidhvajasutaṃ raṇe // Ram_2,39.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2265: pṛthivyā saha vaidehyā śriyā ca puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2266: kṣipraṃ tisṛbhir etābhiḥ saha rāmo 'bhiṣekṣyate // Ram_2,39.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2267: duḥkhajaṃ visṛjanty asraṃ niṣkrāmantam udīkṣya yam /
GE09ram_02pu:2268: samutsrakṣyasi netrābhyāṃ kṣipram ānandajaṃ payaḥ // Ram_2,39.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2270: mudāśru mokṣyase kṣipraṃ meghalekheva vārṣikī // Ram_2,39.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2271: putras te varadaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2273: niśamya tal lakṣmaṇamātṛvākyaṃ rāmasya mātur naradevapatnyāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2274: sadyaḥ śarīre vinanāśa śokaḥ śaradgato megha ivālpatoyaḥ // Ram_2,39.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:2276: anujagmuḥ prayāntaṃ taṃ vanavāsāya mānavāḥ // Ram_2,40.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2277: nivartite 'pi ca balāt suhṛdvarge ca rājani /
GE09ram_02pu:2278: naiva te saṃnyavartanta rāmasyānugatā ratham // Ram_2,40.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2280: babhūva guṇasampannaḥ pūrṇacandra iva priyaḥ // Ram_2,40.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2281: sa yācyamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ svābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:2282: kurvāṇaḥ pitaraṃ satyaṃ vanam evānvapadyata // Ram_2,40.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2284: uvāca rāmaḥ snehena tāḥ prajāḥ svāḥ prajā iva // Ram_2,40.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2285: yā prītir bahumānaś ca mayy ayodhyānivāsinām /
GE09ram_02pu:2286: matpriyārthaṃ viśeṣeṇa bharate sā niveśyatām // Ram_2,40.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2288: kariṣyati yathāvad vaḥ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // Ram_2,40.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2290: anurūpaḥ sa vo bhartā bhaviṣyati bhayāpahaḥ // Ram_2,40.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2291: sa hi rājaguṇair yukto yuvarājaḥ samīkṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2292: api cāpi mayā śiṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ vo bhartṛśāsanam // Ram_2,40.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2293: na ca tapyed yathā cāsau vanavāsaṃ gate mayi /
GE09ram_02pu:2294: mahārājas tathā kāryo mama priyacikīrṣayā // Ram_2,40.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2296: tathā tathā prakṛtayo rāmaṃ patim akāmayan // Ram_2,40.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2297: bāṣpeṇa pihitaṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02pu:2298: cakarṣeva guṇair baddhvā janaṃ punar ivāsanam // Ram_2,40.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2299: te dvijās trividhaṃ vṛddhā jñānena vayasaujasā /
GE09ram_02pu:2300: vayaḥprakampaśiraso dūrād ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,40.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2301: vahanto javanā rāmaṃ bho bho jātyās turaṃgamāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2302: nivartadhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ hitā bhavata bhartari /
GE09ram_02pu:2303: upavāhyas tu vo bhartā nāpavāhyaḥ purād vanam // Ram_2,40.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2304: evam ārtapralāpāṃs tān vṛddhān pralapato dvijān /
GE09ram_02pu:2305: avekṣya sahasā rāmo rathād avatatāra ha // Ram_2,40.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2308: dvijātīṃs tu padātīṃs tān rāmaś cāritravatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2309: na śaśāka ghṛṇācakṣuḥ parimoktuṃ rathena saḥ // Ram_2,40.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2310: gacchantam eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ saṃbhrāntamānasāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2311: ūcuḥ paramasaṃtaptā rāmaṃ vākyam idaṃ dvijāḥ // Ram_2,40.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2312: brāhmaṇyaṃ kṛtsnam etat tvāṃ brahmaṇyam anugacchati /
GE09ram_02pu:2313: dvijaskandhādhirūḍhās tvām agnayo 'py anuyānty amī // Ram_2,40.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2317: ebhiś chāyāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svaiś chattrair vājapeyikaiḥ // Ram_2,40.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2318: yā hi naḥ satataṃ buddhir vedamantrānusāriṇī /
GE09ram_02pu:2319: tvatkṛte sā kṛtā vatsa vanavāsānusāriṇī // Ram_2,40.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2320: hṛdayeṣv avatiṣṭhante vedā ye naḥ paraṃ dhanam /
GE09ram_02pu:2321: vatsyanty api gṛheṣv eva dārāś cāritrarakṣitāḥ // Ram_2,40.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:2322: na punar niścayaḥ kāryas tvadgatau sukṛtā matiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2323: tvayi dharmavyapekṣe tu kiṃ syād dharmam avekṣitum // Ram_2,40.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:2326: bahūnāṃ vitatā yajñā dvijānāṃ ya ihāgatāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2327: teṣāṃ samāptir āyattā tava vatsa nivartane // Ram_2,40.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:2329: yācamāneṣu teṣu tvaṃ bhaktiṃ bhakteṣu darśaya // Ram_2,40.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:2335: dadṛśe tamasā tatra vārayantīva rāghavam // Ram_2,40.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:2336: tatas tu tamasā tīraṃ ramyam āśritya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2337: sītām udvīkṣya saumitrim idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,41.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2338: iyam adya niśā pūrvā saumitre prasthitā vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:2339: vanavāsasya bhadraṃ te sa notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // Ram_2,41.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2342: adyāyodhyā tu nagarī rājadhānī pitur mama /
GE09ram_02pu:2343: sastrīpuṃsā gatān asmāñ śociṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,41.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2344: bharataḥ khalu dharmātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca me /
GE09ram_02pu:2347: nānuśocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,41.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2348: tvayā kāryaṃ naravyāghra mām anuvrajatā kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:2349: anveṣṭavyā hi vaidehyā rakṣaṇārthe sahāyatā // Ram_2,41.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2350: adbhir eva tu saumitre vatsyāmy adya niśām imām /
GE09ram_02pu:2351: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ vanye 'pi vividhe sati // Ram_2,41.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2352: evam uktvā tu saumitraṃ sumantram api rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2353: apramattas tvam aśveṣu bhava saumyety uvāca ha // Ram_2,41.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2356: upāsyatu śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrim upasthitām /
GE09ram_02pu:2357: rāmasya śayanaṃ cakre sūtaḥ saumitriṇā saha // Ram_2,41.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2358: tāṃ śayyāṃ tamasātīre vīkṣya vṛkṣadalaiḥ kṛtām /
GE09ram_02pu:2359: rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃviveśa ha // Ram_2,41.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2360: sabhāryaṃ saṃprasuptaṃ taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2361: kathayāmāsa sūtāya rāmasya vividhān guṇān // Ram_2,41.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2362: jāgrato hy eva tāṃ rātriṃ saumitrer udito raviḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2363: sūtasya tamasātīre rāmasya bruvato guṇān // Ram_2,41.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2365: avasat tatra tāṃ rātriṃ rāmaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha // Ram_2,41.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2366: utthāya tu mahātejāḥ prakṛtīs tā niśāmya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2367: abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam // Ram_2,41.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:2369: vṛkṣamūleṣu saṃsuptān paśya lakṣmaṇa sāmpratam // Ram_2,41.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2371: api prāṇān asiṣyanti na tu tyakṣyanti niścayam // Ram_2,41.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2372: yāvad eva tu saṃsuptās tāvad eva vayaṃ laghu /
GE09ram_02pu:2373: ratham āruhya gacchāmaḥ panthānam akutobhayam // Ram_2,41.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2375: svapeyur anuraktā māṃ vṛkṣamūlāni saṃśritāḥ // Ram_2,41.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:2376: paurā hy ātmakṛtād duḥkhād vipramocyā nṛpātmajaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2377: na tu khalv ātmanā yojyā duḥkhena puravāsinaḥ // Ram_2,41.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2378: abravīl lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ sākṣād dharmam iva sthitam /
GE09ram_02pu:2379: rocate me mahāprājña kṣipram āruhyatām iti // Ram_2,41.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2380: sūtas tataḥ saṃtvaritaḥ syandanaṃ tair hayottamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2382: mohanārthaṃ tu paurāṇāṃ sūtaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2383: udaṅmukhaḥ prayāhi tvaṃ ratham āsthāya sārathe // Ram_2,41.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:2384: muhūrtaṃ tvaritaṃ gatvā nirvartaya rathaṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2385: yathā na vidyuḥ paurā māṃ tathā kuru samāhitaḥ // Ram_2,41.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:2386: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre sa sārathiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2387: pratyāgamya ca rāmasya syandanaṃ pratyavedayat // Ram_2,41.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:2389: śīghragām ākulāvartāṃ tamasām ataran nadīm // Ram_2,41.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:2390: sa saṃtīrya mahābāhuḥ śrīmāñ śivam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02pu:2392: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurās te rāghavaṃ vinā /
GE09ram_02pu:2395: ālokam api rāmasya na paśyanti sma duḥkhitāḥ // Ram_2,41.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:2396: tato mārgānusāreṇa gatvā kiṃcit kṣaṇaṃ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2399: kim idaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daivenopahatā iti // Ram_2,41.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:2401: ayodhyām agaman sarve purīṃ vyathitasajjanām // Ram_2,41.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:2404: svaṃ svaṃ nilayam āgamya putradāraiḥ samāvṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2405: aśrūṇi mumucuḥ sarve bāṣpeṇa pihitānanāḥ // Ram_2,42.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2406: na cāhṛṣyan na cāmodan vaṇijo na prasārayan /
GE09ram_02pu:2407: na cāśobhanta paṇyāni nāpacan gṛhamedhinaḥ // Ram_2,42.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2408: naṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhyanandan vipulaṃ vā dhanāgamam /
GE09ram_02pu:2409: putraṃ prathamajaṃ labdhvā jananī nābhyanandata // Ram_2,42.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2410: gṛhe gṛhe rudantyaś ca bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:2411: vyagarhayanta duḥkhārtā vāgbhis totrair iva dvipān // Ram_2,42.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2412: kiṃ nu teṣāṃ gṛhaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ dāraiḥ kiṃ dhanena vā /
GE09ram_02pu:2413: putrair vā kiṃ sukhair vāpi ye na paśyanti rāghavam // Ram_2,42.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2414: ekaḥ satpuruṣo loke lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2415: yo 'nugacchati kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ paricaran vane // Ram_2,42.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2416: āpagāḥ kṛtapuṇyās tāḥ padminyaś ca sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2417: yeṣu snāsyati kākutstho vigāhya salilaṃ śuci // Ram_2,42.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2419: āpagāś ca mahānūpāḥ sānumantaś ca parvatāḥ // Ram_2,42.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2420: kānanaṃ vāpi śailaṃ vā yaṃ rāmo 'bhigamiṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:2421: priyātithim iva prāptaṃ nainaṃ śakṣyanty anarcitum // Ram_2,42.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2423: akāle cāpi mukhyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2424: darśayiṣyanty anukrośād girayo rāmam āgatam // Ram_2,42.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2425: vidarśayanto vividhān bhūyaś citrāṃś ca nirjharān /
GE09ram_02pu:2427: yatra rāmo bhayaṃ nātra nāsti tatra parābhavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2428: sa hi śūro mahābāhuḥ putro daśarathasya ca // Ram_2,42.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2429: purā bhavati no dūrād anugacchāma rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:2431: sa hi nātho janasyāsya sa gatiḥ sa parāyaṇam // Ram_2,42.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2432: vayaṃ paricariṣyāmaḥ sītāṃ yūyaṃ tu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:2433: iti paurastriyo bhartṝn duḥkhārtās tat tad abruvan // Ram_2,42.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2438: kaikeyyā yadi ced rājyaṃ syād adharmyam anāthavat /
GE09ram_02pu:2439: na hi no jīvitenārthaḥ kutaḥ putraiḥ kuto dhanaiḥ // Ram_2,42.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2440: yayā putraś ca bhartā ca tyaktāv aiśvaryakāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02pu:2441: kaṃ sā parihared anyaṃ kaikeyī kulapāṃsanī // Ram_2,42.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2442: kaikeyyā na vayaṃ rājye bhṛtakā nivasema hi /
GE09ram_02pu:2443: jīvantyā jātu jīvantyaḥ putrair api śapāmahe // Ram_2,42.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:2445: kas tāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ jīved adharmyāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm // Ram_2,42.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2446: na hi pravrajite rāme jīviṣyati mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2447: mṛte daśarathe vyaktaṃ vilopas tadanantaram // Ram_2,42.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2449: rāghavaṃ vānugacchadhvam aśrutiṃ vāpi gacchata // Ram_2,42.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:2451: bharate saṃnisṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ saunike paśavo yathā // Ram_2,42.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:2452: tās tathā vilapantyas tu nagare nāgarastriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2453: cukruśur bhṛśasaṃtaptā mṛtyor iva bhayāgame // Ram_2,42.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:2454: tathā striyo rāmanimittam āturā yathā sute bhrātari vā vivāsite /
GE09ram_02pu:2455: vilapya dīnā rurudur vicetasaḥ sutair hi tāsām adhiko hi so 'bhavat //
GE09ram_02pu:2457: jagāma puruṣavyāghraḥ pitur ājñām anusmaran // Ram_2,43.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2458: tathaiva gacchatas tasya vyapāyād rajanī śivā /
GE09ram_02pu:2459: upāsya sa śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ viṣayāntaṃ vyagāhata // Ram_2,43.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2460: grāmān vikṛṣṭasīmāṃs tān puṣpitāni vanāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2461: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ śarair iva hayottamaiḥ // Ram_2,43.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2463: rājānaṃ dhig daśarathaṃ kāmasya vaśam āgatam // Ram_2,43.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2465: tīkṣṇā saṃbhinnamaryādā tīkṣṇe karmaṇi vartate // Ram_2,43.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2466: yā putram īdṛśaṃ rājñaḥ pravāsayati dhārmikam /
GE09ram_02pu:2469: śṛṇvann atiyayau vīraḥ kosalān kosaleśvaraḥ // Ram_2,43.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2472: gatvā tu suciraṃ kālaṃ tataḥ śītajalāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02pu:2474: gomatīṃ cāpy atikramya rāghavaḥ śīghragair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2476: sa mahīṃ manunā rājñā dattām ikṣvākave purā /
GE09ram_02pu:2477: sphītāṃ rāṣṭrāvṛtāṃ rāmo vaidehīm anvadarśayat // Ram_2,43.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2478: sūta ity eva cābhāṣya sārathiṃ tam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2480: kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane /
GE09ram_02pu:2481: mṛgayāṃ paryaṭiṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ // Ram_2,43.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2483: ratir hy eṣātulā loke rājarṣigaṇasaṃmatā // Ram_2,43.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2484: sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā /
GE09ram_02pu:2485: taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayau vākyam udīrayan // Ram_2,43.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2489: dadarśa rāghavo gaṅgāṃ puṇyām ṛṣiniṣevitām // Ram_2,44.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2491: śiśumāraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām // Ram_2,44.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2493: sumantram abravīt sūtam ihaivādya vasāmahe // Ram_2,44.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2496: lakṣaṇaś ca sumantraś ca bāḍham ity eva rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:2497: uktvā tam iṅgudīvṛkṣaṃ tadopayayatur hayaiḥ // Ram_2,44.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2499: rathād avātarat tasmāt sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,44.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2502: tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā /
GE09ram_02pu:2503: niṣādajātyo balavān sthapatiś ceti viśrutaḥ // Ram_2,44.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2504: sa śrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ rāmaṃ viṣayam āgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:2505: vṛddhaiḥ parivṛto 'mātyair jñātibhiś cāpy upāgataḥ // Ram_2,44.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2507: saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ samāgacchad guhena saḥ // Ram_2,44.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2508: tam ārtaḥ sampariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:2509: yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te // Ram_2,44.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2511: arghyaṃ copānayat kṣipraṃ vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // Ram_2,44.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2512: svāgataṃ te mahābāho taveyam akhilā mahī /
GE09ram_02pu:2513: vayaṃ preṣyā bhavān bhartā sādhu rājyaṃ praśādhi naḥ // Ram_2,44.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2514: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca lehyaṃ cedam upasthitam /
GE09ram_02pu:2515: śayanāni ca mukhyāni vājināṃ khādanaṃ ca te // Ram_2,44.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2516: guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02pu:2517: arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam // Ram_2,44.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:2519: bhujābhyāṃ sādhuvṛttābhyāṃ pīḍayan vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,44.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2520: diṣṭyā tvāṃ guha paśyāmi arogaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2521: api te kuśalaṃ rāṣṭre mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca // Ram_2,44.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2522: yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃcit prītyā samupakalpitam /
GE09ram_02pu:2523: sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe // Ram_2,44.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2525: viddhi praṇihitaṃ dharme tāpasaṃ vanagocaram // Ram_2,44.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:2528: ete hi dayitā rājñaḥ pitur daśarathasya me /
GE09ram_02pu:2529: etaiḥ suvihitair aśvair bhaviṣyāmy aham arcitaḥ // Ram_2,44.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2530: aśvānāṃ pratipānaṃ ca khādanaṃ caiva so 'nvaśāt /
GE09ram_02pu:2531: guhas tatraiva puruṣāṃs tvaritaṃ dīyatām iti // Ram_2,44.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:2533: jalam evādade bhojyaṃ lakṣmaṇenāhṛtaṃ svayam // Ram_2,44.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:2534: tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2535: sabhāryasya tato 'bhyetya tasthau vṛkṣam upāśritaḥ // Ram_2,44.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:2537: anvajāgrat tato rāmam apramatto dhanurdharaḥ // Ram_2,44.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:2538: tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2539: adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī //
GE09ram_02pu:2540: taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_02pu:2541: guhaḥ saṃtāpasaṃtapto rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,45.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2542: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā /
GE09ram_02pu:2543: pratyāśvasihi sādhv asyāṃ rājaputra yathāsukham // Ram_2,45.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2544: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2545: guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmaḥ kākutsthasya vayaṃ niśām // Ram_2,45.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2546: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana /
GE09ram_02pu:2547: bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape // Ram_2,45.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2548: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2549: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // Ram_2,45.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2550: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2551: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvato jñātibhiḥ saha // Ram_2,45.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2552: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02pu:2553: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ sumahat prasahemahi // Ram_2,45.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2555: nātra bhītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // Ram_2,45.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2556: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2557: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // Ram_2,45.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2558: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi /
GE09ram_02pu:2559: taṃ paśya sukhasaṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // Ram_2,45.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2560: yo mantratapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2562: asmin pravrajito rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:2563: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,45.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2566: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama /
GE09ram_02pu:2567: nāśaṃse yadi jīvanti sarve te śarvarīm imām // Ram_2,45.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2568: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2569: tad duḥkhaṃ yat tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,45.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2573: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,45.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2574: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite /
GE09ram_02pu:2581: sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // Ram_2,45.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2586: tathā hi satyaṃ bruvati prajāhite narendraputre gurusauhṛdād guhaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2587: mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyasanābhipīḍito jvarāturo nāga iva vyathāturaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:2589: uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam // Ram_2,46.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2591: asau sukṛṣṇo vihagaḥ kokilas tāta kūjati // Ram_2,46.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2592: barhiṇānāṃ ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate nadatāṃ vane /
GE09ram_02pu:2593: tarāma jāhnavīṃ saumya śīghragāṃ sāgaraṃgamām // Ram_2,46.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2595: guham āmantrya sūtaṃ ca so 'tiṣṭhad bhrātur agrataḥ // Ram_2,46.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2596: tataḥ kalāpān saṃnahya khaḍgau baddhvā ca dhanvinau /
GE09ram_02pu:2597: jagmatur yena tau gaṅgāṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // Ram_2,46.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2598: rāmam eva tu dharmajñam upagamya vinītavat /
GE09ram_02pu:2599: kim ahaṃ karavāṇīti sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // Ram_2,46.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2601: yānaṃ vihāya padbhyāṃ tu gamiṣyāmo mahāvanam // Ram_2,46.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2602: ātmānaṃ tv abhyanujñātam avekṣyārtaḥ sa sārathiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2603: sumantraḥ puruṣavyāghram aikṣvākam idam abravīt // Ram_2,46.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2605: tava sabhrātṛbhāryasya vāsaḥ prākṛtavad vane // Ram_2,46.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2606: na manye brahmacarye 'sti svadhīte vā phalodayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2607: mārdavārjavayor vāpi tvāṃ ced vyasanam āgatam // Ram_2,46.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2608: saha rāghava vaidehyā bhrātrā caiva vane vasan /
GE09ram_02pu:2609: tvaṃ gatiṃ prāpsyase vīra trīṃl lokāṃs tu jayann iva // Ram_2,46.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2610: vayaṃ khalu hatā rāma ye tayāpy upavañcitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2611: kaikeyyā vaśam eṣyāmaḥ pāpāyā duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Ram_2,46.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2612: iti bruvann ātmasamaṃ sumantraḥ sārathis tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:2613: dṛṣṭvā dūragataṃ rāmaṃ duḥkhārto rurude ciram // Ram_2,46.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2614: tatas tu vigate bāṣpe sūtaṃ spṛṣṭodakaṃ śucim /
GE09ram_02pu:2615: rāmas tu madhuraṃ vākyaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca tam // Ram_2,46.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2617: yathā daśaratho rājā māṃ na śocet tathā kuru // Ram_2,46.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2619: kāmabhārāvasannaś ca tasmād etad bravīmi te // Ram_2,46.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:2620: yad yad ājñāpayet kiṃcit sa mahātmā mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2621: kaikeyyāḥ priyakāmārthaṃ kāryaṃ tad avikāṅkṣayā // Ram_2,46.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2623: yad eṣāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mano na pratihanyate // Ram_2,46.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2624: tad yathā sa mahārājo nālīkam adhigacchati /
GE09ram_02pu:2625: na ca tāmyati duḥkhena sumantra kuru tat tathā // Ram_2,46.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2627: brūyās tvam abhivādyaiva mama hetor idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,46.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:2628: naivāham anuśocāmi lakṣmaṇo na ca maithilī /
GE09ram_02pu:2629: ayodhyāyāś cyutāś ceti vane vatsyāmaheti vā // Ram_2,46.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2631: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca drakṣyasi kṣipram āgatān // Ram_2,46.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2632: evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ mātaraṃ ca sumantra me /
GE09ram_02pu:2633: anyāś ca devīḥ sahitāḥ kaikeyīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,46.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:2635: sītāyā mama cāryasya vacanāl lakṣmaṇasya ca // Ram_2,46.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:2636: brūyāś ca hi mahārājaṃ bharataṃ kṣipram ānaya /
GE09ram_02pu:2637: āgataś cāpi bharataḥ sthāpyo nṛpamate pade // Ram_2,46.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:2639: asmatsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na tvām abhibhaviṣyati // Ram_2,46.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:2640: bharataś cāpi vaktavyo yathā rājani vartase /
GE09ram_02pu:2641: tathā mātṛṣu vartethāḥ sarvāsv evāviśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,46.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:2642: yathā ca tava kaikeyī sumitrā cāviśeṣataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2643: tathaiva devī kausalyā mama mātā viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,46.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:2645: tat sarvaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā snehāt kākutstham abravīt // Ram_2,46.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:2646: yad ahaṃ nopacāreṇa brūyāṃ snehād aviklavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2647: bhaktimān iti tat tāvad vākyaṃ tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // Ram_2,46.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:2648: kathaṃ hi tvadvihīno 'haṃ pratiyāsyāmi tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02pu:2649: tava tāta viyogena putraśokākulām iva // Ram_2,46.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:2650: sarāmam api tāvan me rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2651: vinā rāmaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidīryetāpi sā purī // Ram_2,46.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:2652: dainyaṃ hi nagarī gacched dṛṣṭvā śūnyam imaṃ ratham /
GE09ram_02pu:2653: sūtāvaśeṣaṃ svaṃ sainyaṃ hatavīram ivāhave // Ram_2,46.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:2655: cintayantyo 'dya nūnaṃ tvāṃ nirāhārāḥ kṛtāḥ prajāḥ // Ram_2,46.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:2656: ārtanādo hi yaḥ paurair muktas tadvipravāsane /
GE09ram_02pu:2657: rathasthaṃ māṃ niśāmyaiva kuryuḥ śataguṇaṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,46.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:2658: ahaṃ kiṃ cāpi vakṣyāmi devīṃ tava suto mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2659: nīto 'sau mātulakulaṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kṛthā iti // Ram_2,46.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:2660: asatyam api naivāhaṃ brūyāṃ vacanam īdṛśam /
GE09ram_02pu:2661: katham apriyam evāhaṃ brūyāṃ satyam idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,46.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:2663: kathaṃ rathaṃ tvayā hīnaṃ pravakṣyanti hayottamāḥ // Ram_2,46.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:2664: yadi me yācamānasya tyāgam eva kariṣyasi /
GE09ram_02pu:2665: saratho 'gniṃ pravekṣyāmi tyaktamātra iha tvayā // Ram_2,46.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:2667: rathena pratibādhiṣye tāni sattvāni rāghava // Ram_2,46.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:2668: tvatkṛte na mayā prāptaṃ rathacaryākṛtaṃ sukham /
GE09ram_02pu:2671: prītyābhihitam icchāmi bhava me patyanantaraḥ // Ram_2,46.42 //
GE09ram_02pu:2672: tava śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā kariṣyāmi vane vasan /
GE09ram_02pu:2673: ayodhyāṃ devalokaṃ vā sarvathā prajahāmy aham // Ram_2,46.43 //
GE09ram_02pu:2674: na hi śakyā praveṣṭuṃ sā mayāyodhyā tvayā vinā /
GE09ram_02pu:2676: ime cāpi hayā vīra yadi te vanavāsinaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2677: paricaryāṃ kariṣyanti prāpsyanti paramāṃ gatim // Ram_2,46.45 //
GE09ram_02pu:2678: vanavāse kṣayaṃ prāpte mamaiṣa hi manorathaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2679: yad anena rathenaiva tvāṃ vaheyaṃ purīṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,46.46 //
GE09ram_02pu:2680: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi sahitasya tvayā vane /
GE09ram_02pu:2681: kṣaṇabhūtāni yāsyanti śataśas tu tato 'nyathā // Ram_2,46.47 //
GE09ram_02pu:2683: bhaktaṃ bhṛtyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ tvaṃ na māṃ hātum arhasi // Ram_2,46.48
GE09ram_02pu:2684: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dīnaṃ yācamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2685: rāmo bhṛtyānukampī tu sumantram idam abravīt // Ram_2,46.49 //
GE09ram_02pu:2686: jānāmi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ mayi te bhartṛvatsala /
GE09ram_02pu:2687: śṛṇu cāpi yadarthaṃ tvāṃ preṣayāmi purīm itaḥ // Ram_2,46.50 //
GE09ram_02pu:2688: nagarīṃ tvāṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā jananī me yavīyasī /
GE09ram_02pu:2689: kaikeyī pratyayaṃ gacched iti rāmo vanaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,46.51 //
GE09ram_02pu:2690: parituṣṭā hi sā devī vanavāsaṃ gate mayi /
GE09ram_02pu:2692: eṣa me prathamaḥ kalpo yad ambā me yavīyasī /
GE09ram_02pu:2694: mama priyārthaṃ rājñaś ca sarathas tvaṃ purīṃ vraja /
GE09ram_02pu:2695: saṃdiṣṭaś cāsi yānarthāṃs tāṃs tān brūyās tathātathā // Ram_2,46.54 //
GE09ram_02pu:2696: ity uktvā vacanaṃ sūtaṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2697: guhaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ rāmo hetumad abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:2698: jaṭāḥ kṛtvā gamiṣyāmi nyagrodhakṣīram ānaya // Ram_2,46.55 //
GE09ram_02pu:2699: tat kṣīraṃ rājaputrāya guhaḥ kṣipram upāharat /
GE09ram_02pu:2700: lakṣmaṇasyātmanaś caiva rāmas tenākaroj jaṭāḥ // Ram_2,46.56 //
GE09ram_02pu:2704: vratam ādiṣṭavān rāmaḥ sahāyaṃ guham abravīt // Ram_2,46.58 //
GE09ram_02pu:2705: apramatto bale kośe durge janapade tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:2706: bhavethā guha rājyaṃ hi durārakṣatamaṃ matam // Ram_2,46.59 //
GE09ram_02pu:2708: jagāma tūrṇam avyagraḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,46.60 //
GE09ram_02pu:2709: sa tu dṛṣṭvā nadītīre nāvam ikṣvākunandanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2710: titīrṣuḥ śīghragāṃ gaṅgām idaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_2,46.61 //
GE09ram_02pu:2711: āroha tvaṃ naravyāghra sthitāṃ nāvam imāṃ śanaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2713: sa bhrātuḥ śāsanaṃ śrutvā sarvam apratikūlayan /
GE09ram_02pu:2714: āropya maithilīṃ pūrvam ārurohātmavāṃs tataḥ // Ram_2,46.63 //
GE09ram_02pu:2716: tato niṣādādhipatir guho jñātīn acodayat // Ram_2,46.64 //
GE09ram_02pu:2717: anujñāya sumantraṃ ca sabalaṃ caiva taṃ guham /
GE09ram_02pu:2718: āsthāya nāvaṃ rāmas tu codayāmāsa nāvikān // Ram_2,46.65 //
GE09ram_02pu:2719: tatas taiś coditā sā nauḥ karṇadhārasamāhitā /
GE09ram_02pu:2721: madhyaṃ tu samanuprāpya bhāgīrathyās tv aninditā /
GE09ram_02pu:2722: vaidehī prāñjalir bhūtvā tāṃ nadīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,46.67 //
GE09ram_02pu:2724: nideśaṃ pālayatv enaṃ gaṅge tvadabhirakṣitaḥ // Ram_2,46.68 //
GE09ram_02pu:2725: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi samagrāṇy uṣya kānane /
GE09ram_02pu:2726: bhrātrā saha mayā caiva punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyati // Ram_2,46.69 //
GE09ram_02pu:2727: tatas tvāṃ devi subhage kṣemeṇa punar āgatā /
GE09ram_02pu:2729: tvaṃ hi tripathagā devi brahmalokaṃ samīkṣase /
GE09ram_02pu:2731: sā tvāṃ devi namasyāmi praśaṃsāmi ca śobhane /
GE09ram_02pu:2732: prāptarājye naravyāghre śivena punar āgate // Ram_2,46.72 //
GE09ram_02pu:2733: gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi vastrāṇy annaṃ ca peśalam /
GE09ram_02pu:2735: tathā saṃbhāṣamāṇā sā sītā gaṅgām aninditā /
GE09ram_02pu:2736: dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇaṃ tīraṃ kṣipram evābhyupāgamat // Ram_2,46.74 //
GE09ram_02pu:2737: tīraṃ tu samanuprāpya nāvaṃ hitvā nararṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2738: prātiṣṭhata saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_2,46.75 //
GE09ram_02pu:2740: agrato gaccha saumitre sītā tvām anugacchatu // Ram_2,46.76 //
GE09ram_02pu:2741: pṛṣṭhato 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvāṃ ca sītāṃ ca pālayan /
GE09ram_02pu:2742: adya duḥkhaṃ tu vaidehī vanavāsasya vetsyati // Ram_2,46.77 //
GE09ram_02pu:2743: gataṃ tu gaṅgāparapāram āśu rāmaṃ sumantraḥ pratataṃ nirīkṣya /
GE09ram_02pu:2744: adhvaprakarṣād vinivṛttadṛṣṭir mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyathitas tapasvī //
GE09ram_02pu:2745: tau tatra hatvā caturo mahāmṛgān varāham ṛśyaṃ pṛṣataṃ mahārurum /
GE09ram_02pu:2746: ādāya medhyaṃ tvaritaṃ bubhukṣitau vāsāya kāle yayatur vanaspatim //
GE09ram_02pu:2747: sa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāsādya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām /
GE09ram_02pu:2748: rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭha iti hovāca lakṣmaṇam // Ram_2,47.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2749: adyeyaṃ prathamā rātrir yātā janapadād bahiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2750: yā sumantreṇa rahitā tāṃ notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // Ram_2,47.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2752: yogakṣemo hi sītāyā vartate lakṣmaṇāvayoḥ // Ram_2,47.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2754: upāvartāmahe bhūmāv āstīrya svayam ārjitaiḥ // Ram_2,47.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2756: imāḥ saumitraye rāmo vyājahāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ // Ram_2,47.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2757: dhruvam adya mahārājo duḥkhaṃ svapiti lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_02pu:2758: kṛtakāmā tu kaikeyī tuṣṭā bhavitum arhati // Ram_2,47.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2759: sā hi devī mahārājaṃ kaikeyī rājyakāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02pu:2760: api na cyāvayet prāṇān dṛṣṭvā bharatam āgatam // Ram_2,47.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2761: anāthaś caiva vṛddhaś ca mayā caiva vinākṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2762: kiṃ kariṣyati kāmātmā kaikeyyā vaśam āgataḥ // Ram_2,47.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2763: idaṃ vyasanam ālokya rājñaś ca mativibhramam /
GE09ram_02pu:2764: kāma evārdhadharmābhyāṃ garīyān iti me matiḥ // Ram_2,47.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2765: ko hy avidvān api pumān pramadāyāḥ kṛte tyajet /
GE09ram_02pu:2766: chandānuvartinaṃ putraṃ tāto mām iva lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,47.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2767: sukhī bata sabhāryaś ca bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2768: muditān kosalān eko yo bhokṣyaty adhirājavat // Ram_2,47.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2769: sa hi sarvasya rājyasya mukham ekaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:2770: tāte ca vayasātīte mayi cāraṇyam āśrite // Ram_2,47.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2772: evam āpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā // Ram_2,47.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2774: kaikeyī saumya samprāptā rājyāya bharatasya ca // Ram_2,47.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2776: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca samprabādheta matkṛte // Ram_2,47.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2777: mā sma matkāraṇād devī sumitrā duḥkham āvaset /
GE09ram_02pu:2778: ayodhyām ita eva tvaṃ kāle praviśa lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,47.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:2779: aham eko gamiṣyāmi sītayā saha daṇḍakān /
GE09ram_02pu:2780: anāthāyā hi nāthas tvaṃ kausalyāyā bhaviṣyasi // Ram_2,47.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2781: kṣudrakarmā hi kaikeyī dveṣād anyāyyam ācaret /
GE09ram_02pu:2782: paridadyā hi dharmajñe bharate mama mātaram // Ram_2,47.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2783: nūnaṃ jātyantare kasmin striyaḥ putrair viyojitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2784: jananyā mama saumitre tad apy etad upasthitam // Ram_2,47.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2786: viprāyujyata kausalyā phalakāle dhig astu mām // Ram_2,47.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:2787: mā sma sīmantinī kācij janayet putram īdṛśam /
GE09ram_02pu:2788: saumitre yo 'ham ambāyā dadmi śokam anantakam // Ram_2,47.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2789: manye prītiviśiṣṭā sā matto lakṣmaṇa śārikā /
GE09ram_02pu:2790: yasyās tac chrūyate vākyaṃ śuka pādam arer daśa // Ram_2,47.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2792: putreṇa kim aputrāyā mayā kāryam ariṃdama // Ram_2,47.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:2793: alpabhāgyā hi me mātā kausalyā rahitā mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2795: eko hy aham ayodhyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_02pu:2796: tareyam iṣubhiḥ kruddho nanu vīryam akāraṇam // Ram_2,47.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:2798: tena lakṣmaṇa nādyāham ātmānam abhiṣecaye // Ram_2,47.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:2799: etad anyac ca karuṇaṃ vilapya vijane bahu /
GE09ram_02pu:2800: aśrupūrṇamukho rāmo niśi tūṣṇīm upāviśat // Ram_2,47.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:2802: samudram iva nirvegam āśvāsayata lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,47.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:2803: dhruvam adya purī rāma ayodhyāyudhināṃ vara /
GE09ram_02pu:2804: niṣprabhā tvayi niṣkrānte gatacandreva śarvarī // Ram_2,47.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:2805: naitad aupayikaṃ rāma yad idaṃ paritapyase /
GE09ram_02pu:2806: viṣādayasi sītāṃ ca māṃ caiva puruṣarṣabha // Ram_2,47.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:2807: na ca sītā tvayā hīnā na cāham api rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:2808: muhūrtam api jīvāvo jalān matsyāv ivoddhṛtau // Ram_2,47.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:2809: na hi tātaṃ na śatrughnaṃ na sumitrāṃ paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_02pu:2810: draṣṭum iccheyam adyāhaṃ svargaṃ vāpi tvayā vinā // Ram_2,47.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:2811: sa lakṣmaṇasyottamapuṣkalaṃ vaco niśamya caivaṃ vanavāsam ādarāt /
GE09ram_02pu:2812: samāḥ samastā vidadhe paraṃtapaḥ prapadya dharmaṃ sucirāya rāghavaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:2813: te tu tasmin mahāvṛkṣa uṣitvā rajanīṃ śivām /
GE09ram_02pu:2814: vimale 'bhyudite sūrye tasmād deśāt pratasthire // Ram_2,48.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2816: jagmus taṃ deśam uddiśya vigāhya sumahad vanam // Ram_2,48.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2817: te bhūmim āgān vividhān deśāṃś cāpi manoramān /
GE09ram_02pu:2818: adṛṣṭapūrvān paśyantas tatra tatra yaśasvinaḥ // Ram_2,48.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2819: yathākṣemeṇa gacchan sa paśyaṃś ca vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02pu:2820: nivṛttamātre divase rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // Ram_2,48.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2821: prayāgam abhitaḥ paśya saumitre dhūmam unnatam /
GE09ram_02pu:2822: agner bhagavataḥ ketuṃ manye saṃnihito muniḥ // Ram_2,48.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2823: nūnaṃ prāptāḥ sma sambhedaṃ gaṅgāyamunayor vayam /
GE09ram_02pu:2824: tathā hi śrūyate śabdo vāriṇo vārighaṭṭitaḥ // Ram_2,48.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2826: bharadvājāśrame caite dṛśyante vividhā drumāḥ // Ram_2,48.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2827: dhanvinau tau sukhaṃ gatvā lambamāne divākare /
GE09ram_02pu:2828: gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃdhau prāpatur nilayaṃ muneḥ // Ram_2,48.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2829: rāmas tv āśramam āsādya trāsayan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2830: gatvā muhūrtam adhvānaṃ bharadvājam upāgamat // Ram_2,48.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2831: tatas tv āśramam āsādya muner darśanakāṅkṣiṇau /
GE09ram_02pu:2834: rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sītayā cābhyavādayat // Ram_2,48.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2838: māṃ cānuyātā vijanaṃ tapovanam aninditā // Ram_2,48.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2839: pitrā pravrājyamānaṃ māṃ saumitrir anujaḥ priyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2840: ayam anvagamad bhrātā vanam eva dṛḍhavrataḥ // Ram_2,48.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2844: upānayata dharmātmā gām arghyam udakaṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,48.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:2846: rāmam āgatam abhyarcya svāgatenāha taṃ muniḥ // Ram_2,48.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2847: pratigṛhya ca tām arcām upaviṣṭaṃ sarāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:2848: bharadvājo 'bravīd vākyaṃ dharmayuktam idaṃ tadā // Ram_2,48.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2849: cirasya khalu kākutstha paśyāmi tvām ihāgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:2850: śrutaṃ tava mayā cedaṃ vivāsanam akāraṇam // Ram_2,48.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2852: puṇyaś ca ramaṇīyaś ca vasatv iha bhavān sukham // Ram_2,48.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:2853: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ bharadvājena rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2854: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmaḥ sarvahite rataḥ // Ram_2,48.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:2856: āgamiṣyati vaidehīṃ māṃ cāpi prekṣako janaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2857: anena kāraṇenāham iha vāsaṃ na rocaye // Ram_2,48.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:2859: ramate yatra vaidehī sukhārhā janakātmajā // Ram_2,48.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:2860: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2861: rāghavasya tato vākyam arthagrāhakam abravīt // Ram_2,48.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:2862: daśakrośa itas tāta girir yasmin nivatsyasi /
GE09ram_02pu:2867: kalyāṇāni samādhatte na pāpe kurute manaḥ // Ram_2,48.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:2868: ṛṣayas tatra bahavo vihṛtya śaradāṃ śatam /
GE09ram_02pu:2869: tapasā divam ārūḍhāḥ kapālaśirasā saha // Ram_2,48.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:2870: praviviktam ahaṃ manye taṃ vāsaṃ bhavataḥ sukham /
GE09ram_02pu:2871: iha vā vanavāsāya vasa rāma mayā saha // Ram_2,48.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:2872: sa rāmaṃ sarvakāmais taṃ bharadvājaḥ priyātithim /
GE09ram_02pu:2873: sabhāryaṃ saha ca bhrātrā pratijagrāha dharmavit // Ram_2,48.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:2874: tasya prayāge rāmasya taṃ maharṣim upeyuṣaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2875: prapannā rajanī puṇyā citrāḥ kathayataḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,48.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:2879: uṣitāḥ smeha vasatim anujānātu no bhavān // Ram_2,48.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:2880: rātryāṃ tu tasyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ bharadvājo 'bravīd idam /
GE09ram_02pu:2883: vicaranti vanānteṣu tāni drakṣyasi rāghava // Ram_2,48.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:2885: mṛgaiś ca mattair bahubhiś ca kuñjaraiḥ suramyam āsādya samāvasāśramam //
GE09ram_02pu:2887: maharṣim abhivādyātha jagmatus taṃ giriṃ prati // Ram_2,49.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2888: prasthitāṃś caiva tān prekṣya pitā putrān ivānvagāt /
GE09ram_02pu:2889: tataḥ pracakrame vaktuṃ vacanaṃ sa mahāmuniḥ // Ram_2,49.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2891: tatra yūyaṃ plavaṃ kṛtvā taratāṃśumatīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,49.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2893: vivṛddhaṃ bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ śyāmaṃ siddhopasevitam // Ram_2,49.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2894: krośamātraṃ tato gatvā nīlaṃ drakṣyatha kānanam /
GE09ram_02pu:2895: palāśabadarīmiśraṃ rāma vaṃśaiś ca yāmunaiḥ // Ram_2,49.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2896: sa panthāś citrakūṭasya gataḥ subahuśo mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2898: iti panthānam āvedya maharṣiḥ sa nyavartata // Ram_2,49.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2899: upāvṛtte munau tasmin rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:2900: kṛtapuṇyāḥ sma saumitre munir yan no 'nukampate // Ram_2,49.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2902: sītām evāgrataḥ kṛtvā kālindīṃ jagmatur nadīm // Ram_2,49.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2904: cakāra lakṣmaṇaś chittvā sītāyāḥ sukham āsanam // Ram_2,49.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2905: tatra śriyam ivācintyāṃ rāmo dāśarathiḥ priyām /
GE09ram_02pu:2906: īṣat saṃlajjamānāṃ tām adhyāropayata plavam // Ram_2,49.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2908: tīrajair bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ saṃterur yamunāṃ nadīm // Ram_2,49.11 //
