GE09ram_02pu:2909: te tīrṇāḥ plavam utsṛjya prasthāya yamunāvanāt /
GE09ram_02pu:2910: śyāmaṃ nyagrodham āseduḥ śītalaṃ haritacchadam // Ram_2,49.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2911: kausalyāṃ caiva paśyeyaṃ sumitrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_02pu:2912: iti sītāñjaliṃ kṛtvā paryagacchad vanaspatim // Ram_2,49.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2914: bahūn medhyān mṛgān hatvā ceratur yamunāvane // Ram_2,49.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2915: vihṛtya te barhiṇapūganādite śubhe vane vāraṇavānarāyute /
GE09ram_02pu:2916: samaṃ nadīvapram upetya saṃmataṃ nivāsam ājagmur adīnadarśanāḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:2919: saumitre śṛṇu vanyānāṃ valgu vyāharatāṃ svanam /
GE09ram_02pu:2921: sa suptaḥ samaye bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ pratibodhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2922: jahau nidrāṃ ca tandrīṃ ca prasaktaṃ ca pathi śramam // Ram_2,50.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2923: tata utthāya te sarve spṛṣṭvā nadyāḥ śivaṃ jalam /
GE09ram_02pu:2924: panthānam ṛṣiṇoddiṣṭaṃ citrakūṭasya taṃ yayuḥ // Ram_2,50.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2925: tataḥ samprasthitaḥ kāle rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha /
GE09ram_02pu:2926: sītāṃ kamalapattrākṣīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,50.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:2927: ādīptān iva vaidehi sarvataḥ puṣpitān nagān /
GE09ram_02pu:2928: svaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kiṃśukān paśya mālinaḥ śiśirātyaye // Ram_2,50.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2930: phalapattrair avanatān nūnaṃ śakṣyāmi jīvitum // Ram_2,50.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2932: madhūni madhukārībhiḥ saṃbhṛtāni nage nage // Ram_2,50.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:2933: eṣa krośati natyūhas taṃ śikhī pratikūjati /
GE09ram_02pu:2936: citrakūṭam imaṃ paśya pravṛddhaśikharaṃ girim // Ram_2,50.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2937: tatas tau pādacāreṇa gacchantau saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02pu:2938: ramyam āsedatuḥ śailaṃ citrakūṭaṃ manoramam // Ram_2,50.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2940: ayaṃ vāso bhavet tāvad atra saumya ramemahi // Ram_2,50.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2941: lakṣmaṇānaya dārūṇi dṛḍhāni ca varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2942: kuruṣvāvasathaṃ saumya vāse me 'bhirataṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,50.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:2943: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitrir vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02pu:2944: ājahāra tataś cakre parṇaśālām ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_2,50.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2946: aiṇeyaṃ māṃsam āhṛtya śālāṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam // Ram_2,50.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:2947: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgaṃ hatvā medhyaṃ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02pu:2948: atha cikṣepa saumitriḥ samiddhe jātavedasi // Ram_2,50.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:2949: taṃ tu pakvaṃ samājñāya niṣṭaptaṃ chinnaśoṇitam /
GE09ram_02pu:2950: lakṣmaṇaḥ puruṣavyāghram atha rāghavam abravīt // Ram_2,50.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2951: ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ samāptāṅgaḥ śṛtaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgo yathā /
GE09ram_02pu:2952: devatā devasaṃkāśa yajasva kuśalo hy asi // Ram_2,50.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2953: rāmaḥ snātvā tu niyato guṇavāñ japyakovidaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2954: pāpasaṃśamanaṃ rāmaś cakāra balim uttamam // Ram_2,50.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:2955: tāṃ vṛkṣaparṇacchadanāṃ manojñāṃ yathāpradeśaṃ sukṛtāṃ nivātām /
GE09ram_02pu:2956: vāsāya sarve viviśuḥ sametāḥ sabhāṃ yathā devagaṇāḥ sudharmām //
GE09ram_02pu:2958: vanottame vyālamṛgānunādite tathā vijahruḥ susukhaṃ jitendriyāḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:2959: suramyam āsādya tu citrakūṭaṃ nadīṃ ca tāṃ mālyavatīṃ sutīrthām /
GE09ram_02pu:2960: nananda hṛṣṭo mṛgapakṣijuṣṭāṃ jahau ca duḥkhaṃ puravipravāsāt //
GE09ram_02pu:2962: rāme dakṣiṇakūlasthe jagāma svagṛhaṃ guhaḥ // Ram_2,51.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:2964: ayodhyām eva nagarīṃ prayayau gāḍhadurmanāḥ // Ram_2,51.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:2965: sa vanāni sugandhīni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2966: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ grāmāṇi nagarāṇi ca // Ram_2,51.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:2968: ayodhyāṃ samanuprāpya nirānandāṃ dadarśa ha // Ram_2,51.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:2969: sa śūnyām iva niḥśabdāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2971: kaccin na sagajā sāśvā sajanā sajanādhipā /
GE09ram_02pu:2973: iti cintāparaḥ sūtas tvaritaḥ praviveśa ha // Ram_2,51.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:2975: kva rāma iti pṛcchantaḥ sūtam abhyadravan narāḥ // Ram_2,51.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:2976: teṣāṃ śaśaṃsa gaṅgāyām aham āpṛcchya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:2978: te tīrṇā iti vijñāya bāṣpapūrṇamukhā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2979: aho dhig iti niḥśvasya hā rāmeti ca cukruśuḥ // Ram_2,51.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:2980: śuśrāva ca vacas teṣāṃ vṛndaṃ vṛndaṃ ca tiṣṭhatām /
GE09ram_02pu:2981: hatāḥ sma khalu ye neha paśyāma iti rāghavam // Ram_2,51.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:2983: na drakṣyāmaḥ punar jātu dhārmikaṃ rāmam antarā // Ram_2,51.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:2984: kiṃ samarthaṃ janasyāsya kiṃ priyaṃ kiṃ sukhāvaham /
GE09ram_02pu:2985: iti rāmeṇa nagaraṃ pitṛvat paripālitam // Ram_2,51.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:2989: yatra rājā daśarathas tad evopayayau gṛham // Ram_2,51.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:2990: so 'vatīrya rathāc chīghraṃ rājaveśma praviśya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:2994: saha rāmeṇa niryāto vinā rāmam ihāgataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:2995: sūtaḥ kiṃ nāma kausalyāṃ śocantīṃ prativakṣyati // Ram_2,51.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:2996: yathā ca manye durjīvam evaṃ na sukaraṃ dhruvam /
GE09ram_02pu:2997: ācchidya putre niryāte kausalyā yatra jīvati // Ram_2,51.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:2998: satyarūpaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājñaḥ strīṇāṃ niśāmayan /
GE09ram_02pu:2999: pradīptam iva śokena viveśa sahasā gṛham // Ram_2,51.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3000: sa praviśyāṣṭamīṃ kakṣyāṃ rājānaṃ dīnam āturam /
GE09ram_02pu:3002: abhigamya tam āsīnaṃ narendram abhivādya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3004: sa tūṣṇīm eva tac chrutvā rājā vibhrāntacetanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3007: uddhṛtya bāhū cukrośa nṛpatau patite kṣitau // Ram_2,51.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3008: sumitrayā tu sahitā kausalyā patitaṃ patim /
GE09ram_02pu:3009: utthāpayāmāsa tadā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,51.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3011: vanavāsād anuprāptaṃ kasmān na pratibhāṣase // Ram_2,51.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:3013: uttiṣṭha sukṛtaṃ te 'stu śoke na syāt sahāyatā // Ram_2,51.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:3014: deva yasyā bhayād rāmaṃ nānupṛcchasi sārathim /
GE09ram_02pu:3015: neha tiṣṭhati kaikeyī viśrabdhaṃ pratibhāṣyatām // Ram_2,51.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:3018: evaṃ vilapatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kausalyāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02pu:3019: patiṃ cāvekṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,51.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:3020: tatas tam antaḥpuranādam utthitaṃ samīkṣya vṛddhās taruṇāś ca mānavāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3021: striyaś ca sarvā ruruduḥ samantataḥ puraṃ tadāsīt punar eva saṃkulam //
GE09ram_02pu:3022: pratyāśvasto yadā rājā mohāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3025: viniḥśvasantaṃ dhyāyantam asvastham iva kuñjaram // Ram_2,52.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3026: rājā tu rajasā sūtaṃ dhvastāṅgaṃ samupasthitam /
GE09ram_02pu:3028: kva nu vatsyati dharmātmā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3030: bhūmipālātmajo bhūmau śete katham anāthavat // Ram_2,52.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3032: sa vatsyati kathaṃ rāmo vijanaṃ vanam āśritaḥ // Ram_2,52.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3034: kathaṃ kumārau vaidehyā sārdhaṃ vanam upasthitau // Ram_2,52.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3036: rājaputrau kathaṃ pādair avaruhya rathād gatau // Ram_2,52.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3037: siddhārthaḥ khalu sūta tvaṃ yena dṛṣṭau mamātmajau /
GE09ram_02pu:3038: vanāntaṃ praviśantau tāv aśvināv iva mandaram // Ram_2,52.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3039: kim uvāca vaco rāmaḥ kim uvāca ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3040: sumantra vanam āsādya kim uvāca ca maithilī /
GE09ram_02pu:3041: āsitaṃ śayitaṃ bhuktaṃ sūta rāmasya kīrtaya // Ram_2,52.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3045: añjaliṃ rāghavaḥ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca // Ram_2,52.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3047: śirasā vandanīyasya vandyau pādau mahātmanaḥ // Ram_2,52.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3048: sarvam antaḥpuraṃ vācyaṃ sūta madvacanāt tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3050: mātā ca mama kausalyā kuśalaṃ cābhivādanam /
GE09ram_02pu:3051: devi devasya pādau ca devavat paripālaya // Ram_2,52.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3052: bharataḥ kuśalaṃ vācyo vācyo madvacanena ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3053: sarvāsv eva yathānyāyaṃ vṛttiṃ vartasva mātṛṣu // Ram_2,52.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3056: ity evaṃ māṃ mahārāja bruvann eva mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3057: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat // Ram_2,52.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3058: lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho niḥśvasan vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:3062: rāmasya tu parityāge na hetum upalakṣaye // Ram_2,52.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3066: bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuś ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,52.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3072: tena duḥkhena rudatī naiva māṃ kiṃcid abravīt // Ram_2,52.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3074: mumoca sahasā bāṣpaṃ māṃ prayāntam udīkṣya sā // Ram_2,52.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:3076: tathaiva sītā rudatī tapasvinī nirīkṣate rājarathaṃ tathaiva mām //
GE09ram_02pu:3077: mama tv aśvā nivṛttasya na prāvartanta vartmani /
GE09ram_02pu:3078: uṣṇam aśru vimuñcanto rāme samprasthite vanam // Ram_2,53.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3080: prasthito ratham āsthāya tad duḥkham api dhārayan // Ram_2,53.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3081: guhena sārdhaṃ tatraiva sthito 'smi divasān bahūn /
GE09ram_02pu:3082: āśayā yadi māṃ rāmaḥ punaḥ śabdāpayed iti // Ram_2,53.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3085: na ca sarpanti sattvāni vyālā na prasaranti ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3086: rāmaśokābhibhūtaṃ tan niṣkūjam abhavad vanam // Ram_2,53.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3089: jalajāni ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni sthalajāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3090: nādya bhānty alpagandhīni phalāni ca yathā puram // Ram_2,53.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3091: praviśantam ayodhyāṃ māṃ na kaścid abhinandati /
GE09ram_02pu:3092: narā rāmam apaśyanto niḥśvasanti muhur muhuḥ // Ram_2,53.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3093: harmyair vimānaiḥ prāsādair avekṣya ratham āgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:3096: anyonyam abhivīkṣante vyaktam ārtatarāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,53.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3098: aham ārtatayā kaṃcid viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye // Ram_2,53.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3102: kausalyā putrahīneva ayodhyā pratibhāti mā // Ram_2,53.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3104: bāṣpopahatayā rājā taṃ sūtam idam abravīt // Ram_2,53.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3106: mayā na mantrakuśalair vṛddhaiḥ saha samarthitam // Ram_2,53.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3107: na suhṛdbhir na cāmātyair mantrayitvā na naigamaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3108: mayāyam arthaḥ sammohāt strīhetoḥ sahasā kṛtaḥ // Ram_2,53.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3109: bhavitavyatayā nūnam idaṃ vā vyasanaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02pu:3110: kulasyāsya vināśāya prāptaṃ sūta yadṛcchayā // Ram_2,53.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3111: sūta yady asti te kiṃcin mayāpi sukṛtaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:3112: tvaṃ prāpayāśu māṃ rāmaṃ prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // Ram_2,53.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3113: yad yad yāpi mamaivājñā nivartayatu rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:3114: na śakṣyāmi vinā rāmaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // Ram_2,53.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3115: atha vāpi mahābāhur gato dūraṃ bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:3116: mām eva ratham āropya śīghraṃ rāmāya darśaya // Ram_2,53.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:3118: yadi jīvāmi sādhv enaṃ paśyeyaṃ saha sītayā // Ram_2,53.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3120: rāmaṃ yadi na paśyāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // Ram_2,53.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:3121: ato nu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yo 'ham ikṣvākunandanam /
GE09ram_02pu:3122: imām avasthām āpanno neha paśyāmi rāghavam // Ram_2,53.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3123: hā rāma rāmānuja hā hā vaidehi tapasvini /
GE09ram_02pu:3124: na māṃ jānīta duḥkhena mriyamāṇam anāthavat /
GE09ram_02pu:3125: dustaro jīvatā devi mayāyaṃ śokasāgaraḥ // Ram_2,53.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3126: aśobhanaṃ yo 'ham ihādya rāghavaṃ didṛkṣamāṇo na labhe salakṣmaṇam /
GE09ram_02pu:3127: itīva rājā vilapan mahāyaśāḥ papāta tūrṇaṃ śayane sa mūrchitaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:3128: iti vilapati pārthive pranaṣṭe karuṇataraṃ dviguṇaṃ ca rāmahetoḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3129: vacanam anuniśamya tasya devī bhayam agamat punar eva rāmamātā //
GE09ram_02pu:3131: dharaṇyāṃ gatasattveva kausalyā sūtam abravīt // Ram_2,54.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3132: naya māṃ yatra kākutsthaḥ sītā yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3133: tān vinā kṣaṇam apy atra jīvituṃ notsahe hy aham // Ram_2,54.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3134: nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ daṇḍakān naya mām api /
GE09ram_02pu:3135: atha tān nānugacchāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // Ram_2,54.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3137: idam āśvāsayan devīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // Ram_2,54.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3138: tyaja śokaṃ ca mohaṃ ca sambhramaṃ duḥkhajaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:3139: vyavadhūya ca saṃtāpaṃ vane vatsyati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,54.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3140: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmasya pādau paricaran vane /
GE09ram_02pu:3142: vijane 'pi vane sītā vāsaṃ prāpya gṛheṣv iva /
GE09ram_02pu:3144: nāsyā dainyaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃcit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye /
GE09ram_02pu:3145: uciteva pravāsānāṃ vaidehī pratibhāti mā // Ram_2,54.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3146: nagaropavanaṃ gatvā yathā sma ramate purā /
GE09ram_02pu:3147: tathaiva ramate sītā nirjaneṣu vaneṣv api // Ram_2,54.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3149: rāmā rāme hy adhīnātmā vijane 'pi vane satī // Ram_2,54.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3150: tadgataṃ hṛdayaṃ hy asyās tadadhīnaṃ ca jīvitam /
GE09ram_02pu:3151: ayodhyāpi bhavet tasyā rāmahīnā tathā vanam // Ram_2,54.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3152: pathi pṛcchati vaidehī grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3153: gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā nadīnāṃ ca pādapān vividhān api // Ram_2,54.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3155: na hi gacchati vaidehyāś candrāṃśusadṛśī prabhā // Ram_2,54.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3157: vadanaṃ tadvadānyāyā vaidehyā na vikampate // Ram_2,54.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3161: idānīm api vaidehī tadrāgā nyastabhūṣaṇā // Ram_2,54.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3162: gajaṃ vā vīkṣya siṃhaṃ vā vyāghraṃ vā vanam āśritā /
GE09ram_02pu:3163: nāhārayati saṃtrāsaṃ bāhū rāmasya saṃśritā // Ram_2,54.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3164: na śocyās te na cātmā te śocyo nāpi janādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3165: idaṃ hi caritaṃ loke pratiṣṭhāsyati śāśvatam // Ram_2,54.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3166: vidhūya śokaṃ parihṛṣṭamānasā maharṣiyāte pathi suvyavasthitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3167: vane ratā vanyaphalāśanāḥ pituḥ śubhāṃ pratijñāṃ paripālayanti te //
GE09ram_02pu:3169: na caiva devī virarāma kūjitāt priyeti putreti ca rāghaveti ca //
GE09ram_02pu:3170: vanaṃ gate dharmapare rāme ramayatāṃ vare /
GE09ram_02pu:3171: kausalyā rudatī svārtā bhartāram idam abravīt // Ram_2,55.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3172: yadyapi triṣu lokeṣu prathitaṃ te mahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3173: sānukrośo vadānyaś ca priyavādī ca rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,55.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3174: kathaṃ naravaraśreṣṭha putrau tau saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3175: duḥkhitau sukhasaṃvṛddhau vane duḥkhaṃ sahiṣyataḥ // Ram_2,55.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3176: sā nūnaṃ taruṇī śyāmā sukumārī sukhocitā /
GE09ram_02pu:3177: katham uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca maithilī prasahiṣyate // Ram_2,55.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3179: vanyaṃ naivāram āhāraṃ kathaṃ sītopabhokṣyate // Ram_2,55.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3181: kathaṃ kravyādasiṃhānāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty aśobhanam // Ram_2,55.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3185: kadā drakṣyāmi rāmasya vadanaṃ puṣkarekṣaṇam // Ram_2,55.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3186: vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ me na saṃśayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3187: apaśyantyā na taṃ yad vai phalatīdaṃ sahasradhā // Ram_2,55.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3188: yadi pañcadaśe varṣe rāghavaḥ punar eṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:3189: jahyād rājyaṃ ca kośaṃ ca bharatenopabhokṣyate // Ram_2,55.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3190: evaṃ kanīyasā bhrātrā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ viśāṃ pate /
GE09ram_02pu:3191: bhrātā jyeṣṭho variṣṭhaś ca kimarthaṃ nāvamaṃsyate // Ram_2,55.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3192: na pareṇāhṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyāghraḥ khāditum icchati /
GE09ram_02pu:3193: evam eva naravyāghraḥ paralīḍhaṃ na maṃsyate // Ram_2,55.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3194: havir ājyaṃ puroḍāśāḥ kuśā yūpāś ca khādirāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3195: naitāni yātayāmāni kurvanti punar adhvare // Ram_2,55.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3196: tathā hy āttam idaṃ rājyaṃ hṛtasārāṃ surām iva /
GE09ram_02pu:3197: nābhimantum alaṃ rāmo naṣṭasomam ivādhvaram // Ram_2,55.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3199: balavān iva śārdūlo vāladher abhimarśanam // Ram_2,55.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3201: svayam eva hataḥ pitrā jalajenātmajo yathā // Ram_2,55.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3203: yadi te dharmanirate tvayā putre vivāsite // Ram_2,55.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3204: gatir ekā patir nāryā dvitīyā gatir ātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3205: tṛtīyā jñātayo rājaṃś caturthī neha vidyate // Ram_2,55.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3206: tatra tvaṃ caiva me nāsti rāmaś ca vanam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3207: na vanaṃ gantum icchāmi sarvathā hi hatā tvayā // Ram_2,55.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3208: hataṃ tvayā rājyam idaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ hatas tathātmā saha mantribhiś ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3209: hatā saputrāsmi hatāś ca paurāḥ sutaś ca bhāryā ca tava prahṛṣṭau //
GE09ram_02pu:3210: imāṃ giraṃ dāruṇaśabdasaṃśritāṃ niśamya rājāpi mumoha duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3211: tataḥ sa śokaṃ praviveśa pārthivaḥ svaduṣkṛtaṃ cāpi punas tadāsmarat //
GE09ram_02pu:3212: evaṃ tu kruddhayā rājā rāmamātrā saśokayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3213: śrāvitaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ cintayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,56.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3215: yad anena kṛtaṃ pūrvam ajñānāc chabdavedhinā // Ram_2,56.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3216: amanās tena śokena rāmaśokena ca prabhuḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3217: dahyamānas tu śokābhyāṃ kausalyām āha bhūpatiḥ // Ram_2,56.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3219: vatsalā cānṛśaṃsā ca tvaṃ hi nityaṃ pareṣv api // Ram_2,56.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3220: bhartā tu khalu nārīṇāṃ guṇavān nirguṇo 'pi vā /
GE09ram_02pu:3221: dharmaṃ vimṛśamānānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ devi daivatam // Ram_2,56.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3223: nārhase vipriyaṃ vaktuṃ duḥkhitāpi suduḥkhitam // Ram_2,56.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3224: tad vākyaṃ karuṇaṃ rājñaḥ śrutvā dīnasya bhāṣitam /
GE09ram_02pu:3225: kausalyā vyasṛjad bāṣpaṃ praṇālīva navodakam // Ram_2,56.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3226: sa mūrdhni baddhvā rudatī rājñaḥ padmam ivāñjalim /
GE09ram_02pu:3227: sambhramād abravīt trastā tvaramāṇākṣaraṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,56.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3228: prasīda śirasā yāce bhūmau nipatitāsmi te /
GE09ram_02pu:3229: yācitāsmi hatā deva hantavyāhaṃ na hi tvayā // Ram_2,56.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3230: naiṣā hi sā strī bhavati ślāghanīyena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02pu:3231: ubhayor lokayor vīra patyā yā saṃprasādyate // Ram_2,56.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3232: jānāmi dharmaṃ dharmajña tvāṃ jāne satyavādinam /
GE09ram_02pu:3233: putraśokārtayā tat tu mayā kim api bhāṣitam // Ram_2,56.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3234: śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam /
GE09ram_02pu:3235: śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ // Ram_2,56.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3237: soḍhum āpatitaḥ śokaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi na śakyate // Ram_2,56.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3240: taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate /
GE09ram_02pu:3241: adīnām iva vegena samudrasalilaṃ mahat // Ram_2,56.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3242: evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3243: mandaraśmir abhūt suryo rajanī cābhyavartata // Ram_2,56.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3244: atha prahlādito vākyair devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3245: śokena ca samākrānto nidrāyā vaśam eyivān // Ram_2,56.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3247: atha rājā daśarathaḥ sa cintām abhyapadyata // Ram_2,57.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3249: āviveśopasargas taṃ tamaḥ sūryam ivāsuram // Ram_2,57.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3250: sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:3252: kausalyāṃ putraśokārtām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,57.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3253: yad ācarati kalyāṇi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GE09ram_02pu:3254: tad eva labhate bhadre kartā karmajam ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,57.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3256: doṣaṃ vā yo na jānāti sa bāla iti hocyate // Ram_2,57.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3257: kaścid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati /
GE09ram_02pu:3258: puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame // Ram_2,57.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3259: so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam /
GE09ram_02pu:3260: rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ // Ram_2,57.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3262: kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:3263: tad idaṃ me 'nusaṃprāptaṃ devi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // Ram_2,57.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3264: sammohād iha bālena yathā syād bhakṣitaṃ viṣam /
GE09ram_02pu:3265: evaṃ mamāpy avijñātaṃ śabdavedhyamayaṃ phalam // Ram_2,57.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3266: devy anūḍhā tvam abhavo yuvarājo bhavāmy aham /
GE09ram_02pu:3268: upāsya hi rasān bhaumāṃs taptvā ca jagad aṃśubhiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3269: paretācaritāṃ bhīmāṃ ravir āviśate diśam // Ram_2,57.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3270: uṣṇam antardadhe sadyaḥ snigdhā dadṛśire ghanāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3274: tasminn atisukhe kāle dhanuṣmān iṣumān rathī /
GE09ram_02pu:3276: nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02pu:3277: anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃcij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ // Ram_2,57.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3278: athāndhakāre tv aśrauṣaṃ jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3279: acakṣur viṣaye ghoṣaṃ vāraṇasyeva nardataḥ // Ram_2,57.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3281: amuñcaṃ niśitaṃ bāṇam aham āśīviṣopamam // Ram_2,57.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3282: tatra vāg uṣasi vyaktā prādurāsīd vanaukasaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3283: hā heti patatas toye vāg abhūt tatra mānuṣī /
GE09ram_02pu:3284: katham asmadvidhe śastraṃ nipatet tu tapasvini // Ram_2,57.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3286: iṣuṇābhihataḥ kena kasya vā kiṃ kṛtaṃ mayā // Ram_2,57.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3287: ṛṣer hi nyastadaṇḍasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3288: kathaṃ nu śastreṇa vadho madvidhasya vidhīyate // Ram_2,57.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:3290: ko vadhena mamārthī syāt kiṃ vāsyāpakṛtaṃ mayā // Ram_2,57.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3292: na kaścit sādhu manyeta yathaiva gurutalpagam // Ram_2,57.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:3294: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ cobhāv anuśocāmi madvidhe // Ram_2,57.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3295: tad etan mithunaṃ vṛddhaṃ cirakālabhṛtaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3296: mayi pañcatvam āpanne kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayiṣyati // Ram_2,57.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3297: vṛddhau ca mātāpitarāv ahaṃ caikeṣuṇā hataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3298: kena sma nihatāḥ sarve subālenākṛtātmanā // Ram_2,57.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:3299: tāṃ giraṃ karuṇāṃ śrutvā mama dharmānukāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3300: karābhyāṃ saśaraṃ cāpaṃ vyathitasyāpatad bhuvi // Ram_2,57.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:3301: taṃ deśam aham āgamya dīnasattvaḥ sudurmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3302: apaśyam iṣuṇā tīre sarayvās tāpasaṃ hatam // Ram_2,57.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:3303: sa mām udvīkṣya netrābhyāṃ trastam asvasthacetasam /
GE09ram_02pu:3304: ity uvāca vacaḥ krūraṃ didhakṣann iva tejasā // Ram_2,57.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:3305: kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ rājan vane nivasatā mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3306: jihīrṣur ambho gurvarthaṃ yad ahaṃ tāḍitas tvayā // Ram_2,57.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:3307: ekena khalu bāṇena marmaṇy abhihate mayi /
GE09ram_02pu:3308: dvāv andhau nihatau vṛddhau mātā janayitā ca me // Ram_2,57.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:3309: tau nūnaṃ durbalāv andhau matpratīkṣau pipāsitau /
GE09ram_02pu:3310: ciram āśākṛtāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ kaṣṭāṃ saṃdhārayiṣyataḥ // Ram_2,57.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:3311: na nūnaṃ tapaso vāsti phalayogaḥ śrutasya vā /
GE09ram_02pu:3312: pitā yan māṃ na jānāti śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi // Ram_2,57.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:3313: jānann api ca kiṃ kuryād aśaktir aparikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3314: bhidyamānam ivāśaktas trātum anyo nago nagam // Ram_2,57.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:3315: pitus tvam eva me gatvā śīghram ācakṣva rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:3316: na tvām anudahet kruddho vanaṃ vahnir ivaidhitaḥ // Ram_2,57.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:3317: iyam ekapadī rājan yato me pitur āśramaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3318: taṃ prasādaya gatvā tvaṃ na tvāṃ sa kupitaḥ śapet // Ram_2,57.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:3319: viśalyaṃ kuru māṃ rājan marma me niśitaḥ śaraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3320: ruṇaddhi mṛdu sotsedhaṃ tīram amburayo yathā // Ram_2,57.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:3321: na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā /
GE09ram_02pu:3322: śūdrāyām asmi vaiśyena jāto janapadādhipa // Ram_2,57.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:3324: tasya tv ānamyamānasya taṃ bāṇam aham uddharam // Ram_2,57.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:3325: jalārdragātraṃ tu vilapya kṛcchrān marmavraṇaṃ saṃtatam ucchvasantam /
GE09ram_02pu:3326: tataḥ sarayvāṃ tam ahaṃ śayānaṃ samīkṣya bhadre subhṛśaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:3327: tad ajñānān mahat pāpaṃ kṛtvā saṃkulitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3328: ekas tv acintayaṃ buddhyā kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ bhavet // Ram_2,58.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3329: tatas taṃ ghaṭam ādāya pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā /
GE09ram_02pu:3330: āśramaṃ tam ahaṃ prāpya yathākhyātapathaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,58.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3332: apaśyaṃ tasya pitarau lūnapakṣāv iva dvijau // Ram_2,58.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3334: tām āśāṃ matkṛte hīnāv udāsīnāv anāthavat // Ram_2,58.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3335: padaśabdaṃ tu me śrutvā munir vākyam abhāṣata /
GE09ram_02pu:3336: kiṃ cirāyasi me putra pānīyaṃ kṣipram ānaya // Ram_2,58.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3337: yannimittam idaṃ tāta salile krīḍitaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3338: utkaṇṭhitā te māteyaṃ praviśa kṣipram āśramam // Ram_2,58.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3339: yad vyalīkaṃ kṛtaṃ putra mātrā te yadi vā mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3340: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ tvayā tāta tapasvinā // Ram_2,58.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3341: tvaṃ gatis tv agatīnāṃ ca cakṣus tvaṃ hīnacakṣuṣām /
GE09ram_02pu:3342: samāsaktās tvayi prāṇāḥ kiṃcin nau nābhibhāṣase // Ram_2,58.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3343: munim avyaktayā vācā tam ahaṃ sajjamānayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3344: hīnavyañjanayā prekṣya bhīto bhīta ivābruvam // Ram_2,58.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3346: ācacakṣe tv ahaṃ tasmai putravyasanajaṃ bhayam // Ram_2,58.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3348: sajjanāvamataṃ duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ svakarmajam // Ram_2,58.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3350: jighāṃsuḥ śvāpadaṃ kiṃcin nipāne vāgataṃ gajam // Ram_2,58.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3351: tatra śruto mayā śabdo jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3352: dvipo 'yam iti matvā hi bāṇenābhihato mayā // Ram_2,58.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3353: gatvā nadyās tatas tīram apaśyam iṣuṇā hṛdi /
GE09ram_02pu:3354: vinirbhinnaṃ gataprāṇaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi tāpasam // Ram_2,58.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3356: visṛṣṭo 'mbhasi nārācas tena te nihataḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,58.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3357: sa coddhṛtena bāṇena tatraiva svargam āsthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3358: bhagavantāv ubhau śocann andhāv iti vilapya ca // Ram_2,58.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3360: śeṣam evaṃgate yat syāt tat prasīdatu me muniḥ // Ram_2,58.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3361: sa tac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ niḥśvasañ śokakarśitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3362: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // Ram_2,58.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3363: yady etad aśubhaṃ karma na sma me kathayeḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02pu:3364: phalen mūrdhā sma te rājan sadyaḥ śatasahasradhā // Ram_2,58.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3366: jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ sthānāc cyāvayed api vajriṇam // Ram_2,58.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:3367: ajñānāddhi kṛtaṃ yasmād idaṃ tenaiva jīvasi /
GE09ram_02pu:3368: api hy adya kulaṃ na syād rāghavāṇāṃ kuto bhavān // Ram_2,58.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3369: naya nau nṛpa taṃ deśam iti māṃ cābhyabhāṣata /
GE09ram_02pu:3370: adya taṃ draṣṭum icchāvaḥ putraṃ paścimadarśanam // Ram_2,58.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:3372: śayānaṃ bhuvi niḥsaṃjñaṃ dharmarājavaśaṃ gatam // Ram_2,58.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3373: athāham ekas taṃ deśaṃ nītvā tau bhṛśaduḥkhitau /
GE09ram_02pu:3374: asparśayam ahaṃ putraṃ taṃ muniṃ saha bhāryayā // Ram_2,58.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3375: tau putram ātmanaḥ spṛṣṭvā tam āsādya tapasvinau /
GE09ram_02pu:3376: nipetatuḥ śarīre 'sya pitā cāsyedam abravīt // Ram_2,58.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:3377: na nv ahaṃ te priyaḥ putra mātaraṃ paśya dhārmika /
GE09ram_02pu:3378: kiṃ nu nāliṅgase putra sukumāra vaco vada // Ram_2,58.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:3380: adhīyānasya madhuraṃ śāstraṃ vānyad viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,58.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:3381: ko māṃ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva snātvā hutahutāśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3383: kandamūlaphalaṃ hṛtvā ko māṃ priyam ivātithim /
GE09ram_02pu:3385: imām andhāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ ca mātaraṃ te tapasvinīm /
GE09ram_02pu:3386: kathaṃ putra bhariṣyāmi kṛpaṇāṃ putragardhinīm // Ram_2,58.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:3387: tiṣṭha mā mā gamaḥ putra yamasya sadanaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02pu:3388: śvo mayā saha gantāsi jananyā ca samedhitaḥ // Ram_2,58.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:3389: ubhāv api ca śokārtāv anāthau kṛpaṇau vane /
GE09ram_02pu:3390: kṣipram eva gamiṣyāvas tvayā hīnau yamakṣayam // Ram_2,58.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:3391: tato vaivasvataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāratīm /
GE09ram_02pu:3392: kṣamatāṃ dharmarājo me bibhṛyāt pitarāv ayam // Ram_2,58.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:3394: tena satyena gacchāśu ye lokāḥ śastrayodhinām // Ram_2,58.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:3395: yānti śūrā gatiṃ yāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3396: hatās tv abhimukhāḥ putra gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ vraja // Ram_2,58.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:3397: yāṃ gatiṃ sagaraḥ śaibyo dilīpo janamejayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3398: nahuṣo dhundhumāraś ca prāptās tāṃ gaccha putraka // Ram_2,58.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:3399: yā gatiḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ svādhyāyāt tapasā ca yā /
GE09ram_02pu:3402: dehanyāsakṛtāṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha putraka /
GE09ram_02pu:3403: na hi tv asmin kule jāto gacchaty akuśalāṃ gatim // Ram_2,58.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:3405: tato 'smai kartum udakaṃ pravṛttaḥ saha bhāryayā // Ram_2,58.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:3406: sa tu divyena rūpeṇa muniputraḥ svakarmabhiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3407: āśvāsya ca muhūrtaṃ tu pitarau vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,58.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:3408: sthānam asmi mahat prāpto bhavatoḥ paricāraṇāt /
GE09ram_02pu:3409: bhavantāv api ca kṣipraṃ mama mūlam upaiṣyataḥ // Ram_2,58.41 //
GE09ram_02pu:3410: evam uktvā tu divyena vimānena vapuṣmatā /
GE09ram_02pu:3411: āruroha divaṃ kṣipraṃ muniputro jitendriyaḥ // Ram_2,58.42 //
GE09ram_02pu:3412: sa kṛtvā tūdakaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasaḥ saha bhāryayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3413: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // Ram_2,58.43 //
GE09ram_02pu:3414: adyaiva jahi māṃ rājan maraṇe nāsti me vyathā /
GE09ram_02pu:3415: yac chareṇaikaputraṃ māṃ tvam akārṣīr aputrakam // Ram_2,58.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:3416: tvayā tu yad avijñānān nihato me sutaḥ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3417: tena tvām abhiśapsyāmi suduḥkham atidāruṇam // Ram_2,58.45 //
GE09ram_02pu:3418: putravyasanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad etan mama sāmpratam /
GE09ram_02pu:3419: evaṃ tvaṃ putraśokena rājan kālaṃ kariṣyasi // Ram_2,58.46 //
GE09ram_02pu:3420: tasmān mām āgataṃ bhadre tasyodārasya tadvacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3421: yad ahaṃ putraśokena saṃtyakṣyāmy adya jīvitam // Ram_2,58.47 //
GE09ram_02pu:3422: yadi māṃ saṃspṛśed rāmaḥ sakṛd adyālabheta vā /
GE09ram_02pu:3423: na tan me sadṛśaṃ devi yan mayā rāghave kṛtam // Ram_2,58.48 //
GE09ram_02pu:3424: cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate /
GE09ram_02pu:3425: dūtā vaivasvatasyaite kausalye tvarayanti mām // Ram_2,58.49 //
GE09ram_02pu:3426: atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye /
GE09ram_02pu:3427: na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam // Ram_2,58.50 //
GE09ram_02pu:3428: na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam /
GE09ram_02pu:3429: mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ // Ram_2,58.51 //
GE09ram_02pu:3431: dhanyā drakṣyanti rāmasya tārādhipanibhaṃ mukham // Ram_2,58.52 //
GE09ram_02pu:3433: sugandhi mama nāthasya dhanyā drakṣyanti tanmukham // Ram_2,58.53 //
GE09ram_02pu:3435: drakṣyanti sukhino rāmaṃ śukraṃ mārgagataṃ yathā // Ram_2,58.54 //
GE09ram_02pu:3436: ayam ātmabhavaḥ śoko mām anātham acetanam /
GE09ram_02pu:3437: saṃsādayati vegena yathā kūlaṃ nadīrayaḥ // Ram_2,58.55 //
GE09ram_02pu:3439: rājā daśarathaḥ śocañ jīvitāntam upāgamat // Ram_2,58.56 //
GE09ram_02pu:3440: tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3441: gate 'rdharātre bhṛśaduḥkhapīḍitas tadā jahau prāṇam udāradarśanaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:3449: upaninyus tathāpy anyāḥ kumārībahulāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,59.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3451: tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan // Ram_2,59.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3452: tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3454: atha saṃvepamānānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02pu:3455: yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ // Ram_2,59.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3456: tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3459: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca tyaktanidre babhūvatuḥ // Ram_2,59.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3460: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam /
GE09ram_02pu:3461: hā nātheti parikruśya petatur dharaṇītale // Ram_2,59.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3463: na babhrāja rajodhvastā tāreva gaganacyutā // Ram_2,59.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3467: babhūva naradevasya sadma diṣṭāntam īyuṣaḥ // Ram_2,59.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3468: atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3469: bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann anāthavat //
GE09ram_02pu:3470: tam agnim iva saṃśāntam ambuhīnam ivārṇavam /
GE09ram_02pu:3471: hataprabham ivādityaṃ svargasthaṃ prekṣya bhūmipam // Ram_2,60.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3473: upagṛhya śiro rājñaḥ kaikeyīṃ pratyabhāṣata // Ram_2,60.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3474: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02pu:3475: tyaktvā rājānam ekāgrā nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāriṇi // Ram_2,60.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3476: vihāya māṃ gato rāmo bhartā ca svargato mama /
GE09ram_02pu:3477: vipathe sārthahīneva nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,60.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3478: bhartāraṃ taṃ parityajya kā strī daivatam ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3479: icchej jīvitum anyatra kaikeyyās tyaktadharmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,60.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3480: na lubdho budhyate doṣān kiṃ pākam iva bhakṣayan /
GE09ram_02pu:3481: kubjānimittaṃ kaikeyyā rāghavāṇāṃ kulaṃ hatam // Ram_2,60.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3483: sabhāryaṃ janakaḥ śrutvā paritapsyaty ahaṃ yathā // Ram_2,60.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3488: niśamya nūnaṃ saṃtrastā rāghavaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // Ram_2,60.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3490: so 'pi śokasamāviṣṭo nanu tyakṣyati jīvitam // Ram_2,60.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3494: rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram // Ram_2,60.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3495: na tu saṃkālanaṃ rājño vinā putreṇa mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3496: sarvajñāḥ kartum īṣus te tato rakṣanti bhūmipam // Ram_2,60.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3497: tailadroṇyāṃ tu sacivaiḥ śāyitaṃ taṃ narādhipam /
GE09ram_02pu:3498: hā mṛto 'yam iti jñātvā striyas tāḥ paryadevayan // Ram_2,60.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3502: purī nārājatāyodhyā hīnā rājñā mahātmanā // Ram_2,60.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3505: gataprabhā dyaur iva bhāskaraṃ vinā vyapetanakṣatragaṇeva śarvarī /
GE09ram_02pu:3506: purī babhāse rahitā mahātmanā na cāsrakaṇṭhākulamārgacatvarā //
GE09ram_02pu:3507: narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram /
GE09ram_02pu:3508: tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire //
GE09ram_02pu:3510: sametya rājakartāraḥ sabhām īyur dvijātayaḥ // Ram_2,61.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3512: kātyāyano gautamaś ca jābāliś ca mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,61.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3513: ete dvijāḥ sahāmātyaiḥ pṛthag vācam udīrayan /
GE09ram_02pu:3515: atītā śarvarī duḥkhaṃ yā no varṣaśatopamā /
GE09ram_02pu:3516: asmin pañcatvam āpanne putraśokena pārthive // Ram_2,61.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3517: svargataś ca mahārājo rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3518: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tejasvī rāmeṇaiva gataḥ saha // Ram_2,61.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3522: arājakaṃ hi no rāṣṭraṃ na vināśam avāpnuyāt // Ram_2,61.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3524: abhivarṣati parjanyo mahīṃ divyena vāriṇā // Ram_2,61.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3526: nārājake pituḥ putro bhāryā vā vartate vaśe // Ram_2,61.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3527: arājake dhanaṃ nāsti nāsti bhāryāpy arājake /
GE09ram_02pu:3528: idam atyāhitaṃ cānyat kutaḥ satyam arājake // Ram_2,61.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3530: udyānāni ca ramyāṇi hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyagṛhāṇi ca // Ram_2,61.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3532: sattrāṇy anvāsate dāntā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // Ram_2,61.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3534: utsavāś ca samājāś ca vardhante rāṣṭravardhanāḥ // Ram_2,61.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3538: narā niryānty araṇyāni nārībhiḥ saha kāminaḥ // Ram_2,61.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3544: bhāvayann ātmanātmānaṃ yatra sāyaṃgṛho muniḥ // Ram_2,61.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3546: na cāpy arājake senā śatrūn viṣahate yudhi // Ram_2,61.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3547: yathā hy anudakā nadyo yathā vāpy atṛṇaṃ vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:3548: agopālā yathā gāvas tathā rāṣṭram arājakam // Ram_2,61.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:3550: matsyā iva narā nityaṃ bhakṣayanti parasparam // Ram_2,61.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3553: aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃcana /
GE09ram_02pu:3554: rājā cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī // Ram_2,61.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3555: jīvaty api mahārāje tavaiva vacanaṃ vayam /
GE09ram_02pu:3556: nātikramāmahe sarve velāṃ prāpyeva sāgaraḥ // Ram_2,61.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3557: sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam araṇyabhūtam /
GE09ram_02pu:3558: kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñca // Ram_2,61.25
GE09ram_02pu:3559: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02pu:3560: mitrāmātyagaṇān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃs tān idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,62.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3561: yad asau mātulakule pure rājagṛhe sukhī /
GE09ram_02pu:3562: bharato vasati bhrātrā śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // Ram_2,62.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3563: tac chīghraṃ javanā dūtā gacchantu tvaritair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3564: ānetuṃ bhrātarau vīrau kiṃ samīkṣāmahe vayam // Ram_2,62.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3565: gacchantv iti tataḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abruvan /
GE09ram_02pu:3566: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,62.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3568: śrūyatām itikartavyaṃ sarvān eva bravīmi vaḥ // Ram_2,62.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3569: puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ gatvā śīghraṃ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3570: tyaktaśokair idaṃ vācyaḥ śāsanād bharato mama // Ram_2,62.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3571: purohitas tvāṃ kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3572: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // Ram_2,62.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3573: mā cāsmai proṣitaṃ rāmaṃ mā cāsmai pitaraṃ mṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:3574: bhavantaḥ śaṃsiṣur gatvā rāghavāṇām imaṃ kṣayam // Ram_2,62.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3575: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3576: kṣipram ādāya rājñaś ca bharatasya ca gacchata /
GE09ram_02pu:3578: te hastinapure gaṅgāṃ tīrtvā pratyaṅmukhā yayuḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3583: abhigamyābhivādyaṃ taṃ kuliṅgāṃ prāviśan purīm // Ram_2,62.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3585: yayur madhyena vāhlīkān sudāmānaṃ ca parvatam /
GE09ram_02pu:3586: viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prekṣamāṇā vipāśāṃ cāpi śālmalīm // Ram_2,62.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3587: te śrāntavāhanā dūtā vikṛṣṭena satā pathā /
GE09ram_02pu:3588: girivrajaṃ puravaraṃ śīghram āsedur añjasā // Ram_2,62.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3589: bhartuḥ priyārthaṃ kularakṣaṇārthaṃ bhartuś ca vaṃśasya parigrahārtham /
GE09ram_02pu:3590: aheḍamānās tvarayā sma dūtā rātryāṃ tu te tat puram eva yātāḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:3591: yām eva rātriṃ te dūtāḥ praviśanti sma tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02pu:3592: bharatenāpi tāṃ rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭo 'yam apriyaḥ // Ram_2,63.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3593: vyuṣṭām eva tu tāṃ rātriṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ svapnam apriyam /
GE09ram_02pu:3596: āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ // Ram_2,63.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3597: vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare /
GE09ram_02pu:3598: nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca // Ram_2,63.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3599: sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priyavādibhiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3600: goṣṭhīhāsyāni kurvadbhir na prāhṛṣyata rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,63.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3601: tam abravīt priyasakho bharataṃ sakhibhir vṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:3602: suhṛdbhiḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kiṃ sakhe nānumodase // Ram_2,63.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3603: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ suhṛdaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02pu:3604: śṛṇu tvaṃ yannimittaṃ me dainyam etad upāgatam // Ram_2,63.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3607: plavamānaś ca me dṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmin gomayahrade /
GE09ram_02pu:3608: pibann añjalinā tailaṃ hasann iva muhur muhuḥ // Ram_2,63.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3609: tatas tilodanaṃ bhuktvā punaḥ punar adhaḥśirāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3611: svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02pu:3612: sahasā cāpi saṃśāntaṃ jvalitaṃ jātavedasam // Ram_2,63.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3613: avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān /
GE09ram_02pu:3614: ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva parvatān // Ram_2,63.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3616: prahasanti sma rājānaṃ pramadāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ // Ram_2,63.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3619: evam etan mayā dṛṣṭam imāṃ rātriṃ bhayāvahām /
GE09ram_02pu:3620: ahaṃ rāmo 'tha vā rājā lakṣmaṇo vā mariṣyati // Ram_2,63.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3621: naro yānena yaḥ svapne kharayuktena yāti hi /
GE09ram_02pu:3623: etannimittaṃ dīno 'haṃ tan na vaḥ pratipūjaye // Ram_2,63.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3624: śuṣyatīva ca me kaṇṭho na svastham iva me manaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3625: jugupsann iva cātmānaṃ na ca paśyāmi kāraṇam // Ram_2,63.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3626: imāṃ hi duḥsvapnagatiṃ niśāmya tām anekarūpām avitarkitāṃ purā /
GE09ram_02pu:3627: bhayaṃ mahat taddhṛdayān na yāti me vicintya rājānam acintyadarśanam //
GE09ram_02pu:3628: bharate bruvati svapnaṃ dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3630: samāgamya tu rājñā ca rājaputreṇa cārcitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3631: rājñaḥ pādau gṛhītvā tu tam ūcur bharataṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,64.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3632: purohitas tvā kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3633: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // Ram_2,64.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3634: atra viṃśatikoṭyas tu nṛpater mātulasya te /
GE09ram_02pu:3635: daśakoṭyas tu sampūrṇās tathaiva ca nṛpātmaja // Ram_2,64.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3636: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane /
GE09ram_02pu:3637: dūtān uvāca bharataḥ kāmaiḥ sampratipūjya tān // Ram_2,64.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3638: kaccit sukuśalī rājā pitā daśaratho mama /
GE09ram_02pu:3639: kaccic cārogatā rāme lakṣmaṇe vā mahātmani // Ram_2,64.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3641: arogā cāpi kausalyā mātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,64.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3642: kaccit sumitrā dharmajñā jananī lakṣmaṇasya yā /
GE09ram_02pu:3643: śatrughnasya ca vīrasya sārogā cāpi madhyamā // Ram_2,64.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3645: arogā cāpi kaikeyī mātā me kim uvāca ha // Ram_2,64.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3646: evam uktās tu te dūtā bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02pu:3647: ūcuḥ sampraśritaṃ vākyam idaṃ taṃ bharataṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:3648: kuśalās te naravyāghra yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi // Ram_2,64.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3649: bharataś cāpi tān dūtān evam ukto 'bhyabhāṣata /
GE09ram_02pu:3650: āpṛcche 'haṃ mahārājaṃ dūtāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // Ram_2,64.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3651: evam uktvā tu tān dūtān bharataḥ pārthivātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3652: dūtaiḥ saṃcodito vākyaṃ mātāmaham uvāca ha // Ram_2,64.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3654: punar apy aham eṣyāmi yadā me tvaṃ smariṣyasi // Ram_2,64.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3655: bharatenaivam uktas tu nṛpo mātāmahas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:3656: tam uvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śirasy āghrāya rāghavam // Ram_2,64.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3657: gaccha tātānujāne tvāṃ kaikeyī suprajās tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3658: mātaraṃ kuśalaṃ brūyāḥ pitaraṃ ca paraṃtapa // Ram_2,64.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3659: purohitaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3660: tau ca tāta maheṣvāsau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_2,64.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3661: tasmai hastyuttamāṃś citrān kambalān ajināni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3662: abhisatkṛtya kaikeyo bharatāya dhanaṃ dadau // Ram_2,64.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3664: satkṛtya kaikeyī putraṃ kekayo dhanam ādiśat // Ram_2,64.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3668: kharāñ śīghrān susaṃyuktān mātulo 'smai dhanaṃ dadau // Ram_2,64.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:3670: daṃṣṭrāyudhān mahākāyāñ śunaś copāyanaṃ dadau // Ram_2,64.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3671: sa mātāmaham āpṛcchya mātulaṃ ca yudhājitam /
GE09ram_02pu:3672: ratham āruhya bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // Ram_2,64.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:3674: uṣṭrago'śvakharair bhṛtyā bharataṃ yāntam anvayuḥ // Ram_2,64.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3675: balena gupto bharato mahātmā sahāryakasyātmasamair amātyaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3676: ādāya śatrughnam apetaśatrur gṛhād yayau siddha ivendralokāt //
GE09ram_02pu:3679: śatadrūm atarac chrīmān nadīm ikṣvākunandanaḥ // Ram_2,65.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3681: śilām ākurvatīṃ tīrtvā āgneyaṃ śalyakartanam // Ram_2,65.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3683: atyayāt sa mahāśailān vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ prati // Ram_2,65.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3685: yamunāṃ prāpya saṃtīrṇo balam āśvāsayat tadā // Ram_2,65.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3686: śītīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi klāntān āśvāsya vājinaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3687: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca prāyād ādāya codakam // Ram_2,65.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3689: bhadro bhadreṇa yānena mārutaḥ kham ivātyayāt // Ram_2,65.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3691: varūthaṃ ca yayau ramyaṃ grāmaṃ daśarathātmajaḥ // Ram_2,65.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3692: tatra ramye vane vāsaṃ kṛtvāsau prāṅmukho yayau /
GE09ram_02pu:3693: udyānam ujjihānāyāḥ priyakā yatra pādapāḥ // Ram_2,65.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3694: sālāṃs tu priyakān prāpya śīghrān āsthāya vājinaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3695: anujñāpyātha bharato vāhinīṃ tvarito yayau // Ram_2,65.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3696: vāsaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrthe tīrtvā cottānikāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02pu:3697: anyā nadīś ca vividhāḥ pārvatīyais turaṃgamaiḥ // Ram_2,65.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3699: tatāra ca naravyāghro lauhitye sa kapīvatīm /
GE09ram_02pu:3700: ekasāle sthāṇumatīṃ vinate gomatīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,65.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3704: ayodhyāṃ manunā rājñā nirmitāṃ sa dadarśa ha // Ram_2,65.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3706: ayodhyām agrato dṛṣṭvā rathe sārathim abravīt // Ram_2,65.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3708: ayodhyā dṛśyate dūrāt sārathe pāṇḍumṛttikā // Ram_2,65.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3711: ayodhyāyāṃ purā śabdaḥ śrūyate tumulo mahān /
GE09ram_02pu:3712: samantān naranārīṇāṃ tam adya na śṛṇomy aham // Ram_2,65.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3716: araṇyabhūteva purī sārathe pratibhāti me // Ram_2,65.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3717: na hy atra yānair dṛśyante na gajair na ca vājibhiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3718: niryānto vābhiyānto vā naramukhyā yathāpuram // Ram_2,65.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:3719: aniṣṭāni ca pāpāni paśyāmi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3720: nimittāny amanojñāni tena sīdati me manaḥ // Ram_2,65.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3722: dvāḥsthair utthāya vijayaṃ pṛṣṭas taiḥ sahito yayau // Ram_2,65.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:3723: sa tv anekāgrahṛdayo dvāḥsthaṃ pratyarcya taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02pu:3724: sūtam aśvapateḥ klāntam abravīt tatra rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,65.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3725: śrutā no yādṛśāḥ pūrvaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ vināśane /
GE09ram_02pu:3726: ākārās tān ahaṃ sarvān iha paśyāmi sārathe // Ram_2,65.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3728: sastrīpuṃsaṃ ca paśyāmi janam utkaṇṭhitaṃ pure // Ram_2,65.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:3729: ity evam uktvā bharataḥ sūtaṃ taṃ dīnamānasaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3730: tāny aniṣṭāny ayodhyāyāṃ prekṣya rājagṛhaṃ yayau /
GE09ram_02pu:3732: dṛṣṭvā purīm indrapurīprakāśāṃ duḥkhena sampūrṇataro babhūva /
GE09ram_02pu:3733: bahūni paśyan manaso 'priyāṇi yāny anyadā nāsya pure babhūvuḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3734: avākśirā dīnamanā na hṛṣṭaḥ pitur mahātmā praviveśa veśma // Ram_2,65.27
GE09ram_02pu:3735: apaśyaṃs tu tatas tatra pitaraṃ pitur ālaye /
GE09ram_02pu:3736: jagāma bharato draṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ mātur ālaye // Ram_2,66.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3737: anuprāptaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyī proṣitaṃ sutam /
GE09ram_02pu:3738: utpapāta tadā hṛṣṭā tyaktvā sauvarṇamānasam // Ram_2,66.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3740: bharataḥ prekṣya jagrāha jananyāś caraṇau śubhau // Ram_2,66.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3742: aṅke bharatam āropya praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_2,66.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3744: api nādhvaśramaḥ śīghraṃ rathenāpatatas tava // Ram_2,66.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3745: āryakas te sukuśalī yudhājin mātulas tava /
GE09ram_02pu:3746: pravāsāc ca sukhaṃ putra sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi // Ram_2,66.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3747: evaṃ pṛṣṭas tu kaikeyyā priyaṃ pārthivanandanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3748: ācaṣṭa bharataḥ sarvaṃ mātre rājīvalocanaḥ // Ram_2,66.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3750: ambāyāḥ kuśalī tāto yudhājin mātulaś ca me // Ram_2,66.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3751: yan me dhanaṃ ca ratnaṃ ca dadau rājā paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3752: pariśrāntaṃ pathy abhavat tato 'haṃ pūrvam āgataḥ // Ram_2,66.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3754: yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi tad ambā vaktum arhati // Ram_2,66.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3756: na cāyam ikṣvākujanaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratibhāti me // Ram_2,66.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3758: tam ahaṃ nādya paśyāmi draṣṭum icchann ihāgataḥ // Ram_2,66.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3759: pitur grahīṣye caraṇau taṃ mamākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3760: āhosvid amba jyeṣṭhāyāḥ kausalyāyā niveśane // Ram_2,66.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3761: taṃ pratyuvāca kaikeyī priyavad ghoram apriyam /
GE09ram_02pu:3763: yā gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ te pitā gataḥ // Ram_2,66.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3764: tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ dharmābhijanavāñ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3768: etat suruciraṃ bhāti pitur me śayanaṃ purā /
GE09ram_02pu:3769: tad idaṃ na vibhāty adya vihīnaṃ tena dhīmatā // Ram_2,66.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3770: tam ārtaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣya patitaṃ bhuvi /
GE09ram_02pu:3771: utthāpayitvā śokārtaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,66.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3773: tvadvidhā na hi śocanti santaḥ sadasi saṃmatāḥ // Ram_2,66.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3774: sa ruditvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmau viparivṛtya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3775: jananīṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ // Ram_2,66.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:3776: abhiṣekṣyati rāmaṃ tu rājā yajñaṃ nu yakṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:3777: ity ahaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpo hṛṣṭo yātrām ayāsiṣam // Ram_2,66.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3778: tad idaṃ hy anyathā bhūtaṃ vyavadīrṇaṃ mano mama /
GE09ram_02pu:3779: pitaraṃ yo na paśyāmi nityaṃ priyahite ratam // Ram_2,66.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:3780: amba kenātyagād rājā vyādhinā mayy anāgate /
GE09ram_02pu:3781: dhanyā rāmādayaḥ sarve yaiḥ pitā saṃskṛtaḥ svayam // Ram_2,66.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3782: na nūnaṃ māṃ mahārājaḥ prāptaṃ jānāti kīrtimān /
GE09ram_02pu:3783: upajighreddhi māṃ mūrdhni tātaḥ saṃnamya satvaram // Ram_2,66.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3785: yena māṃ rajasā dhvastam abhīkṣṇaṃ parimārjati // Ram_2,66.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:3786: yo me bhrātā pitā bandhur yasya dāso 'smi dhīmataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3787: tasya māṃ śīghram ākhyāhi rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,66.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:3788: pitā hi bhavati jyeṣṭho dharmam āryasya jānataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3789: tasya pādau grahīṣyāmi sa hīdānīṃ gatir mama // Ram_2,66.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:3790: ārye kim abravīd rājā pitā me satyavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3791: paścimaṃ sādhusaṃdeśam icchāmi śrotum ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,66.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:3792: iti pṛṣṭā yathātattvaṃ kaikeyī vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:3793: rāmeti rājā vilapan hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3794: sa mahātmā paraṃ lokaṃ gato gatimatāṃ varaḥ // Ram_2,66.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:3795: imāṃ tu paścimāṃ vācaṃ vyājahāra pitā tava /
GE09ram_02pu:3797: siddhārthās tu narā rāmam āgataṃ sītayā saha /
GE09ram_02pu:3798: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // Ram_2,66.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:3800: viṣaṇṇavadano bhūtvā bhūyaḥ papraccha mātaram // Ram_2,66.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:3802: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca samaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,66.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:3804: mātāsya yugapad vākyaṃ vipriyaṃ priyaśaṅkayā // Ram_2,66.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:3805: sa hi rājasutaḥ putra cīravāsā mahāvanam /
GE09ram_02pu:3806: daṇḍakān saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇānucaro gataḥ // Ram_2,66.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:3807: tac chrutvā bharatas trasto bhrātuś cāritraśaṅkayā /
GE09ram_02pu:3808: svasya vaṃśasya māhātmyāt praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_2,66.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:3809: kaccin na brāhmaṇadhanaṃ hṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasyacit /
GE09ram_02pu:3810: kaccin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ // Ram_2,66.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:3812: kasmāt sa daṇḍakāraṇye bhrūṇaheva vivāsitaḥ // Ram_2,66.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:3813: athāsya capalā mātā tat svakarma yathātatham /
GE09ram_02pu:3815: na brāhmaṇadhanaṃ kiṃcid dhṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasyacit /
GE09ram_02pu:3816: kaścin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3817: na rāmaḥ paradārāṃś ca cakṣurbhyām api paśyati // Ram_2,66.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:3819: yācitas te pitā rājyaṃ rāmasya ca vivāsanam // Ram_2,66.41 //
GE09ram_02pu:3820: sa svavṛttiṃ samāsthāya pitā te tat tathākarot /
GE09ram_02pu:3821: rāmaś ca sahasaumitriḥ preṣitaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_2,66.42 //
GE09ram_02pu:3822: tam apaśyan priyaṃ putraṃ mahīpālo mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3824: tvayā tv idānīṃ dharmajña rājatvam avalambyatām /
GE09ram_02pu:3825: tvatkṛte hi mayā sarvam idam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtam // Ram_2,66.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:3826: tat putra śīghraṃ vidhinā vidhijñair vasiṣṭhamukhyaiḥ sahito dvijendraiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3827: saṃkālya rājānam adīnasattvam ātmānam urvyām abhiṣecayasva // Ram_2,66.45
GE09ram_02pu:3828: śrutvā tu pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ bhrātarau ca vivāsitau /
GE09ram_02pu:3829: bharato duḥkhasaṃtapta idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,67.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3830: kiṃ nu kāryaṃ hatasyeha mama rājyena śocataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3831: vihīnasyātha pitrā ca bhrātrā pitṛsamena ca // Ram_2,67.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3832: duḥkhe me duḥkham akaror vraṇe kṣāram ivādadhāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3833: rājānaṃ pretabhāvasthaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ ca tāpasam // Ram_2,67.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3835: aṅgāram upagūhya sma pitā me nāvabuddhavān // Ram_2,67.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3837: duṣkaraṃ yadi jīvetāṃ prāpya tvāṃ jananīṃ mama // Ram_2,67.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3838: nanu tv āryo 'pi dharmātmā tvayi vṛttim anuttamām /
GE09ram_02pu:3839: vartate guruvṛttijño yathā mātari vartate // Ram_2,67.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3840: tathā jyeṣṭhā hi me mātā kausalyā dīrghadarśinī /
GE09ram_02pu:3841: tvayi dharmaṃ samāsthāya bhaginyām iva vartate // Ram_2,67.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3843: prasthāpya vanavāsāya kathaṃ pāpe na śocasi // Ram_2,67.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3845: pravrājya cīravasanaṃ kiṃ nu paśyasi kāraṇam // Ram_2,67.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3846: lubdhāyā vidito manye na te 'haṃ rāghavaṃ prati /
GE09ram_02pu:3847: tathā hy anartho rājyārthaṃ tvayā nīto mahān ayam // Ram_2,67.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3849: kena śaktiprabhāvena rājyaṃ rakṣitum utsahe // Ram_2,67.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3850: taṃ hi nityaṃ mahārājo balavantaṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3851: apāśrito 'bhūd dharmātmā merur meruvanaṃ yathā // Ram_2,67.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3853: damyo dhuram ivāsādya saheyaṃ kena caujasā // Ram_2,67.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3854: atha vā me bhavec chaktir yogair buddhibalena vā /
GE09ram_02pu:3855: sakāmāṃ na kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ putragardhinīm /
GE09ram_02pu:3857: ity evam uktvā bharato mahātmā priyetarair vākyagaṇais tudaṃs tām /
GE09ram_02pu:3858: śokāturaś cāpi nanāda bhūyaḥ siṃho yathā parvatagahvarasthaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:3859: tāṃ tathā garhayitvā tu mātaraṃ bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:3860: roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // Ram_2,68.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3862: parityaktā ca dharmeṇa mā mṛtaṃ rudatī bhava // Ram_2,68.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3863: kiṃ nu te 'dūṣayad rājā rāmo vā bhṛśadhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3864: yayor mṛtyur vivāsaś ca tvatkṛte tulyam āgatau // Ram_2,68.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3866: kaikeyi narakaṃ gaccha mā ca bhartuḥ salokatām // Ram_2,68.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3867: yat tvayā hīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoreṇa karmaṇā /
GE09ram_02pu:3868: sarvalokapriyaṃ hitvā mamāpy āpāditaṃ bhayam // Ram_2,68.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3869: tvatkṛte me pitā vṛtto rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3870: ayaśo jīvaloke ca tvayāhaṃ pratipāditaḥ // Ram_2,68.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3872: na te 'ham abhibhāṣyo 'smi durvṛtte patighātini // Ram_2,68.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3873: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā mama mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3874: duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭās tvāṃ prāpya kuladūṣiṇīm // Ram_2,68.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3875: na tvam aśvapateḥ kanyā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3876: rākṣasī tatra jātāsi kulapradhvaṃsinī pituḥ // Ram_2,68.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3877: yat tvayā dhārmiko rāmo nityaṃ satyaparāyaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3878: vanaṃ prasthāpito duḥkhāt pitā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,68.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3879: yatpradhānāsi tat pāpaṃ mayi pitrā vinākṛte /
GE09ram_02pu:3880: bhrātṛbhyāṃ ca parityakte sarvalokasya cāpriye // Ram_2,68.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:3882: kṛtvā kaṃ prāpsyase tv adya lokaṃ nirayagāminī // Ram_2,68.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3886: tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvān na tu bāndhavaḥ // Ram_2,68.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3889: tāv ardhadivase śrāntau dṛṣṭvā putrau mahītale /
GE09ram_02pu:3892: bindavaḥ patitā gātre sūkṣmāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ // Ram_2,68.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3894: indraḥ prāñjalir udvignaḥ surarājo 'bravīd vacaḥ // Ram_2,68.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3895: bhayaṃ kaccin na cāsmāsu kutaścid vidyate mahat /
GE09ram_02pu:3896: kutonimittaḥ śokas te brūhi sarvahitaiṣiṇi // Ram_2,68.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3897: evam uktā tu surabhiḥ surarājena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02pu:3898: pratyuvāca tato dhīrā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradā // Ram_2,68.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:3899: śāntaṃ pāpaṃ na vaḥ kiṃcit kutaścid amarādhipa /
GE09ram_02pu:3900: ahaṃ tu magnau śocāmi svaputrau viṣame sthitau // Ram_2,68.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3903: mama kāyāt prasūtau hi duḥkhitau bhārapīḍitau /
GE09ram_02pu:3904: yau dṛṣṭvā paritapye 'haṃ nāsti putrasamaḥ priyaḥ // Ram_2,68.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3906: kiṃ punar yā vinā rāmaṃ kausalyā vartayiṣyati // Ram_2,68.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3907: ekaputrā ca sādhvī ca vivatseyaṃ tvayā kṛtā /
GE09ram_02pu:3908: tasmāt tvaṃ satataṃ duḥkhaṃ pretya ceha ca lapsyase // Ram_2,68.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:3909: ahaṃ hy apacitiṃ bhrātuḥ pituś ca sakalām imām /
GE09ram_02pu:3910: vardhanaṃ yaśasaś cāpi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,68.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:3912: svayam eva pravekṣyāmi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam // Ram_2,68.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:3914: papāta bhuvi saṃkruddho niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ // Ram_2,68.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:3916: babhūva bhūmau patito nṛpātmajaḥ śacīpateḥ ketur ivotsavakṣaye //
GE09ram_02pu:3918: kausalyā śabdam ājñāya sumitrām idam abravīt // Ram_2,69.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3920: tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi bharataṃ dīrghadarśinam // Ram_2,69.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3921: evam uktvā sumitrāṃ sā vivarṇā malināmbarā /
GE09ram_02pu:3922: pratasthe bharato yatra vepamānā vicetanā // Ram_2,69.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:3923: sa tu rāmānujaś cāpi śatrughnasahitas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:3924: pratasthe bharato yatra kausalyāyā niveśanam // Ram_2,69.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:3928: idaṃ te rājyakāmasya rājyaṃ prāptam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02pu:3929: samprāptaṃ bata kaikeyyā śīghraṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā // Ram_2,69.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3931: kaikeyī kaṃ guṇaṃ tatra paśyati krūradarśinī // Ram_2,69.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:3932: kṣipraṃ mām api kaikeyī prasthāpayitum arhati /
GE09ram_02pu:3933: hiraṇyanābho yatrāste suto me sumahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,69.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:3934: atha vā svayam evāhaṃ sumitrānucarā sukham /
GE09ram_02pu:3935: agnihotraṃ puraskṛtya prasthāsye yatra rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,69.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:3936: kāmaṃ vā svayam evādya tatra māṃ netum arhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:3937: yatrāsau puruṣavyāghras tapyate me tapaḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,69.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:3940: evaṃ vilapamānāṃ tāṃ bharataḥ prāñjalis tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:3941: kausalyāṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtām // Ram_2,69.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:3942: ārye kasmād ajānantaṃ garhase mām akilbiṣam /
GE09ram_02pu:3943: vipulāṃ ca mama prītiṃ sthirāṃ jānāsi rāghave // Ram_2,69.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:3944: kṛtā śāstrānugā buddhir mā bhūt tasya kadācana /
GE09ram_02pu:3945: satyasaṃdhaḥ satāṃ śreṣṭho yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:3946: praiṣyaṃ pāpīyasāṃ yātu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu /
GE09ram_02pu:3947: hantu pādena gāṃ suptāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:3948: kārayitvā mahat karma bhartā bhṛtyam anarthakam /
GE09ram_02pu:3949: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syās tu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:3951: tatas tu druhyatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:3953: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syāstu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:3954: saṃśrutya ca tapasvibhyaḥ sattre vai yajñadakṣiṇām /
GE09ram_02pu:3955: tāṃ vipralapatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:3957: mā sma kārṣīt satāṃ dharmaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:3959: sa nāśayatu duṣṭātmā yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:3960: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ chāgaṃ vṛthā so 'śnātu nirghṛṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3961: gurūṃś cāpy avajānātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:3962: putrair dāraiś ca bhṛtyaiś ca svagṛhe parivāritaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3963: sa eko mṛṣṭam aśnātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:3965: bhṛtyatyāge ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // Ram_2,69.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:3966: ubhe saṃdhye śayānasya yat pāpaṃ parikalpyate /
GE09ram_02pu:3967: tac ca pāpaṃ bhavet tasya yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:3968: yad agnidāyake pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ gurutalpage /
GE09ram_02pu:3969: mitradrohe ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // Ram_2,69.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:3970: devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca mātāpitros tathaiva ca /
GE09ram_02pu:3971: mā sma kārṣīt sa śuśrūṣāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:3972: satāṃ lokāt satāṃ kīrtyāḥ sajjuṣṭāt karmaṇas tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:3973: bhraśyatu kṣipram adyaiva yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:3975: evam āśvāsayann eva duḥkhārto nipapāta ha // Ram_2,69.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:3976: tathā tu śapathaiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ śapamānam acetanam /
GE09ram_02pu:3977: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,69.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:3978: mama duḥkham idaṃ putra bhūyaḥ samupajāyate /
GE09ram_02pu:3979: śapathaiḥ śapamāno hi prāṇān uparuṇatsi me // Ram_2,69.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:3980: diṣṭyā na calito dharmād ātmā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3981: vatsa satyapratijño me satāṃ lokān avāpsyasi // Ram_2,69.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:3983: mohāc ca śokasaṃrodhād babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,69.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:3985: muhur muhur niḥśvasataś ca dīrghaṃ sā tasya śokena jagāma rātriḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:3987: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ // Ram_2,70.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:3988: alaṃ śokena bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3989: prāptakālaṃ narapateḥ kuru saṃyānam uttaram // Ram_2,70.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:3990: vasiṣṭhasya vacaḥ śrutvā bharato dhāraṇāṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:3992: uddhṛtaṃ tailasaṃkledāt sa tu bhūmau niveśitam /
GE09ram_02pu:3995: tato daśarathaṃ putro vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,70.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:3996: kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan proṣite mayy anāgate /
GE09ram_02pu:3997: vivāsya rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // Ram_2,70.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:3998: kva yāsyasi mahārāja hitvemaṃ duḥkhitaṃ janam /
GE09ram_02pu:4000: yogakṣemaṃ tu te rājan ko 'smin kalpayitā pure /
GE09ram_02pu:4001: tvayi prayāte svas tāta rāme ca vanam āśrite // Ram_2,70.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4002: vidhavā pṛthivī rājaṃs tvayā hīnā na rājate /
GE09ram_02pu:4003: hīnacandreva rajanī nagarī pratibhāti mām // Ram_2,70.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4005: abravīd vacanaṃ bhūyo vasiṣṭhas tu mahān ṛṣiḥ // Ram_2,70.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4007: tāny avyagraṃ mahābāho kriyantām avicāritam // Ram_2,70.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4010: ye tv agrato narendrasya agnyagārād bahiṣkṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4011: ṛtvigbhir yājakaiś caiva te hriyante yathāvidhi // Ram_2,70.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4013: bāṣpakaṇṭhā vimanasas tam ūhuḥ paricārakāḥ // Ram_2,70.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4014: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4015: prakiranto janā mārgaṃ nṛpater agrato yayuḥ // Ram_2,70.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4017: devadārūṇi cāhṛtya citāṃ cakrus tathāpare // Ram_2,70.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4018: gandhān uccāvacāṃś cānyāṃs tatra dattvātha bhūmipam /
GE09ram_02pu:4019: tataḥ saṃveśayāmāsuś citāmadhye tam ṛtvijaḥ // Ram_2,70.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4020: tathā hutāśanaṃ hutvā jepus tasya tadartvijaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4021: jaguś ca te yathāśāstraṃ tatra sāmāni sāmagāḥ // Ram_2,70.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4022: śibikābhiś ca yānaiś ca yathārhaṃ tasya yoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4023: nagarān niryayus tatra vṛddhaiḥ parivṛtās tadā // Ram_2,70.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4024: prasavyaṃ cāpi taṃ cakrur ṛtvijo 'gnicitaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02pu:4025: striyaś ca śokasaṃtaptāḥ kausalyāpramukhās tadā // Ram_2,70.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4026: krauñcīnām iva nārīṇāṃ ninādas tatra śuśruve /
GE09ram_02pu:4027: ārtānāṃ karuṇaṃ kāle krośantīnāṃ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,70.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4028: tato rudantyo vivaśā vilapya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4030: kṛtodakaṃ te bharatena sārdhaṃ nṛpāṅganā mantripurohitāś ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4031: puraṃ praviśyāśruparītanetrā bhūmau daśāhaṃ vyanayanta duḥkham //
GE09ram_02pu:4034: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau ratnaṃ dhanam annaṃ ca puṣkalam /
GE09ram_02pu:4035: bāstikaṃ bahuśuklaṃ ca gāś cāpi śataśas tathā // Ram_2,71.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4036: dāsīdāsaṃ ca yānaṃ ca veśmāni sumahānti ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4037: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau putro rājñas tasyaurdhvadaihikam // Ram_2,71.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4041: citāmūle pitur vākyam idam āha suduḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,71.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4042: tāta yasmin nisṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayā bhrātari rāghave /
GE09ram_02pu:4043: tasmin vanaṃ pravrajite śūnye tyakto 'smy ahaṃ tvayā // Ram_2,71.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4045: tām ambāṃ tāta kausalyāṃ tyaktvā tvaṃ kva gato nṛpa // Ram_2,71.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4047: pituḥ śarīranirvāṇaṃ niṣṭanan viṣasāda ha // Ram_2,71.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4048: sa tu dṛṣṭvā rudan dīnaḥ papāta dharaṇītale /
GE09ram_02pu:4049: utthāpyamānaḥ śakrasya yantradhvaja iva cyutaḥ // Ram_2,71.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4051: antakāle nipatitaṃ yayātim ṛṣayo yathā // Ram_2,71.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4053: visaṃjño nyapatad bhūmau bhūmipālam anusmaran // Ram_2,71.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4055: smṛtvā pitur guṇāṅgāni tāni tāni tadā tadā // Ram_2,71.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4058: sukumāraṃ ca bālaṃ ca satataṃ lālitaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:4059: kva tāta bharataṃ hitvā vilapantaṃ gato bhavān // Ram_2,71.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4060: nanu bhojyeṣu pāneṣu vastreṣv ābharaṇeṣu ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4061: pravārayasi naḥ sarvāṃs tan naḥ ko 'dya kariṣyati // Ram_2,71.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4063: vihīnā yā tvayā rājñā dharmajñena mahātmanā // Ram_2,71.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4064: pitari svargam āpanne rāme cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02pu:4065: kiṃ me jīvitasāmarthyaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam // Ram_2,71.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4066: hīno bhrātrā ca pitrā ca śūnyām ikṣvākupālitām /
GE09ram_02pu:4067: ayodhyāṃ na pravekṣyāmi pravekṣyāmi tapovanam // Ram_2,71.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4068: tayor vilapitaṃ śrutvā vyasanaṃ cānvavekṣya tat /
GE09ram_02pu:4069: bhṛśam ārtatarā bhūyaḥ sarva evānugāminaḥ // Ram_2,71.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4070: tato viṣaṇṇau śrāntau ca śatrughnabharatāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02pu:4072: tataḥ prakṛtimān vaidyaḥ pitur eṣāṃ purohitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4073: vasiṣṭho bharataṃ vākyam utthāpya tam uvāca ha // Ram_2,71.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4075: teṣu cāparihāryeṣu naivaṃ bhavitum arhati // Ram_2,71.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:4081: amātyās tvarayanti sma tanayau cāparāḥ kriyāḥ // Ram_2,71.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:4083: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,72.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4084: gatir yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ duḥkhe kiṃ punar ātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4085: sa rāmaḥ sattvasampannaḥ striyā pravrājito vanam // Ram_2,72.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4086: balavān vīryasampanno lakṣmaṇo nāma yo 'py asau /
GE09ram_02pu:4087: kiṃ na mocayate rāmaṃ kṛtvāpi pitṛnigraham // Ram_2,72.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4088: pūrvam eva tu nigrāhyaḥ samavekṣya nayānayau /
GE09ram_02pu:4089: utpathaṃ yaḥ samārūḍho nāryā rājā vaśaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,72.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4094: tāṃ samīkṣya tadā dvāḥstho bhṛśaṃ pāpasya kāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02pu:4096: yasyāḥ kṛte vane rāmo nyastadehaś ca vaḥ pitā /
GE09ram_02pu:4097: seyaṃ pāpā nṛśaṃsā ca tasyāḥ kuru yathāmati // Ram_2,72.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4098: śatrughnaś ca tad ājñāya vacanaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4099: antaḥpuracarān sarvān ity uvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // Ram_2,72.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4100: tīvram utpāditaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ me tathā pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4101: yayā seyaṃ nṛśaṃsasya karmaṇaḥ phalam aśnutām // Ram_2,72.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4103: gṛhītā balavat kubjā sā tadgṛham anādayat // Ram_2,72.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4105: kruddham ājñāya śatrughnaṃ vyapalāyata sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,72.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4107: yathāyaṃ samupakrānto niḥśeṣaṃ naḥ kariṣyati // Ram_2,72.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4108: sānukrośāṃ vadānyāṃ ca dharmajñāṃ ca yaśasvinīm /
GE09ram_02pu:4109: kausalyāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmaḥ sā hi no 'stu dhruvā gatiḥ // Ram_2,72.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4110: sa ca roṣeṇa tāmrākṣaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4111: vicakarṣa tadā kubjāṃ krośantīṃ pṛthivītale // Ram_2,72.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4112: tasyā hy ākṛṣyamāṇāyā mantharāyās tatas tataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4113: citraṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tad vyaśīryata // Ram_2,72.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4115: aśobhata tadā bhūyaḥ śāradaṃ gaganaṃ yathā // Ram_2,72.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4116: sa balī balavat krodhād gṛhītvā puruṣarṣabhaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4117: kaikeyīm abhinirbhartsya babhāṣe paruṣaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,72.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4118: tair vākyaiḥ paruṣair duḥkhaiḥ kaikeyī bhṛśaduḥkhitā /
GE09ram_02pu:4120: tāṃ prekṣya bharataḥ kruddhaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:4121: avadhyāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pramadāḥ kṣamyatām iti // Ram_2,72.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4122: hanyām aham imāṃ pāpāṃ kaikeyīṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02pu:4123: yadi māṃ dhārmiko rāmo nāsūyen mātṛghātakam // Ram_2,72.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4124: imām api hatāṃ kubjāṃ yadi jānāti rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4125: tvāṃ ca māṃ caiva dharmātmā nābhibhāṣiṣyate dhruvam // Ram_2,72.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:4127: nyavartata tato roṣāt tāṃ mumoca ca mantharām // Ram_2,72.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:4128: sā pādamūle kaikeyyā mantharā nipapāta ha /
GE09ram_02pu:4129: niḥśvasantī suduḥkhārtā kṛpaṇaṃ vilalāpa ca // Ram_2,72.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:4131: śanaiḥ samāśvāsayad ārtarūpāṃ krauñcīṃ vilagnām iva vīkṣamāṇām //
GE09ram_02pu:4133: sametya rājakartāro bharataṃ vākyam abruvan // Ram_2,73.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4134: gato daśarathaḥ svargaṃ yo no gurutaro guruḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4135: rāmaṃ pravrājya vai jyeṣṭhaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // Ram_2,73.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4136: tvam adya bhava no rājā rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4137: saṃgatyā nāparādhnoti rājyam etad anāyakam // Ram_2,73.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4139: pratīkṣate tvāṃ svajanaḥ śreṇayaś ca nṛpātmaja // Ram_2,73.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4141: abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ pāhi cāsmān nararṣabha // Ram_2,73.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4143: bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // Ram_2,73.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4144: jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4145: naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ // Ram_2,73.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4146: rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4147: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca // Ram_2,73.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4149: ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt // Ram_2,73.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4151: puraskṛtya gamiṣyāmi rāmahetor vanaṃ prati // Ram_2,73.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4153: āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt // Ram_2,73.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4154: na sakāmāṃ kariṣyāmi svām imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm /
GE09ram_02pu:4155: vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,73.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4156: kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4159: pratyuvāca janaḥ sarvaḥ śrīmadvākyam anuttamam // Ram_2,73.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4160: evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām /
GE09ram_02pu:4161: yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi // Ram_2,73.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4162: anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4163: praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo nipetur āryānananetrasambhavāḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:4164: ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4165: panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ
GE09ram_02pu:4167: svakarmābhiratāḥ śūrāḥ khanakā yantrakās tathā // Ram_2,74.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4169: tathā vardhakayaś caiva mārgiṇo vṛkṣatakṣakāḥ // Ram_2,74.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4171: samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire // Ram_2,74.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4172: sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān /
GE09ram_02pu:4176: latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4177: janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān // Ram_2,74.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4178: avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu kecid vṛkṣān aropayan /
GE09ram_02pu:4179: kecit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kvacit kvacit // Ram_2,74.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4181: vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ // Ram_2,74.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4183: nimnabhāgāṃs tathā kecit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ // Ram_2,74.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4184: babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:4185: bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā // Ram_2,74.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4192: bahv aśobhata senāyāḥ panthāḥ svargapathopamaḥ // Ram_2,74.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4195: yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4196: bhūyas taṃ śobhayāmāsur bhūṣābhir bhūṣaṇopamam // Ram_2,74.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4204: samucchritair niveśās te babhuḥ śakrapuropamāḥ // Ram_2,74.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4207: sacandratārāgaṇamaṇḍitaṃ yathā nabhaḥ kṣapāyām amalaṃ virājate /
GE09ram_02pu:4208: narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:4212: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān // Ram_2,75.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4213: sa tūryaghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva /
GE09ram_02pu:4214: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bhūyaḥ śokair arandhrayat // Ram_2,75.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4215: tataḥ prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4216: nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt // Ram_2,75.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4218: visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,75.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4220: paribhramati rājaśrīr naur ivākarṇikā jale // Ram_2,75.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4221: ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam /
GE09ram_02pu:4222: kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā // Ram_2,75.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4226: sudharmām iva dharmātmā sagaṇaḥ pratyapadyata // Ram_2,75.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4228: adhyāsta sarvavedajño dūtān anuśaśāsa ca // Ram_2,75.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4230: kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ // Ram_2,75.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4232: rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām // Ram_2,75.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4234: pratyanandan prakṛtayo yathā daśarathaṃ tathā // Ram_2,75.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4236: daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā // Ram_2,75.14
GE09ram_02pu:4238: dadarśa buddhisampannaḥ pūrṇacandrāṃ niśām iva // Ram_2,76.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4241: rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit /
GE09ram_02pu:4242: idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt // Ram_2,76.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4243: tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran /
GE09ram_02pu:4244: dhanadhānyavatīṃ sphītāṃ pradāya pṛthivīṃ tava // Ram_2,76.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4245: rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran /
GE09ram_02pu:4246: nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ // Ram_2,76.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4247: pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02pu:4248: tad bhuṅkṣva muditāmātyaḥ kṣipram evābhiṣecaya // Ram_2,76.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4249: udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4250: koṭyāparāntāḥ sāmudrā ratnāny abhiharantu te // Ram_2,76.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4252: jagāma manasā rāmaṃ dharmajño dharmakāṅkṣayā // Ram_2,76.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4254: vilalāpa sabhāmadhye jagarhe ca purohitam // Ram_2,76.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4256: dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret // Ram_2,76.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4258: rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi // Ram_2,76.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4260: labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā // Ram_2,76.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4261: anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi /
GE09ram_02pu:4262: ikṣvākūṇām ahaṃ loke bhaveyaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ // Ram_2,76.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4263: yaddhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye /
GE09ram_02pu:4265: rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4266: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati // Ram_2,76.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4267: tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4268: harṣān mumucur aśrūṇi rāme nihitacetasaḥ // Ram_2,76.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4269: yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt /
GE09ram_02pu:4270: vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā // Ram_2,76.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4273: evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4275: tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt /
GE09ram_02pu:4276: yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya // Ram_2,76.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4277: evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02pu:4278: prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat // Ram_2,76.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4279: tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4280: śrutvā yātrāṃ samājñaptāṃ rāghavasya nivartane // Ram_2,76.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:4281: tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartṝn sarvān gṛhe gṛhe /
GE09ram_02pu:4282: yātrāgamanam ājñāya tvarayanti sma harṣitāḥ // Ram_2,76.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:4283: te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4284: saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan // Ram_2,76.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:4285: sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau /
GE09ram_02pu:4286: rathaṃ me tvarayasveti sumantraṃ pārśvato 'bravīt // Ram_2,76.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:4288: rathaṃ gṛhītvā prayayau yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ // Ram_2,76.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:4289: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4290: guruṃ mahāraṇyagataṃ yaśasvinaṃ prasādayiṣyan bharato 'bravīt tadā //
GE09ram_02pu:4291: tūrṇaṃ samutthāya sumantra gaccha balasya yogāya balapradhānān /
GE09ram_02pu:4292: ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya //
GE09ram_02pu:4293: sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4294: śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca //
GE09ram_02pu:4295: tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4296: ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca nāgān hayāṃś caiva kulaprasūtān //
GE09ram_02pu:4300: adhiruhya hayair yuktān rathān sūryarathopamān // Ram_2,77.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4304: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // Ram_2,77.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4306: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // Ram_2,77.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4307: kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02pu:4310: tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ // Ram_2,77.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4312: kadā drakṣyāmahe rāmaṃ jagataḥ śokanāśanam // Ram_2,77.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4313: dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4314: tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ // Ram_2,77.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4315: ity evaṃ kathayantas te samprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4316: pariṣvajānāś cānyonyaṃ yayur nāgarikās tadā // Ram_2,77.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4317: ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4318: rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā // Ram_2,77.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4319: maṇikārāś ca ye kecit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4320: sūtrakarmakṛtaś caiva ye ca śastropajīvinaḥ // Ram_2,77.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4324: snāpakācchādakā vaidyā dhūpakāḥ śauṇḍikās tathā // Ram_2,77.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4326: śailūṣāś ca saha strībhir yānti kaivartakās tathā // Ram_2,77.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4328: gorathair bharataṃ yāntam anujagmuḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,77.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4330: sarve te vividhair yānaiḥ śanair bharatam anvayuḥ // Ram_2,77.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4333: nirīkṣyānugatāṃ senāṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ śivodakām /
GE09ram_02pu:4334: bharataḥ sacivān sarvān abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // Ram_2,77.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4336: viśrāntāḥ pratariṣyāmaḥ śva idānīṃ mahānadīm // Ram_2,77.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4337: dātuṃ ca tāvad icchāmi svar gatasya mahīpateḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4340: nyaveśayaṃs tāṃś chandena svena svena pṛthakpṛthak // Ram_2,77.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:4341: niveśya gaṅgām anu tāṃ mahānadīṃ camūṃ vidhānaiḥ paribarhaśobhinīm /
GE09ram_02pu:4342: uvāsa rāmasya tadā mahātmano vicintayāno bharato nivartanam // Ram_2,77.23
GE09ram_02pu:4343: tato niviṣṭāṃ dhvajinīṃ gaṅgām anvāśritāṃ nadīm /
GE09ram_02pu:4347: sa eṣa hi mahākāyaḥ kovidāradhvajo rathe /
GE09ram_02pu:4348: bandhayiṣyati vā dāśān atha vāsmān vadhiṣyati // Ram_2,78.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4349: atha dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ pitrā rājyād vivāsitam /
GE09ram_02pu:4351: bhartā caiva sakhā caiva rāmo dāśarathir mama /
GE09ram_02pu:4353: tiṣṭhantu sarvadāśāś ca gaṅgām anvāśritā nadīm /
GE09ram_02pu:4355: nāvāṃ śatānāṃ pañcānāṃ kaivartānāṃ śataṃ śatam /
GE09ram_02pu:4356: saṃnaddhānāṃ tathā yūnāṃ tiṣṭhantv ity abhyacodayat // Ram_2,78.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4357: yadā tuṣṭas tu bharato rāmasyeha bhaviṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:4358: seyaṃ svastimayī senā gaṅgām adya tariṣyati // Ram_2,78.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4361: tam āyāntaṃ tu samprekṣya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02pu:4364: kuśalo daṇḍakāraṇye vṛddho bhrātuś ca te sakhā // Ram_2,78.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4365: tasmāt paśyatu kākutstha tvāṃ niṣādādhipo guhaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4366: asaṃśayaṃ vijānīte yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_2,78.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4367: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sumantrād bharataḥ śubham /
GE09ram_02pu:4368: uvāca vacanaṃ śīghraṃ guhaḥ paśyatu mām iti // Ram_2,78.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4370: āgamya bharataṃ prahvo guho vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,78.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4371: niṣkuṭaś caiva deśo 'yaṃ vañcitāś cāpi te vayam /
GE09ram_02pu:4372: nivedayāmas te sarve svake dāśakule vasa // Ram_2,78.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4373: asti mūlaṃ phalaṃ caiva niṣādaiḥ samupāhṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:4374: ārdraṃ ca māṃsaṃ śuṣkaṃ ca vanyaṃ coccāvacaṃ mahat // Ram_2,78.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4376: arcito vividhaiḥ kāmaiḥ śvaḥ sasainyo gamiṣyasi // Ram_2,78.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4377: evam uktas tu bharato niṣādādhipatiṃ guham /
GE09ram_02pu:4379: ūrjitaḥ khalu te kāmaḥ kṛto mama guroḥ sakhe /
GE09ram_02pu:4380: yo me tvam īdṛśīṃ senām eko 'bhyarcitum icchasi // Ram_2,79.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4381: ity uktvā tu mahātejā guhaṃ vacanam uttamam /
GE09ram_02pu:4382: abravīd bharataḥ śrīmān niṣādādhipatiṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,79.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4384: gahano 'yaṃ bhṛśaṃ deśo gaṅgānūpo duratyayaḥ // Ram_2,79.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4386: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ guho gahanagocaraḥ // Ram_2,79.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4390: iyaṃ te mahatī senā śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me // Ram_2,79.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4391: tam evam abhibhāṣantam ākāśa iva nirmalaḥ /
