GE09ram_02pu:4392: bharataḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,79.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4393: mā bhūt sa kālo yat kaṣṭaṃ na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:4394: rāghavaḥ sa hi me bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo mama // Ram_2,79.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4396: buddhir anyā na te kāryā guha satyaṃ bravīmi te // Ram_2,79.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4398: punar evābravīd vākyaṃ bharataṃ prati harṣitaḥ // Ram_2,79.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4399: dhanyas tvaṃ na tvayā tulyaṃ paśyāmi jagatītale /
GE09ram_02pu:4400: ayatnād āgataṃ rājyaṃ yas tvaṃ tyaktum ihecchasi // Ram_2,79.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4401: śāśvatī khalu te kīrtir lokān anucariṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:4402: yas tvaṃ kṛcchragataṃ rāmaṃ pratyānayitum icchasi // Ram_2,79.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4404: babhau naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // Ram_2,79.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4405: saṃniveśya sa tāṃ senāṃ guhena paritoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4406: śatrughnena saha śrīmāñ śayanaṃ punar āgamat // Ram_2,79.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4408: upasthito hy anarhasya dharmaprekṣasya tādṛśaḥ // Ram_2,79.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4412: yathā sūryāṃśusaṃtapto himavān prasruto himam // Ram_2,79.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4417: guhena sārdhaṃ bharataḥ samāgato mahānubhāvaḥ sajanaḥ samāhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4418: sudurmanās taṃ bharataṃ tadā punar guhaḥ samāśvāsayad agrajaṃ prati //
GE09ram_02pu:4422: bhrātṛguptyartham atyantam ahaṃ lakṣmaṇam abruvam // Ram_2,80.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4423: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā /
GE09ram_02pu:4425: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvo duḥkhānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4426: dharmātmaṃs tasya guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmahe vayam // Ram_2,80.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4427: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana /
GE09ram_02pu:4428: motsuko bhūr bravīmy etad apy asatyaṃ tavāgrataḥ // Ram_2,80.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4429: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4430: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // Ram_2,80.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4431: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02pu:4432: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvaiḥ svair jñātibhiḥ saha // Ram_2,80.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4433: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02pu:4434: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ prasahema vayaṃ yudhi // Ram_2,80.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4436: anunītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // Ram_2,80.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4437: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02pu:4438: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // Ram_2,80.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4439: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi /
GE09ram_02pu:4440: taṃ paśya guha saṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // Ram_2,80.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4441: mahatā tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4443: asmin pravrājite rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:4444: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,80.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4447: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama /
GE09ram_02pu:4448: nāśaṃse yadi te sarve jīveyuḥ śarvarīm imām // Ram_2,80.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4449: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā /
GE09ram_02pu:4450: duḥkhitā yā tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,80.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4452: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,80.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4453: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite /
GE09ram_02pu:4460: sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // Ram_2,80.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4462: nivṛtte samaye hy asmin sukhitāḥ praviśemahi // Ram_2,80.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:4465: prabhāte vimale sūrye kārayitvā jaṭā ubhau /
GE09ram_02pu:4466: asmin bhāgīrathītīre sukhaṃ saṃtāritau mayā // Ram_2,80.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:4468: vareṣucāpāsidharau paraṃtapau vyavekṣamāṇau saha sītayā gatau //
GE09ram_02pu:4469: guhasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharato bhṛśam apriyam /
GE09ram_02pu:4470: dhyānaṃ jagāma tatraiva yatra tac chrutam apriyam // Ram_2,81.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4474: papāta sahasā totrair hṛdi viddha iva dvipaḥ // Ram_2,81.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4477: tataḥ sarvāḥ samāpetur mātaro bharatasya tāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4479: tāś ca taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyaḥ paryavārayan /
GE09ram_02pu:4480: kausalyā tv anusṛtyainaṃ durmanāḥ pariṣasvaje // Ram_2,81.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4481: vatsalā svaṃ yathā vatsam upagūhya tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02pu:4483: putra vyādhir na te kaccic charīraṃ paribādhate /
GE09ram_02pu:4484: adya rājakulasyāsya tvadadhīnaṃ hi jīvitam // Ram_2,81.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4485: tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā putra jīvāmi rāme sabhrātṛke gate /
GE09ram_02pu:4486: vṛtte daśarathe rājñi nātha ekas tvam adya naḥ // Ram_2,81.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4487: kaccin na lakṣmaṇe putra śrutaṃ te kiṃcid apriyam /
GE09ram_02pu:4488: putra vā hy ekaputrāyāḥ sahabhārye vanaṃ gate // Ram_2,81.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4489: sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya rudann eva mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4490: kausalyāṃ parisāntvyedaṃ guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,81.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4491: bhrātā me kvāvasad rātriṃ kva sītā kva ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4492: asvapac chayane kasmin kiṃ bhuktvā guha śaṃsa me // Ram_2,81.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4494: yadvidhaṃ pratipede ca rāme priyahite 'tithau // Ram_2,81.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4495: annam uccāvacaṃ bhakṣāḥ phalāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4498: na hi tat pratyagṛhṇāt sa kṣatradharmam anusmaran // Ram_2,81.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4499: na hy asmābhiḥ pratigrāhyaṃ sakhe deyaṃ tu sarvadā /
GE09ram_02pu:4500: iti tena vayaṃ rājann anunītā mahātmanā // Ram_2,81.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4502: aupavāsyaṃ tadākārṣīd rāghavaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_2,81.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4503: tatas tu jalaśeṣeṇa lakṣmaṇo 'py akarot tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:4504: vāgyatās te trayaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata samāhitāḥ // Ram_2,81.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4505: saumitris tu tataḥ paścād akarot svāstaraṃ śubham /
GE09ram_02pu:4506: svayam ānīya barhīṃṣi kṣipraṃ rāghavakāraṇāt // Ram_2,81.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4507: tasmin samāviśad rāmaḥ svāstare saha sītayā /
GE09ram_02pu:4508: prakṣālya ca tayoḥ pādāv apacakrāma lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,81.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4509: etat tad iṅgudīmūlam idam eva ca tat tṛṇam /
GE09ram_02pu:4510: yasmin rāmaś ca sītā ca rātriṃ tāṃ śayitāv ubhau // Ram_2,81.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4511: niyamya pṛṣṭhe tu talāṅgulitravāñ śaraiḥ supūrṇāv iṣudhī paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4512: mahad dhanuḥ sajyam upohya lakṣmaṇo niśām atiṣṭhat parito 'sya kevalam //
GE09ram_02pu:4513: tatas tv ahaṃ cottamabāṇacāpadhṛk sthito 'bhavaṃ tatra sa yatra lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02pu:4514: atandribhir jñātibhir āttakārmukair mahendrakalpaṃ paripālayaṃs tadā //
GE09ram_02pu:4515: tac chrutvā nipuṇaṃ sarvaṃ bharataḥ saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4516: iṅgudīmūlam āgamya rāmaśayyām avekṣya tām // Ram_2,82.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4517: abravīj jananīḥ sarvā iha tena mahātmanā /
GE09ram_02pu:4518: śarvarī śayitā bhūmāv idam asya vimarditam // Ram_2,82.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4520: jāto daśarathenorvyāṃ na rāmaḥ svaptum arhati // Ram_2,82.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4522: śayitvā puruṣavyāghraḥ kathaṃ śete mahītale // Ram_2,82.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4530: gāthābhir anurūpābhiḥ stutibhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_2,82.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4531: aśraddheyam idaṃ loke na satyaṃ pratibhāti mā /
GE09ram_02pu:4532: muhyate khalu me bhāvaḥ svapno 'yam iti me matiḥ // Ram_2,82.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4533: na nūnaṃ daivataṃ kiṃcit kālena balavattaram /
GE09ram_02pu:4534: yatra dāśarathī rāmo bhūmāv evaṃ śayīta saḥ // Ram_2,82.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4536: dayitā śayitā bhūmau snuṣā daśarathasya ca // Ram_2,82.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4537: iyaṃ śayyā mama bhrātur idaṃ hi parivartitam /
GE09ram_02pu:4538: sthaṇḍile kaṭhine sarvaṃ gātrair vimṛditaṃ tṛṇam // Ram_2,82.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4539: manye sābharaṇā suptā sītāsmiñ śayane tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:4540: tatra tatra hi dṛśyante saktāḥ kanakabindavaḥ // Ram_2,82.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4542: tathā hy ete prakāśante saktāḥ kauśeyatantavaḥ // Ram_2,82.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4543: manye bhartuḥ sukhā śayyā yena bālā tapasvinī /
GE09ram_02pu:4544: sukumārī satī duḥkhaṃ na vijānāti maithilī // Ram_2,82.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4546: sarvalokapriyas tyaktvā rājyaṃ priyam anuttamam // Ram_2,82.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4548: sukhabhāgī ca duḥkhārhaḥ śayito bhuvi rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,82.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4549: siddhārthā khalu vaidehī patiṃ yānugatā vanam /
GE09ram_02pu:4550: vayaṃ saṃśayitāḥ sarve hīnās tena mahātmanā // Ram_2,82.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4552: gate daśarathe svarge rāme cāraṇyam āśrite // Ram_2,82.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4553: na ca prārthayate kaścin manasāpi vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02pu:4558: śatravo nābhimanyante bhakṣān viṣakṛtān iva // Ram_2,82.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:4559: adya prabhṛti bhūmau tu śayiṣye 'haṃ tṛṇeṣu vā /
GE09ram_02pu:4561: tasyārtham uttaraṃ kālaṃ nivatsyāmi sukhaṃ vane /
GE09ram_02pu:4562: taṃ pratiśravam āmucya nāsya mithyā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,82.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:4564: lakṣmaṇena saha tv āryo ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati // Ram_2,82.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:4566: api me devatāḥ kuryur imaṃ satyaṃ manoratham // Ram_2,82.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:4567: prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mayā svayaṃ bahuprakāraṃ yadi na prapatsyate /
GE09ram_02pu:4568: tato 'nuvatsyāmi cirāya rāghavaṃ vane vasan nārhati mām upekṣitum //
GE09ram_02pu:4569: vyuṣya rātriṃ tu tatraiva gaṅgākūle sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4570: bharataḥ kālyam utthāya śatrughnam idam abravīt // Ram_2,83.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4572: śīghram ānaya bhadraṃ te tārayiṣyati vāhinīm // Ram_2,83.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4574: ity evam abravīd bhrātrā śatrughno 'pi pracoditaḥ // Ram_2,83.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4576: āgamya prāñjaliḥ kāle guho bharatam abravīt // Ram_2,83.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4578: kaccic ca saha sainyasya tava sarvam anāmayam // Ram_2,83.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4579: guhasya tat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād udīritam /
GE09ram_02pu:4581: sukhā naḥ śarvarī rājan pūjitāś cāpi te vayam /
GE09ram_02pu:4582: gaṅgāṃ tu naubhir bahvībhir dāśāḥ saṃtārayantu naḥ // Ram_2,83.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4584: pratipraviśya nagaraṃ taṃ jñātijanam abravīt // Ram_2,83.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4585: uttiṣṭhata prabudhyadhvaṃ bhadram astu hi vaḥ sadā /
GE09ram_02pu:4588: pañca nāvāṃ śatāny eva samāninyuḥ samantataḥ // Ram_2,83.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4592: sanandighoṣāṃ kalyāṇīṃ guho nāvam upāharat // Ram_2,83.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4593: tām āruroha bharataḥ śatrughnaś ca mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4594: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // Ram_2,83.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4595: purohitaś ca tat pūrvaṃ gurave brāhmaṇāś ca ye /
GE09ram_02pu:4598: bhāṇḍāni cādadānānāṃ ghoṣas tridivam aspṛśat // Ram_2,83.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4599: patākinyas tu tā nāvaḥ svayaṃ dāśair adhiṣṭhitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4600: vahantyo janam ārūḍhaṃ tadā saṃpetur āśugāḥ // Ram_2,83.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4601: nārīṇām abhipūrṇās tu kāścit kāścit tu vājinām /
GE09ram_02pu:4602: kaścit tatra vahanti sma yānayugyaṃ mahādhanam // Ram_2,83.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4603: tāḥ sma gatvā paraṃ tīram avaropya ca taṃ janam /
GE09ram_02pu:4606: tarantaḥ sma prakāśante sadhvajā iva parvatāḥ // Ram_2,83.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4607: nāvaś cāruruhus tv anye plavais terus tathāpare /
GE09ram_02pu:4608: anye kumbhaghaṭais terur anye teruś ca bāhubhiḥ // Ram_2,83.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4609: sā puṇyā dhvajinī gaṅgāṃ dāśaiḥ saṃtāritā svayam /
GE09ram_02pu:4610: maitre muhūrte prayayau prayāgavanam uttamam // Ram_2,83.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4611: āśvāsayitvā ca camūṃ mahātmā niveśayitvā ca yathopajoṣam /
GE09ram_02pu:4612: draṣṭuṃ bharadvājam ṛṣipravaryam ṛtvigvṛtaḥ san bharataḥ pratasthe //
GE09ram_02pu:4614: balaṃ sarvam avasthāpya jagāma saha mantribhiḥ // Ram_2,84.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4616: vasāno vāsasī kṣaume purodhāya purohitam // Ram_2,84.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4618: mantriṇas tān avasthāpya jagāmānu purohitam // Ram_2,84.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4620: saṃcacālāsanāt tūrṇaṃ śiṣyān arghyam iti bruvan // Ram_2,84.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4622: abudhyata mahātejāḥ sutaṃ daśarathasya tam // Ram_2,84.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4623: tābhyām arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca dattvā paścāt phalāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4624: ānupūrvyāc ca dharmajñaḥ papraccha kuśalaṃ kule // Ram_2,84.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4625: ayodhyāyāṃ bale kośe mitreṣv api ca mantriṣu /
GE09ram_02pu:4626: jānan daśarathaṃ vṛttaṃ na rājānam udāharat // Ram_2,84.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4631: kim ihāgamane kāryaṃ tava rājyaṃ praśāsataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4632: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ // Ram_2,84.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4634: bhrātrā saha sabhāryo yaś ciraṃ pravrājito vanam // Ram_2,84.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4636: vanavāsī bhavetīha samāḥ kila caturdaśa // Ram_2,84.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4637: kaccin na tasyāpāpasya pāpaṃ kartum ihecchasi /
GE09ram_02pu:4638: akaṇṭakaṃ bhoktumanā rājyaṃ tasyānujasya ca // Ram_2,84.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4639: evam ukto bharadvājaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02pu:4641: hato 'smi yadi mām evaṃ bhagavān api manyate /
GE09ram_02pu:4642: matto na doṣam āśaṅker naivaṃ mām anuśādhi hi // Ram_2,84.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4643: na caitad iṣṭaṃ mātā me yad avocan madantare /
GE09ram_02pu:4644: nāham etena tuṣṭaś ca na tad vacanam ādade // Ram_2,84.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4645: ahaṃ tu taṃ naravyāghram upayātaḥ prasādakaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4646: pratinetum ayodhyāṃ ca pādau tasyābhivanditum // Ram_2,84.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4647: tvaṃ mām evaṃ gataṃ matvā prasādaṃ kartum arhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:4648: śaṃsa me bhagavan rāmaḥ kva samprati mahīpatiḥ // Ram_2,84.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4649: uvāca taṃ bharadvājaḥ prasādād bharataṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4651: guruvṛttir damaś caiva sādhūnāṃ cānuyāyitā // Ram_2,84.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4652: jāne caitan manaḥsthaṃ te dṛḍhīkaraṇam astv iti /
GE09ram_02pu:4653: apṛcchaṃ tvāṃ tavātyarthaṃ kīrtiṃ samabhivardhayan // Ram_2,84.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4654: asau vasati te bhrātā citrakūṭe mahāgirau /
GE09ram_02pu:4655: śvas tu gantāsi taṃ deśaṃ vasādya saha mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4656: etaṃ me kuru suprājña kāmaṃ kāmārthakovida // Ram_2,84.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4657: tatas tathety evam udāradarśanaḥ pratītarūpo bharato 'bravīd vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4658: cakāra buddhiṃ ca tadā mahāśrame niśānivāsāya narādhipātmajaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:4659: kṛtabuddhiṃ nivāsāya tathaiva sa munis tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:4661: abravīd bharatas tv enaṃ nanv idaṃ bhavatā kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:4662: pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ vane yad upapadyate // Ram_2,85.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4664: jāne tvāṃ prītisaṃyuktaṃ tuṣyes tvaṃ yena kenacit // Ram_2,85.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4665: senāyās tu tavaitasyāḥ kartum icchāmi bhojanam /
GE09ram_02pu:4666: mama prītir yathārūpā tvam arho manujarṣabha // Ram_2,85.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4667: kimarthaṃ cāpi nikṣipya dūre balam ihāgataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4671: vājimukhyā manuṣyāś ca mattāś ca varavāraṇāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4672: pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmiṃ bhagavann anuyānti mām // Ram_2,85.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4673: te vṛkṣān udakaṃ bhūmim āśrameṣūṭajāṃs tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:4674: na hiṃsyur iti tenāham eka evāgatas tataḥ // Ram_2,85.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4676: tathā tu cakre bharataḥ senāyāḥ samupāgamam // Ram_2,85.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:4679: āhvaye viśvakarmāṇam ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram eva ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4680: ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi tatra me saṃvidhīyatām // Ram_2,85.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4681: prāksrotasaś ca yā nadyaḥ pratyaksrotasa eva ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4682: pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca samāyāntv adya sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,85.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4683: anyāḥ sravantu maireyaṃ surām anyāḥ suniṣṭhitām /
GE09ram_02pu:4686: tathaivāpsaraso devīr gandharvīś cāpi sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,85.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4688: śakraṃ yāś copatiṣṭhanti brahmāṇaṃ yāś ca bhāminīḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4689: sarvās tumburuṇā sārdham āhvaye saparicchadāḥ // Ram_2,85.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4690: vanaṃ kuruṣu yad divyaṃ vāso bhūṣaṇapattravat /
GE09ram_02pu:4691: divyanārīphalaṃ śaśvat tat kauberam ihaiva tu // Ram_2,85.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4692: iha me bhagavān somo vidhattām annam uttamam /
GE09ram_02pu:4693: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu // Ram_2,85.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4695: surādīni ca peyāni māṃsāni vividhāni ca // Ram_2,85.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4699: ājagmus tāni sarvāṇi daivatāni pṛthakpṛthak // Ram_2,85.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4701: upaspṛśya vavau yuktyā supriyātmā sukhaḥ śivaḥ // Ram_2,85.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4703: devadundubhighoṣaś ca dikṣu sarvāsu śuśruve // Ram_2,85.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:4705: prajagur devagandharvā vīṇāḥ pramumucuḥ svarān // Ram_2,85.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:4706: sa śabdo dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca prāṇināṃ śravaṇāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4708: tasminn uparate śabde divye śrotrasukhe nṛṇām /
GE09ram_02pu:4709: dadarśa bhārataṃ sainyaṃ vidhānaṃ viśvakarmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,85.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:4710: babhūva hi samā bhūmiḥ samantāt pañcayojanam /
GE09ram_02pu:4712: tasmin bilvāḥ kapitthāś ca panasā bījapūrakāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4713: āmalakyo babhūvuś ca cūtāś ca phalabhūṣaṇāḥ // Ram_2,85.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:4715: ājagāma nadī divyā tīrajair bahubhir vṛtā // Ram_2,85.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:4725: veśma tad ratnasampūrṇaṃ bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ // Ram_2,85.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:4726: anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4727: babhūvuś ca mudā yuktās taṃ dṛṣṭvā veśmasaṃvidhim // Ram_2,85.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:4728: tatra rājāsanaṃ divyaṃ vyajanaṃ chattram eva ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4729: bharato mantribhiḥ sārdham abhyavartata rājavat // Ram_2,85.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:4733: tataḥ senāpatiḥ paścāt praśāstā ca niṣedatuḥ // Ram_2,85.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:4737: ramyāś cāvasathā divyā brahmaṇas tu prasādajāḥ // Ram_2,85.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:4739: āgur viṃśatisāhasrā brahmaṇā prahitāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,85.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:4742: yābhir gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate /
GE09ram_02pu:4747: upānṛtyaṃs tu bharataṃ bharadvājasya śāsanāt // Ram_2,85.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:4748: yāni mālyāni deveṣu yāni caitrarathe vane /
GE09ram_02pu:4749: prayāge tāny adṛśyanta bharadvājasya śāsanāt // Ram_2,85.45 //
GE09ram_02pu:4751: aśvatthā nartakāś cāsan bharadvājasya tejasā // Ram_2,85.46 //
GE09ram_02pu:4753: prahṛṣṭās tatra saṃpetuḥ kubjā bhūtvātha vāmanāḥ // Ram_2,85.47 //
GE09ram_02pu:4754: śiṃśapāmalakī jambūr yāś cānyāḥ kānane latāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4756: surāṃ surāpāḥ pibata pāyasaṃ ca bubhukṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4757: māṃsāni ca sumedhyāni bhakṣyantāṃ yāvad icchatha // Ram_2,85.49 //
GE09ram_02pu:4759: apy ekam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ pramadāḥ sapta cāṣṭa ca // Ram_2,85.50 //
GE09ram_02pu:4761: parimṛjya tathā nyāyaṃ pāyayanti varāṅganāḥ // Ram_2,85.51 //
GE09ram_02pu:4762: hayān gajān kharān uṣṭrāṃs tathaiva surabheḥ sutān /
GE09ram_02pu:4763: ikṣūṃś ca madhujālāṃś ca bhojayanti sma vāhanān /
GE09ram_02pu:4766: mattapramattamuditā camūḥ sā tatra saṃbabhau // Ram_2,85.53 //
GE09ram_02pu:4770: kuśalaṃ bharatasyāstu rāmasyāstu tathā sukham // Ram_2,85.55 //
GE09ram_02pu:4772: anāthās taṃ vidhiṃ labdhvā vācam etām udairayan // Ram_2,85.56 //
GE09ram_02pu:4773: samprahṛṣṭā vinedus te narās tatra sahasraśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4775: tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣāṃ tad annam amṛtopamam /
GE09ram_02pu:4776: divyān udvīkṣya bhakṣyāṃs tān abhavad bhakṣaṇe matiḥ // Ram_2,85.58 //
GE09ram_02pu:4777: preṣyāś ceṭyaś ca vadhvaś ca balasthāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4778: babhūvus te bhṛśaṃ tṛptāḥ sarve cāhatavāsasaḥ // Ram_2,85.59 //
GE09ram_02pu:4779: kuñjarāś ca kharoṣṭraś ca go'śvāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4780: babhūvuḥ subhṛtās tatra nānyo hy anyam akalpayat // Ram_2,85.60 //
GE09ram_02pu:4782: rajasā dhvastakeśo vā naraḥ kaścid adṛśyata // Ram_2,85.61 //
GE09ram_02pu:4786: dadṛśur vismitās tatra narā lauhīḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,85.63 //
GE09ram_02pu:4788: tāś ca kāmadughā gāvo drumāś cāsan madhuścyutaḥ // Ram_2,85.64 //
GE09ram_02pu:4792: sthālyaḥ kumbhyaḥ karambhyaś ca dadhipūrṇāḥ susaṃskṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4794: hradāḥ pūrṇā rasālasya dadhnaḥ śvetasya cāpare /
GE09ram_02pu:4795: babhūvuḥ pāyasasyānte śarkarāyāś ca saṃcayāḥ // Ram_2,85.67 //
GE09ram_02pu:4796: kalkāṃś cūrṇakaṣāyāṃś ca snānāni vividhāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4797: dadṛśur bhājanasthāni tīrtheṣu saritāṃ narāḥ // Ram_2,85.68 //
GE09ram_02pu:4799: śuklāṃś candanakalkāṃś ca samudgeṣv avatiṣṭhataḥ // Ram_2,85.69 //
GE09ram_02pu:4800: darpaṇān parimṛṣṭāṃś ca vāsasāṃ cāpi saṃcayān /
GE09ram_02pu:4801: pādukopānahāṃ caiva yugmān yatra sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,85.70 //
GE09ram_02pu:4802: āñjanīḥ kaṅkatān kūrcāṃś chattrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4803: marmatrāṇāni citrāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca // Ram_2,85.71 //
GE09ram_02pu:4805: avagāhya sutīrthāṃś ca hradān sotpalapuṣkarān // Ram_2,85.72 //
GE09ram_02pu:4807: nirvāpārthaṃ paśūnāṃ te dadṛśus tatra sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,85.73 //
GE09ram_02pu:4808: vyasmayanta manuṣyās te svapnakalpaṃ tad adbhutam /
GE09ram_02pu:4809: dṛṣṭvātithyaṃ kṛtaṃ tādṛg bharatasya maharṣiṇā // Ram_2,85.74 //
GE09ram_02pu:4810: ity evaṃ ramamāṇānāṃ devānām iva nandane /
GE09ram_02pu:4811: bharadvājāśrame ramye sā rātrir vyatyavartata // Ram_2,85.75 //
GE09ram_02pu:4812: pratijagmuś ca tā nadyo gandharvāś ca yathāgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:4813: bharadvājam anujñāpya tāś ca sarvā varāṅganāḥ // Ram_2,85.76 //
GE09ram_02pu:4814: tathaiva mattā madirotkaṭā narās tathaiva divyāgurucandanokṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4815: tathaiva divyā vividhāḥ sraguttamāḥ pṛthakprakīrṇā manujaiḥ pramarditāḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:4816: tatas tāṃ rajanīm uṣya bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4817: kṛtātithyo bharadvājaṃ kāmād abhijagāma ha // Ram_2,86.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4818: tam ṛṣiḥ puruṣavyāghraṃ prekṣya prāñjalim āgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:4820: kaccid atra sukhā rātris tavāsmadviṣaye gatā /
GE09ram_02pu:4821: samagras te janaḥ kaccid ātithye śaṃsa me 'nagha // Ram_2,86.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4825: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmaiś ca sāmātyo balavat tvayā // Ram_2,86.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4827: api preṣyān upādāya sarve sma susukhoṣitāḥ // Ram_2,86.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4829: samīpaṃ prasthitaṃ bhrātur maitreṇekṣasva cakṣuṣā // Ram_2,86.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4831: ācakṣva katamo mārgaḥ kiyān iti ca śaṃsa me // Ram_2,86.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4836: uttaraṃ pārśvam āsādya tasya mandākinī nadī /
GE09ram_02pu:4838: anantaraṃ tat saritaś citrakūṭaś ca parvataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4839: tayoḥ parṇakuṭī tāta tatra tau vasato dhruvam // Ram_2,86.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:4842: vāhayasva mahābhāga tato drakṣyasi rāghavam // Ram_2,86.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4843: prayāṇam iti ca śrutvā rājarājasya yoṣitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4844: hitvā yānāni yānārhā brāhmaṇaṃ paryavārayan // Ram_2,86.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4845: vepamānā kṛśā dīnā saha devyā sumitrayā /
GE09ram_02pu:4846: kausalyā tatra jagrāha karābhyāṃ caraṇau muneḥ // Ram_2,86.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4848: kaikeyī tasya jagrāha caraṇau savyapatrapā // Ram_2,86.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4850: adūrād bharatasyaiva tasthau dīnamanās tadā // Ram_2,86.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4852: viśeṣaṃ jñātum icchāmi mātṝṇāṃ tava rāghava // Ram_2,86.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4853: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4854: uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyaṃ vacanakovidaḥ // Ram_2,86.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4856: pitur hi mahiṣīṃ devīṃ devatām iva paśyasi // Ram_2,86.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4858: kausalyā suṣuve rāmaṃ dhātāram aditir yathā // Ram_2,86.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4859: asyā vāmabhujaṃ śliṣṭā yaiṣā tiṣṭhati durmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4861: etasyās tau sutau devyāḥ kumārau devavarṇinau /
GE09ram_02pu:4863: yasyāḥ kṛte naravyāghrau jīvanāśam ito gatau /
GE09ram_02pu:4864: rājā putravihīnaś ca svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,86.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:4867: yatomūlaṃ hi paśyāmi vyasanaṃ mahad ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,86.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:4869: sa niśaśvāsa tāmrākṣo nāgaḥ kruddha ivāsakṛt // Ram_2,86.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:4870: bharadvājo maharṣis taṃ bruvantaṃ bharataṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:4871: pratyuvāca mahābuddhir idaṃ vacanam arthavat // Ram_2,86.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:4873: rāmapravrājanaṃ hy etat sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,86.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:4874: abhivādya tu saṃsiddhaḥ kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam /
GE09ram_02pu:4875: āmantrya bharataḥ sainyaṃ yujyatām ity acodayat // Ram_2,86.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:4877: adhyārohat prayāṇārthī bahūn bahuvidho janaḥ // Ram_2,86.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:4879: jīmūtā iva gharmānte saghoṣāḥ sampratasthire // Ram_2,86.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:4880: vividhāny api yānāni mahānti ca laghūni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4881: prayayuḥ sumahārhāṇi pādair eva padātayaḥ // Ram_2,86.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:4885: āsthāya prayayau śrīmān bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ // Ram_2,86.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:4888: vanāni tu vyatikramya juṣṭāni mṛgapakṣibhiḥ // Ram_2,86.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:4890: mahad vanaṃ tat pravigāhamānā rarāja senā bharatasya tatra // Ram_2,86.36
GE09ram_02pu:4892: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthāḥ sampradudruvuḥ // Ram_2,87.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4893: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca ruravaś ca samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4894: dṛśyante vanarājīṣu giriṣv api nadīṣu ca // Ram_2,87.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4896: vṛto mahatyā nādinyā senayā caturaṅgayā // Ram_2,87.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4898: mahīṃ saṃchādayāmāsa prāvṛṣi dyām ivāmbudaḥ // Ram_2,87.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4900: anālakṣyā ciraṃ kālaṃ tasmin kāle babhūva bhūḥ // Ram_2,87.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:4902: uvāca bharataḥ śrīmān vasiṣṭhaṃ mantriṇāṃ varam // Ram_2,87.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:4903: yādṛśaṃ lakṣyate rūpaṃ yathā caiva śrutaṃ mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:4904: vyaktaṃ prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt // Ram_2,87.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4905: ayaṃ giriś citrakūṭas tathā mandākinī nadī /
GE09ram_02pu:4906: etat prakāśate dūrān nīlameghanibhaṃ vanam // Ram_2,87.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:4910: nīlā ivātapāpāye toyaṃ toyadharā ghanāḥ // Ram_2,87.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4912: hayaiḥ samantād ākīrṇaṃ makarair iva sāgaram // Ram_2,87.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4916: meghaprakāśaiḥ phalakair dākṣiṇātyā yathā narāḥ // Ram_2,87.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4918: ayodhyeva janākīrṇā samprati pratibhāti mā // Ram_2,87.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4919: khurair udīrito reṇur divaṃ pracchādya tiṣṭhati /
GE09ram_02pu:4920: taṃ vahaty anilaḥ śīghraṃ kurvann iva mama priyam // Ram_2,87.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4922: etān saṃpatataḥ śīghraṃ paśya śatrughna kānane // Ram_2,87.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4924: etam āviśataḥ śailam adhivāsaṃ patatriṇām // Ram_2,87.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4925: atimātram ayaṃ deśo manojñaḥ pratibhāti mā /
GE09ram_02pu:4926: tāpasānāṃ nivāso 'yaṃ vyaktaṃ svargapatho yathā // Ram_2,87.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:4927: mṛgā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bahavaḥ pṛṣatā vane /
GE09ram_02pu:4928: manojñarūpā lakṣyante kusumair iva citritāḥ // Ram_2,87.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4929: sādhu sainyāḥ pratiṣṭhantāṃ vicinvantu ca kānanam /
GE09ram_02pu:4930: yathā tau puruṣavyāghrau dṛśyete rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_2,87.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:4932: viviśus tad vanaṃ śūrā dhūmaṃ ca dadṛśus tataḥ // Ram_2,87.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4933: te samālokya dhūmāgram ūcur bharatam āgatāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4934: nāmanuṣye bhavaty agnir vyaktam atraiva rāghavau // Ram_2,87.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:4936: anye rāmopamāḥ santi vyaktam atra tapasvinaḥ // Ram_2,87.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:4937: tac chrutvā bharatas teṣāṃ vacanaṃ sādhusaṃmatam /
GE09ram_02pu:4938: sainyān uvāca sarvāṃs tān amitrabalamardanaḥ // Ram_2,87.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:4939: yattā bhavantas tiṣṭhantu neto gantavyam agrataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4940: aham eva gamiṣyāmi sumantro gurur eva ca // Ram_2,87.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:4941: evam uktās tataḥ sarve tatra tasthuḥ samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4942: bharato yatra dhūmāgraṃ tatra dṛṣṭiṃ samādadhāt // Ram_2,87.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:4943: vyavasthitā yā bharatena sā camūr nirīkṣamāṇāpi ca dhūmam agrataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4944: babhūva hṛṣṭā nacireṇa jānatī priyasya rāmasya samāgamaṃ tadā //
GE09ram_02pu:4946: vaidehyāḥ priyamākāṅkṣan svaṃ ca cittaṃ vilobhayan // Ram_2,88.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:4948: bhāryām amarasaṃkāśaḥ śacīm iva puraṃdaraḥ // Ram_2,88.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:4949: na rājyād bhraṃśanaṃ bhadre na suhṛdbhir vinābhavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:4950: mano me bādhate dṛṣṭvā ramaṇīyam imaṃ girim // Ram_2,88.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:4952: śikharaiḥ kham ivodviddhair dhātumadbhir vibhūṣitam // Ram_2,88.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:4958: aduṣṭair bhāty ayaṃ śailo bahupakṣisamākulaḥ // Ram_2,88.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:4964: evamādibhir ākīrṇaḥ śriyaṃ puṣyaty ayaṃ giriḥ // Ram_2,88.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:4966: kiṃnarān dvaṃdvaśo bhadre ramamāṇān manasvinaḥ // Ram_2,88.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:4967: śākhāvasaktān khaḍgāṃś ca pravarāṇy ambarāṇi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4969: jalaprapātair udbhedair nisyandaiś ca kvacit kvacit /
GE09ram_02pu:4970: sravadbhir bhāty ayaṃ śailaḥ sravan mada iva dvipaḥ // Ram_2,88.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:4972: ghrāṇatarpaṇam abhyetya kaṃ naraṃ na praharṣayet // Ram_2,88.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:4974: lakṣmaṇena ca vatsyāmi na māṃ śokaḥ pradhakṣyati // Ram_2,88.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:4976: vicitraśikhare hy asmin ratavān asmi bhāmini // Ram_2,88.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:4978: pituś cānṛṇatā dharme bharatasya priyaṃ tathā // Ram_2,88.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:4979: vaidehi ramase kaccic citrakūṭe mayā saha /
GE09ram_02pu:4981: idam evāmṛtaṃ prāhū rājñāṃ rājarṣayaḥ pare /
GE09ram_02pu:4982: vanavāsaṃ bhavārthāya pretya me prapitāmahāḥ // Ram_2,88.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:4986: oṣadhyaḥ svaprabhā lakṣmyā bhrājamānāḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,88.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:4988: kecid ekaśilā bhānti parvatasyāsya bhāmini // Ram_2,88.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:4990: citrakūṭasya kūṭo 'sau dṛśyate sarvataḥ śivaḥ // Ram_2,88.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:4994: kāmibhir vanite paśya phalāni vividhāni ca // Ram_2,88.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:4997: imaṃ tu kālaṃ vanite vijahrivāṃs tvayā ca sīte saha lakṣmaṇena ca /
GE09ram_02pu:4998: ratiṃ prapatsye kuladharmavardhinīṃ satāṃ pathi svair niyamaiḥ paraiḥ sthitaḥ // Ram_2,88.27
GE09ram_02pu:5000: adarśayac chubhajalāṃ ramyāṃ mandākinīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5004: kusumair upasaṃpannāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5006: rājantīṃ rājarājasya nalinīm iva sarvataḥ // Ram_2,89.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5008: tīrthāni ramaṇīyāni ratiṃ saṃjanayanti me // Ram_2,89.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5010: ṛṣayas tv avagāhante nadīṃ mandākinīṃ priye // Ram_2,89.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5014: pādapaiḥ pattrapuṣpāṇi sṛjadbhir abhito nadīm // Ram_2,89.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5016: kaccit siddhajanākīrṇāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5018: poplūyamānān aparān paśya tvaṃ jalamadhyagān // Ram_2,89.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5020: adhirohanti kalyāṇi niṣkūjantaḥ śubhā giraḥ // Ram_2,89.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5022: adhikaṃ puravāsāc ca manye ca tava darśanāt // Ram_2,89.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5025: sakhīvac ca vigāhasva sīte mandākinīm imām /
GE09ram_02pu:5026: kamalāny avamajjantī puṣkarāṇi ca bhāmini // Ram_2,89.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5027: tvaṃ paurajanavad vyālān ayodhyām iva parvatam /
GE09ram_02pu:5028: manyasva vanite nityaṃ sarayūvad imāṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5030: tvaṃ cānukūlā vaidehi prītiṃ janayatho mama // Ram_2,89.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5032: nāyodhyāyai na rājyāya spṛhaye 'dya tvayā saha // Ram_2,89.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5033: imāṃ hi ramyāṃ gajayūthalolitāṃ nipītatoyāṃ gajasiṃhavānaraiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5034: supuṣpitaiḥ puṣpadharair alaṃkṛtāṃ na so 'sti yaḥ syān na gatakramaḥ sukhī // Ram_2,89.18
GE09ram_02pu:5035: itīva rāmo bahusaṃgataṃ vacaḥ priyāsahāyaḥ saritaṃ prati bruvan /
GE09ram_02pu:5036: cacāra ramyaṃ nayanāñjanaprabhaṃ sa citrakūṭaṃ raghuvaṃśavardhanaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:5038: sainyareṇuś ca śabdaś ca prādurāstāṃ nabhaḥspṛśau // Ram_2,90.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5039: etasminn antare trastāḥ śabdena mahatā tataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5040: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthā dudruvur diśaḥ // Ram_2,90.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5041: sa taṃ sainyasamudbhūtaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrava rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5042: tāṃś ca vipradrutān sarvān yūthapān anvavaikṣata // Ram_2,90.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5043: tāṃś ca vidravato dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca śrutvā sa niḥsvanam /
GE09ram_02pu:5044: uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_2,90.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5045: hanta lakṣmaṇa paśyeha sumitrā suprajās tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:5047: rājā vā rājamātro vā mṛgayām aṭate vane /
GE09ram_02pu:5048: anyad vā śvāpadaṃ kiṃcit saumitre jñātum arhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:5049: sarvam etad yathātattvam acirāj jñātum arhasi // Ram_2,90.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5050: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ sālam āruhya puṣpitam /
GE09ram_02pu:5051: prekṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ pūrvāṃ diśam avaikṣata // Ram_2,90.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5055: śaśaṃsa senāṃ rāmāya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,90.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5056: agniṃ saṃśamayatv āryaḥ sītā ca bhajatāṃ guhām /
GE09ram_02pu:5057: sajyaṃ kuruṣva cāpaṃ ca śarāṃś ca kavacaṃ tathā // Ram_2,90.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5058: taṃ rāmaḥ puruṣavyāghro lakṣmaṇaṃ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02pu:5059: aṅgāvekṣasva saumitre kasyaitāṃ manyase camūm // Ram_2,90.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5060: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:5061: didhakṣann iva tāṃ senāṃ ruṣitaḥ pāvako yathā // Ram_2,90.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5062: sampannaṃ rājyam icchaṃs tu vyaktaṃ prāpyābhiṣecanam /
GE09ram_02pu:5063: āvāṃ hantuṃ samabhyeti kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,90.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5064: eṣa vai sumahāñ śrīmān viṭapī saṃprakāśate /
GE09ram_02pu:5066: bhajanty ete yathākāmam aśvān āruhya śīghragān /
GE09ram_02pu:5067: ete bhrājanti saṃhṛṣṭā gajān āruhya sādinaḥ // Ram_2,90.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5069: api nau vaśam āgacchet kovidāradhvajo raṇe // Ram_2,90.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5070: api drakṣyāmi bharataṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat /
GE09ram_02pu:5071: tvayā rāghava samprāptaṃ sītayā ca mayā tathā // Ram_2,90.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5072: yannimittaṃ bhavān rājyāc cyuto rāghava śāśvatāt /
GE09ram_02pu:5073: samprāpto 'yam arir vīra bharato vadhya eva me // Ram_2,90.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:5074: bharatasya vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:5075: pūrvāpakāriṇāṃ tyāge na hy adharmo vidhīyate /
GE09ram_02pu:5076: etasmin nihate kṛtsnām anuśādhi vasuṃdharām // Ram_2,90.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:5077: adya putraṃ hataṃ saṃkhye kaikeyī rājyakāmukā /
GE09ram_02pu:5078: mayā paśyet suduḥkhārtā hastibhagnam iva drumam // Ram_2,90.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:5081: adyemaṃ saṃyataṃ krodham asatkāraṃ ca mānada /
GE09ram_02pu:5082: mokṣyāmi śatrusainyeṣu kakṣeṣv iva hutāśanam // Ram_2,90.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:5086: śvāpadāḥ parikarṣantu narāṃś ca nihatān mayā // Ram_2,90.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:5088: sasainyaṃ bharataṃ hatvā bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,90.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:5090: rāmas tu parisāntvyātha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,91.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5091: kim atra dhanuṣā kāryam asinā vā sacarmaṇā /
GE09ram_02pu:5092: maheṣvāse mahāprājñe bharate svayam āgate // Ram_2,91.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5093: prāptakālaṃ yad eṣo 'smān bharato draṣṭum icchati /
GE09ram_02pu:5094: asmāsu manasāpy eṣa nāhitaṃ kiṃcid ācaret // Ram_2,91.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5095: vipriyaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ te bharatena kadā na kim /
GE09ram_02pu:5096: īdṛśaṃ vā bhayaṃ te 'dya bharataṃ yo 'tra śaṅkase // Ram_2,91.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5097: na hi te niṣṭhuraṃ vācyo bharato nāpriyaṃ vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5098: ahaṃ hy apriyam uktaḥ syāṃ bharatasyāpriye kṛte // Ram_2,91.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5099: kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃcid āpadi /
GE09ram_02pu:5100: bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇam ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,91.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5101: yadi rājyasya hetos tvam imāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣase /
GE09ram_02pu:5102: vakṣyāmi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyam asmai pradīyatām // Ram_2,91.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5103: ucyamāno hi bharato mayā lakṣmaṇa tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5104: rājyam asmai prayaccheti bāḍham ity eva vakṣyati // Ram_2,91.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5105: tathokto dharmaśīlena bhrātrā tasya hite rataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5106: lakṣmaṇaḥ praviveśeva svāni gātrāṇi lajjayā // Ram_2,91.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5107: vrīḍitaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02pu:5108: eṣa manye mahābāhur ihāsmān draṣṭum āgataḥ // Ram_2,91.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5110: imāṃ vāpy eṣa vaidehīm atyantasukhasevinīm // Ram_2,91.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5114: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma vṛddhas tātasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,91.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5115: avatīrya tu sālāgrāt tasmāt sa samitiṃjayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5116: lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ // Ram_2,91.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5117: bharatenātha saṃdiṣṭā sammardo na bhaved iti /
GE09ram_02pu:5118: samantāt tasya śailasya senāvāsam akalpayat // Ram_2,91.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5121: sā citrakūṭe bharatena senā dharmaṃ puraskṛtya vidhūya darpam /
GE09ram_02pu:5122: prasādanārthaṃ raghunandanasya virocate nītimatā praṇītā // Ram_2,91.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5123: niveśya senāṃ tu vibhuḥ padbhyāṃ pādavatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5124: abhigantuṃ sa kākutstham iyeṣa guruvartakam // Ram_2,92.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5126: bharato bhrātaraṃ vākyaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt // Ram_2,92.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5127: kṣipraṃ vanam idaṃ saumya narasaṃghaiḥ samantataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5128: lubdhaiś ca sahitair ebhis tvam anveṣitum arhasi // Ram_2,92.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5129: yāvan na rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ vā mahābalam /
GE09ram_02pu:5130: vaidehīṃ vā mahābhāgāṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5131: yāvan na candrasaṃkāśaṃ drakṣyāmi śubham ānanam /
GE09ram_02pu:5132: bhrātuḥ padmapalāśākṣaṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5134: śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5135: yāvan na rājye rājyārhaḥ pitṛpaitāmahe sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5136: abhiṣekajalaklinno na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5140: yasmin vasati kākutsthaḥ kubera iva nandane // Ram_2,92.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5142: yad adhyāste mahātejā rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // Ram_2,92.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5144: padbhyām eva mahātejāḥ praviveśa mahad vanam // Ram_2,92.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5146: puṣpitāgrāṇi madhyena jagāma vadatāṃ varaḥ // Ram_2,92.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5147: sa gireś citrakūṭasya sālam āsādya puṣpitam /
GE09ram_02pu:5149: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān mumoda sahabāndhavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5150: atra rāma iti jñātvā gataḥ pāram ivāmbhasaḥ // Ram_2,92.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5151: sa citrakūṭe tu girau niśāmya rāmāśramaṃ puṇyajanopapannam /
GE09ram_02pu:5152: guhena sārdhaṃ tvarito jagāma punar niveśyaiva camūṃ mahātmā //
GE09ram_02pu:5153: niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyām utsuko bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:5154: jagāma bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ śatrughnam anudarśayan // Ram_2,93.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5155: ṛṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ saṃdiśya mātṝn me śīghram ānaya /
GE09ram_02pu:5156: iti tvaritam agre sa jagāma guruvatsalaḥ // Ram_2,93.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5157: sumantras tv api śatrughnam adūrād anvapadyata /
GE09ram_02pu:5158: rāmadarśanajas tarṣo bharatasyeva tasya ca // Ram_2,93.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5160: bhrātuḥ parṇakuṭīṃ śrīmān uṭajaṃ ca dadarśa ha // Ram_2,93.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5161: śālāyās tv agratas tasyā dadarśa bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:5162: kāṣṭhāni cāvabhagnāni puṣpāṇy avacitāni ca // Ram_2,93.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5163: dadarśa ca vane tasmin mahataḥ saṃcayān kṛtān /
GE09ram_02pu:5164: mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca karīṣaiḥ śītakāraṇāt // Ram_2,93.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5165: gacchan eva mahābāhur dyutimān bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:5166: śatrughnaṃ cābravīd dhṛṣṭas tān amātyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,93.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5167: manye prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:5168: nātidūre hi manye 'haṃ nadīṃ mandākinīm itaḥ // Ram_2,93.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5169: uccair baddhāni cīrāṇi lakṣmaṇena bhaved ayam /
GE09ram_02pu:5170: abhijñānakṛtaḥ panthā vikāle gantum icchatā // Ram_2,93.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5173: yam evādhātum icchanti tāpasāḥ satataṃ vane /
GE09ram_02pu:5174: tasyāsau dṛśyate dhūmaḥ saṃkulaḥ kṛṣṇavartmanaḥ // Ram_2,93.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5176: āryaṃ drakṣyāmi saṃhṛṣṭo maharṣim iva rāghavam // Ram_2,93.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5177: atha gatvā muhūrtaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5178: mandākinīm anuprāptas taṃ janaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,93.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5180: janendro nirjanaṃ prāpya dhin me janma sajīvitam // Ram_2,93.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5182: sarvān kāmān parityajya vane vasati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,93.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5184: rāmasya nipatiṣyāmi sītāyāś ca punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,93.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5185: evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tasmin vane daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5186: dadarśa mahatīṃ puṇyāṃ parṇaśālāṃ manoramām // Ram_2,93.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5188: viśālāṃ mṛdubhis tīrṇāṃ kuśair vedim ivādhvare // Ram_2,93.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:5192: śobhitāṃ dīptavadanaiḥ sarpair bhogavatīm iva // Ram_2,93.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:5196: arisaṃghair anādhṛṣyāṃ mṛgaiḥ siṃhaguhām iva // Ram_2,93.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:5198: dadarśa bharatas tatra puṇyāṃ rāmaniveśane // Ram_2,93.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:5199: nirīkṣya sa muhūrtaṃ tu dadarśa bharato gurum /
GE09ram_02pu:5202: dadarśa rāmam āsīnam abhitaḥ pāvakopamam // Ram_2,93.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:5206: sthaṇḍile darbhasaṃstīrṇe sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_2,93.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:5210: aśaknuvan dhārayituṃ dhairyād vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,93.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:5211: yaḥ saṃsadi prakṛtibhir bhaved yukta upāsitum /
GE09ram_02pu:5212: vanyair mṛgair upāsīnaḥ so 'yam āste mamāgrajaḥ // Ram_2,93.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:5214: mṛgājine so 'yam iha pravaste dharmam ācaran // Ram_2,93.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:5215: adhārayad yo vividhāś citrāḥ sumanasas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:5216: so 'yaṃ jaṭābhāram imaṃ sahate rāghavaḥ katham // Ram_2,93.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:5217: yasya yajñair yathādiṣṭair yukto dharmasya saṃcayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5220: malena tasyāṅgam idaṃ katham āryasya sevyate // Ram_2,93.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:5221: mannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpto rāmaḥ sukhocitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5222: dhig jīvitaṃ nṛśaṃsasya mama lokavigarhitam // Ram_2,93.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:5224: pādāv aprāpya rāmasya papāta bharato rudan // Ram_2,93.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:5226: uktvāryeti sakṛd dīnaṃ punar novāca kiṃcana // Ram_2,93.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:5228: āryety evābhisaṃkruśya vyāhartuṃ nāśakat tataḥ // Ram_2,93.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:5229: śatrughnaś cāpi rāmasya vavande caraṇau rudan /
GE09ram_02pu:5230: tāv ubhau sa samāliṅgya rāmo 'py aśrūṇy avartayat // Ram_2,93.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:5231: tataḥ sumantreṇa guhena caiva samīyatū rājasutāv araṇye /
GE09ram_02pu:5232: divākaraś caiva niśākaraś ca yathāmbare śukrabṛhaspatibhyām // Ram_2,93.40
GE09ram_02pu:5233: tān pārthivān vāraṇayūthapābhān samāgatāṃs tatra mahaty araṇye /
GE09ram_02pu:5234: vanaukasas te 'pi samīkṣya sarve 'py aśrūṇy amuñcan pravihāya harṣam //
GE09ram_02pu:5235: āghrāya rāmas taṃ mūrdhni pariṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5236: aṅke bharatam āropya paryapṛcchat samāhitaḥ // Ram_2,94.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5237: kva nu te 'bhūt pitā tāta yad araṇyaṃ tvam āgataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5238: na hi tvaṃ jīvatas tasya vanam āgantum arhasi // Ram_2,94.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5239: cirasya bata paśyāmi dūrād bharatam āgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:5240: duṣpratīkam araṇye 'smin kiṃ tāta vanam āgataḥ // Ram_2,94.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5243: sa kaccid brāhmaṇo vidvān dharmanityo mahādyutiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5244: ikṣvākūṇām upādhyāyo yathāvat tāta pūjyate // Ram_2,94.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5245: tāta kaccic ca kausalyā sumitrā ca prajāvatī /
GE09ram_02pu:5246: sukhinī kaccid āryā ca devī nandati kaikayī // Ram_2,94.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5248: anasūyur anudraṣṭā satkṛtas te purohitaḥ // Ram_2,94.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5249: kaccid agniṣu te yukto vidhijño matimān ṛjuḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5250: hutaṃ ca hoṣyamāṇaṃ ca kāle vedayate sadā // Ram_2,94.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5252: sudhanvānam upādhyāyaṃ kaccit tvaṃ tāta manyase // Ram_2,94.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5254: kulīnāś ceṅgitajñāś ca kṛtās te tāta mantriṇaḥ // Ram_2,94.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5255: mantro vijayamūlaṃ hi rājñāṃ bhavati rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:5257: kaccin nidrāvaśaṃ naiṣi kaccit kāle vibudhyase /
GE09ram_02pu:5259: kaccin mantrayase naikaḥ kaccin na bahubhiḥ saha /
GE09ram_02pu:5260: kaccit te mantrito mantro rāṣṭraṃ na paridhāvati // Ram_2,94.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5262: kṣipram ārabhase kartuṃ na dīrghayasi rāghava // Ram_2,94.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5263: kaccit tu sukṛtāny eva kṛtarūpāṇi vā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5264: vidus te sarvakāryāṇi na kartavyāni pārthivāḥ // Ram_2,94.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5265: kaccin na tarkair yuktvā vā ye cāpy aparikīrtitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5266: tvayā vā tava vāmātyair budhyate tāta mantritam // Ram_2,94.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5267: kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekam icchasi paṇḍitam /
GE09ram_02pu:5268: paṇḍito hy arthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat // Ram_2,94.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5269: sahasrāṇy api mūrkhāṇāṃ yady upāste mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5270: atha vāpy ayutāny eva nāsti teṣu sahāyatā // Ram_2,94.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:5271: eko 'py amātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5272: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam // Ram_2,94.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:5273: kaccin mukhyā mahatsv eva madhyameṣu ca madhyamāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5274: jaghanyāś ca jaghanyeṣu bhṛtyāḥ karmasu yojitāḥ // Ram_2,94.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:5276: śreṣṭhāñ śreṣṭheṣu kaccit tvaṃ niyojayasi karmasu // Ram_2,94.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:5277: kaccit tvāṃ nāvajānanti yājakāḥ patitaṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02pu:5280: śūram aiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate // Ram_2,94.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:5281: kaccid dhṛṣṭaś ca śūraś ca dhṛtimān matimāñ śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5282: kulīnaś cānuraktaś ca dakṣaḥ senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ // Ram_2,94.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:5283: balavantaś ca kaccit te mukhyā yuddhaviśāradāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5284: dṛṣṭāpadānā vikrāntās tvayā satkṛtya mānitāḥ // Ram_2,94.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:5285: kaccid balasya bhaktaṃ ca vetanaṃ ca yathocitam /
GE09ram_02pu:5286: samprāptakālaṃ dātavyaṃ dadāsi na vilambase // Ram_2,94.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:5288: bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti so 'narthaḥ sumahān smṛtaḥ // Ram_2,94.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:5290: kaccit prāṇāṃs tavārtheṣu saṃtyajanti samāhitāḥ // Ram_2,94.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:5292: yathoktavādī dūtas te kṛto bharata paṇḍitaḥ // Ram_2,94.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:5293: kaccid aṣṭādaśāny eṣu svapakṣe daśa pañca ca /
GE09ram_02pu:5294: tribhis tribhir avijñātair vetsi tīrthāni cārakaiḥ // Ram_2,94.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:5295: kaccid vyapāstān ahitān pratiyātāṃś ca sarvadā /
GE09ram_02pu:5297: kaccin na lokāyatikān brāhmaṇāṃs tāta sevase /
GE09ram_02pu:5298: anarthakuśalā hy ete bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // Ram_2,94.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:5300: buddhimān vīkṣikīṃ prāpya nirarthaṃ pravadanti te // Ram_2,94.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:5301: vīrair adhyuṣitāṃ pūrvam asmākaṃ tāta pūrvakaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5304: jitendriyair mahotsāhair vṛtām āryaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,94.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:5306: kaccit samuditāṃ sphītām ayodhyāṃ parirakṣasi // Ram_2,94.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:5308: devasthānaiḥ prapābhiś ca taḍāgaiś copaśobhitaḥ // Ram_2,94.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:5312: kaccij janapadaḥ sphītaḥ sukhaṃ vasati rāghava // Ram_2,94.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:5314: vārttāyāṃ saṃśritas tāta loko hi sukham edhate // Ram_2,94.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:5315: teṣāṃ guptiparīhāraiḥ kaccit te bharaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:5316: rakṣyā hi rājñā dharmeṇa sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ // Ram_2,94.41 //
GE09ram_02pu:5317: kaccit striyaḥ sāntvayasi kaccit tāś ca surakṣitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5318: kaccin na śraddadhāsyāsāṃ kaccid guhyaṃ na bhāṣase // Ram_2,94.42 //
GE09ram_02pu:5319: kaccin nāgavanaṃ guptaṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca tṛpyasi /
GE09ram_02pu:5323: yantraiś ca paripūrṇāni tathā śilpidhanurdharaiḥ // Ram_2,94.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:5324: āyas te vipulaḥ kaccit kaccid alpataro vyayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5325: apātreṣu na te kaccit kośo gacchati rāghava // Ram_2,94.45 //
GE09ram_02pu:5327: yodheṣu mitravargeṣu kaccid gacchati te vyayaḥ // Ram_2,94.46 //
GE09ram_02pu:5329: apṛṣṭaḥ śāstrakuśalair na lobhād badhyate śuciḥ // Ram_2,94.47 //
GE09ram_02pu:5330: gṛhītaś caiva pṛṣṭaś ca kāle dṛṣṭaḥ sakāraṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5331: kaccin na mucyate coro dhanalobhān nararṣabha // Ram_2,94.48 //
GE09ram_02pu:5332: vyasane kaccid āḍhyasya durgatasya ca rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:5333: arthaṃ virāgāḥ paśyanti tavāmātyā bahuśrutāḥ // Ram_2,94.49 //
GE09ram_02pu:5335: tāni putrapaśūn ghnanti prītyartham anuśāsataḥ // Ram_2,94.50 //
GE09ram_02pu:5336: kaccid vṛddhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vaidyamukhyāṃś ca rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:5337: dānena manasā vācā tribhir etair bubhūṣase // Ram_2,94.51 //
GE09ram_02pu:5338: kaccid gurūṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca tāpasān devatātithīn /
GE09ram_02pu:5339: caityāṃś ca sarvān siddhārthān brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyasi // Ram_2,94.52 //
GE09ram_02pu:5340: kaccid arthena vā dharmaṃ dharmaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5341: ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase // Ram_2,94.53 //
GE09ram_02pu:5342: kaccid arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jayatāṃ vara /
GE09ram_02pu:5343: vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase // Ram_2,94.54 //
GE09ram_02pu:5351: kaccit tvaṃ varjayasy etān rājadoṣāṃś caturdaśa // Ram_2,94.58 //
GE09ram_02pu:5352: kaccit svādukṛtaṃ bhojyam eko nāśnāsi rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:5354: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02pu:5355: kiṃ me dharmād vihīnasya rājadharmaḥ kariṣyati // Ram_2,95.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5357: jyeṣṭhaputre sthite rājan na kanīyān bhaven nṛpaḥ // Ram_2,95.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5358: sa samṛddhāṃ mayā sārdham ayodhyāṃ gaccha rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:5359: abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ kulasyāsya bhavāya naḥ // Ram_2,95.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5360: rājānaṃ mānuṣaṃ prāhur devatve saṃmato mama /
GE09ram_02pu:5361: yasya dharmārthasahitaṃ vṛttam āhur amānuṣam // Ram_2,95.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5362: kekayasthe ca mayi tu tvayi cāraṇyam āśrite /
GE09ram_02pu:5363: divam ārya gato rājā yāyajūkaḥ satāṃ mataḥ // Ram_2,95.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5365: ahaṃ cāyaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtodakau // Ram_2,95.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5366: priyeṇa kila dattaṃ hi pitṛlokeṣu rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:5367: akṣayyaṃ bhavatīty āhur bhavāṃś caiva pituḥ priyaḥ // Ram_2,95.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5368: tāṃ śrutvā karuṇāṃ vācaṃ pitur maraṇasaṃhitām /
GE09ram_02pu:5371: pragṛhya bāhū rāmo vai puṣpitāgro yathā drumaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5372: vane paraśunā kṛttas tathā bhuvi papāta ha // Ram_2,95.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5373: tathā hi patitaṃ rāmaṃ jagatyāṃ jagatīpatim /
GE09ram_02pu:5376: rudantaḥ saha vaidehyā siṣicuḥ salilena vai // Ram_2,95.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5377: sa tu saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā netrābhyām āsram utsṛjan /
GE09ram_02pu:5379: kiṃ nu tasya mayā kāryaṃ durjātena mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5380: yo mṛto mama śokena na mayā cāpi saṃskṛtaḥ // Ram_2,95.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5381: aho bharata siddhārtho yena rājā tvayānagha /
GE09ram_02pu:5382: śatrugheṇa ca sarveṣu pretakṛtyeṣu satkṛtaḥ // Ram_2,95.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5386: ko nu śāsiṣyati punas tāte lokāntaraṃ gate // Ram_2,95.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5387: purā prekṣya suvṛttaṃ māṃ pitā yāny āha sāntvayan /
GE09ram_02pu:5388: vākyāni tāni śroṣyāmi kutaḥ karṇasukhāny aham // Ram_2,95.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5389: evam uktvā sa bharataṃ bhāryām abhyetya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5391: sīte mṛtas te śvaśuraḥ pitrā hīno 'si lakṣmaṇa /
GE09ram_02pu:5392: bharato duḥkham ācaṣṭe svargataṃ pṛthivīpatim // Ram_2,95.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:5393: sāntvayitvā tu tāṃ rāmo rudantīṃ janakātmajām /
GE09ram_02pu:5394: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ tatra duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,95.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:5397: sītā purastād vrajatu tvam enām abhito vraja /
GE09ram_02pu:5398: ahaṃ paścād gamiṣyāmi gatir hy eṣā sudāruṇā // Ram_2,95.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:5400: mṛdur dāntaś ca śāntaś ca rāme ca dṛḍhabhaktimān // Ram_2,95.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:5401: sumantras tair nṛpasutaiḥ sārdham āśvāsya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:5402: avātārayad ālambya nadīṃ mandākinīṃ śivām // Ram_2,95.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:5403: te sutīrthāṃ tataḥ kṛcchrād upāgamya yaśasvinaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5404: nadīṃ mandākinīṃ ramyāṃ sadā puṣpitakānanām // Ram_2,95.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:5406: siṣicus tūdakaṃ rājñe tata etad bhavatv iti // Ram_2,95.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:5408: diśaṃ yāmyām abhimukho rudan vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,95.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:5409: etat te rājaśārdūla vimalaṃ toyam akṣayam /
GE09ram_02pu:5412: pituś cakāra tejasvī nivāpaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // Ram_2,95.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:5414: nyasya rāmaḥ suduḥkhārto rudan vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,95.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:5415: idaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārāja prīto yadaśanā vayam /
GE09ram_02pu:5416: yadannaḥ puruṣo bhavati tadannās tasya devatāḥ // Ram_2,95.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:5421: teṣāṃ tu rudatāṃ śabdāt pratiśrutkābhavad girau /
GE09ram_02pu:5422: bhrātṝṇāṃ saha vaidehyā siṃhānāṃ nardatām iva // Ram_2,95.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:5424: abruvaṃś cāpi rāmeṇa bharataḥ saṃgato dhruvam /
GE09ram_02pu:5425: teṣām eva mahāñ śabdaḥ śocatāṃ pitaraṃ mṛtam // Ram_2,95.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:5426: atha vāsān parityajya taṃ sarve 'bhimukhāḥ svanam /
GE09ram_02pu:5427: apy ekamanaso jagmur yathāsthānaṃ pradhāvitāḥ // Ram_2,95.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:5428: hayair anye gajair anye rathair anye svalaṃkṛtaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5429: sukumārās tathaivānye padbhir eva narā yayuḥ // Ram_2,95.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:5431: draṣṭukāmo janaḥ sarvo jagāma sahasāśramam // Ram_2,95.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:5432: bhrātṝṇāṃ tvaritās te tu draṣṭukāmāḥ samāgamam /
GE09ram_02pu:5435: mumoca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ dyaur ivābhrasamāgame // Ram_2,95.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:5437: āvāsayanto gandhena jagmur anyad vanaṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,95.41 //
GE09ram_02pu:5441: tathā puṃskokilāḥ krauñcā visaṃjñā bhejire diśaḥ // Ram_2,95.43 //
GE09ram_02pu:5442: tena śabdena vitrastair ākāśaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:5443: manuṣyair āvṛtā bhūmir ubhayaṃ prababhau tadā // Ram_2,95.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:5445: paryaṣvajata dharmajñaḥ pitṛvan mātṛvac ca saḥ // Ram_2,95.45 //
GE09ram_02pu:5446: sa tatra kāṃścit pariṣasvaje narān narāś ca kecit tu tam abhyavādayan /
GE09ram_02pu:5447: cakāra sarvān savayasyabāndhavān yathārham āsādya tadā nṛpātmajaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:5448: tataḥ sa teṣāṃ rudatāṃ mahātmanāṃ bhuvaṃ ca khaṃ cānuvinādayan svanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5449: guhā girīṇāṃ ca diśaś ca saṃtataṃ mṛdaṅgaghoṣapratimo viśuśruve //
GE09ram_02pu:5450: vasiṣṭhaḥ purataḥ kṛtvā dārān daśarathasya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:5452: rājapatnyaś ca gacchantyo mandaṃ mandākinīṃ prati /
GE09ram_02pu:5453: dadṛśus tatra tat tīrthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇasevitam // Ram_2,96.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5455: sumitrām abravīd dīnā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // Ram_2,96.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5457: vane prāk kevalaṃ tīrthaṃ ye te nirviṣayīkṛtāḥ // Ram_2,96.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5458: itaḥ sumitre putras te sadā jalam atandritaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5459: svayaṃ harati saumitrir mama putrasya kāraṇāt // Ram_2,96.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5462: taṃ bhūmau pitur ārtena nyastaṃ rāmeṇa vīkṣya sā /
GE09ram_02pu:5463: uvāca devī kausalyā sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ // Ram_2,96.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5465: rāghaveṇa pitur dattaṃ paśyataitad yathāvidhi // Ram_2,96.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5467: naitad aupayikaṃ manye bhuktabhogasya bhojanam // Ram_2,96.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5469: katham iṅgudīpiṇyākaṃ sa bhuṅkte vasudhādhipaḥ // Ram_2,96.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5470: ato duḥkhataraṃ loke na kiṃcit pratibhāti mā /
GE09ram_02pu:5471: yatra rāmaḥ pitur dadyād iṅgudīkṣodam ṛddhimān // Ram_2,96.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5473: kathaṃ duḥkhena hṛdayaṃ na sphoṭati sahasradhā // Ram_2,96.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5474: evam ārtāṃ sapatnyas tā jagmur āśvāsya tāṃ tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:5475: dadṛśuś cāśrame rāmaṃ svargāc cyutam ivāmaram // Ram_2,96.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5477: ārtā mumucur aśrūṇi sasvaraṃ śokakarśitāḥ // Ram_2,96.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5478: tāsāṃ rāmaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇāñ śubhān /
GE09ram_02pu:5482: saumitrir api tāḥ sarvā mātṝn samprekṣya duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5484: yathā rāme tathā tasmin sarvā vavṛtire striyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5485: vṛttiṃ daśarathāj jāte lakṣmaṇe śubhalakṣaṇe // Ram_2,96.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:5487: śvaśrūṇām aśrupūrṇākṣī sā babhūvāgrataḥ sthitā // Ram_2,96.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:5488: tāṃ pariṣvajya duḥkhārtāṃ mātā duhitaraṃ yathā /
GE09ram_02pu:5489: vanavāsakṛśāṃ dīnāṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,96.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:5491: rāmapatnī kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ samprāptā nirjane vane // Ram_2,96.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:5493: kāñcanaṃ rajasā dhvastaṃ kliṣṭaṃ candram ivāmbudaiḥ // Ram_2,96.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:5494: mukhaṃ te prekṣya māṃ śoko dahaty agnir ivāśrayam /
GE09ram_02pu:5497: pādāv āsādya jagrāha vasiṣṭhasya sa rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,96.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:5498: purohitasyāgnisamasya tasya vai bṛhaspater indra ivāmarādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5499: pragṛhya pādau susamṛddhatejasaḥ sahaiva tenopaviveśa rāghavaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:5500: tato jaghanyaṃ sahitaiḥ sa mantribhiḥ purapradhānaiś ca sahaiva sainikaiḥ
GE09ram_02pu:5501: janena dharmajñatamena dharmavān upopaviṣṭo bharatas tadāgrajam //
GE09ram_02pu:5502: upopaviṣṭas tu tadā sa vīryavāṃs tapasviveṣeṇa samīkṣya rāghavam /
GE09ram_02pu:5503: śriyā jvalantaṃ bharataḥ kṛtāñjalir yathā mahendraḥ prayataḥ prajāpatim //
GE09ram_02pu:5504: kim eṣa vākyaṃ bharato 'dya rāghavaṃ praṇamya satkṛtya ca sādhu vakṣyati /
GE09ram_02pu:5505: itīva tasyāryajanasya tattvato babhūva kautūhalam uttamaṃ tadā //
GE09ram_02pu:5506: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiś ca lakṣmaṇo mahānubhāvo bharataś ca dhārmikaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5507: vṛtāḥ suhṛdbhiś ca virejur adhvare yathā sadasyaiḥ sahitās trayo 'gnayaḥ
GE09ram_02pu:5508: taṃ tu rāmaḥ samāśvāsya bhrātaraṃ guruvatsalam /
GE09ram_02pu:5509: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_2,97.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5510: kim etad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ pravyāhṛtaṃ tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:5511: yasmāt tvam āgato deśam imaṃ cīrajaṭājinī // Ram_2,97.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5513: hitvā rājyaṃ praviṣṭas tvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi // Ram_2,97.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5515: pragṛhya balavad bhūyaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,97.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5516: āryaṃ tātaḥ parityajya kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram /
GE09ram_02pu:5518: striyā niyuktaḥ kaikeyyā mama mātrā paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_02pu:5519: cakāra sumahat pāpam idam ātmayaśoharam // Ram_2,97.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5521: patiṣyati mahāghore niraye jananī mama // Ram_2,97.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5522: tasya me dāsabhūtasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:5523: abhiṣiñcasva cādyaiva rājyena maghavān iva // Ram_2,97.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5524: imāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā vidhavā mātaraś ca yāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5525: tvatsakāśam anuprāptāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_2,97.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5526: tadānupūrvyā yuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ cātmani mānada /
GE09ram_02pu:5527: rājyaṃ prāpnuhi dharmeṇa sakāmān suhṛdaḥ kuru // Ram_2,97.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5528: bhavatv avidhavā bhūmiḥ samagrā patinā tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:5529: śaśinā vimaleneva śāradī rajanī yathā // Ram_2,97.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5530: ebhiś ca sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ śirasā yācito mayā /
GE09ram_02pu:5531: bhrātuḥ śiṣyasya dāsasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_2,97.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5532: tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ pitryaṃ sarvaṃ sacivamaṇḍalam /
GE09ram_02pu:5535: rāmasya śirasā pādau jagrāha bharataḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,97.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5536: taṃ mattam iva mātaṃgaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5537: bhrātaraṃ bharataṃ rāmaḥ pariṣvajyedam abravīt // Ram_2,97.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5539: rājyahetoḥ kathaṃ pāpam ācaret tvadvidho janaḥ // Ram_2,97.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5540: na doṣaṃ tvayi paśyāmi sūkṣmam apy arisūdana /
GE09ram_02pu:5541: na cāpi jananīṃ bālyāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi // Ram_2,97.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5543: tāvad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jananyām api gauravam // Ram_2,97.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:5545: mātāpitṛbhyām ukto 'haṃ katham anyat samācare // Ram_2,97.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:5549: vyādiśya ca mahātejā divaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,97.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:5550: sa ca pramāṇaṃ dharmātmā rājā lokagurus tava /
GE09ram_02pu:5551: pitrā dattaṃ yathābhāgam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_2,97.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:5553: upabhokṣye tv ahaṃ dattaṃ bhāgaṃ pitrā mahātmanā // Ram_2,97.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:5554: yad abravīn māṃ naralokasatkṛtaḥ pitā mahātmā vibudhādhipopamaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5555: tad eva manye paramātmano hitaṃ na sarvalokeśvarabhāvam avyayam //
GE09ram_02pu:5557: śocatām eva rajanī duḥkhena vyatyavartata // Ram_2,98.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5559: mandākinyāṃ hutaṃ japyaṃ kṛtvā rāmam upāgaman // Ram_2,98.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5560: tūṣṇīṃ te samupāsīnā na kaścit kiṃcid abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:5561: bharatas tu suhṛnmadhye rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,98.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5562: sāntvitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama /
GE09ram_02pu:5563: tad dadāmi tavaivāhaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam // Ram_2,98.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5565: durāvāraṃ tvadanyena rājyakhaṇḍam idaṃ mahat // Ram_2,98.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5567: anugantuṃ na śaktir me gatiṃ tava mahīpate // Ram_2,98.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5568: sujīvaṃ nityaśas tasya yaḥ parair upajīvyate /
GE09ram_02pu:5569: rāma tena tu durjīvaṃ yaḥ parān upajīvati // Ram_2,98.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5570: yathā tu ropito vṛkṣaḥ puruṣeṇa vivardhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5572: sa yadā puṣpito bhūtvā phalāni na vidarśayet /
GE09ram_02pu:5573: sa tāṃ nānubhavet prītiṃ yasya hetoḥ prabhāvitaḥ // Ram_2,98.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5574: eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:5575: yadi tvam asmān ṛṣabho bhartā bhṛtyān na śādhi hi // Ram_2,98.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5576: śreṇayas tvāṃ mahārāja paśyantv agryāś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5577: pratapantam ivādityaṃ rājye sthitam ariṃdamam // Ram_2,98.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5580: tasya sādhv ity amanyanta nāgarā vividhā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5581: bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaṃ pratyanuyācataḥ // Ram_2,98.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5582: tam evaṃ duḥkhitaṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ yaśasvinam /
GE09ram_02pu:5583: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bharataṃ samāśvāsayad ātmavān // Ram_2,98.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5585: itaś cetarataś cainaṃ kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati // Ram_2,98.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5587: saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam // Ram_2,98.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5588: yathā phalānāṃ pakvānāṃ nānyatra patanād bhayam /
GE09ram_02pu:5589: evaṃ narasya jātasya nānyatra maraṇād bhayam // Ram_2,98.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5593: āyūṃṣi kṣapayanty āśu grīṣme jalam ivāṃśavaḥ // Ram_2,98.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:5594: ātmānam anuśoca tvaṃ kim anyam anuśocasi /
GE09ram_02pu:5595: āyus te hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca // Ram_2,98.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:5596: sahaiva mṛtyur vrajati saha mṛtyur niṣīdati /
GE09ram_02pu:5597: gatvā sudīrgham adhvānaṃ saha mṛtyur nivartate // Ram_2,98.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:5598: gātreṣu valayaḥ prāptāḥ śvetāś caiva śiroruhāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5599: jarayā puruṣo jīrṇaḥ kiṃ hi kṛtvā prabhāvayet // Ram_2,98.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:5600: nandanty udita āditye nandanty astam ite ravau /
GE09ram_02pu:5602: hṛṣyanty ṛtumukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ navam ihāgatam /
GE09ram_02pu:5604: yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahārṇave /
GE09ram_02pu:5605: sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ kālam āsādya kaṃcana // Ram_2,98.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:5606: evaṃ bhāryāś ca putrāś ca jñātayaś ca vasūni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:5607: sametya vyavadhāvanti dhruvo hy eṣāṃ vinābhavaḥ // Ram_2,98.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:5608: nātra kaścid yathā bhāvaṃ prāṇī samabhivartate /
GE09ram_02pu:5609: tena tasmin na sāmarthyaṃ pretasyāsty anuśocataḥ // Ram_2,98.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:5610: yathā hi sārthaṃ gacchantaṃ brūyāt kaścit pathi sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5611: aham apy āgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhato bhavatām iti // Ram_2,98.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:5612: evaṃ pūrvair gato mārgaḥ pitṛpaitāmaho dhruvaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5613: tam āpannaḥ kathaṃ śoced yasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ // Ram_2,98.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:5615: ātmā sukhe niyoktavyaḥ sukhabhājaḥ prajāḥ smṛtāḥ // Ram_2,98.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:5616: dharmātmā sa śubhaiḥ kṛtsnaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5617: dhūtapāpo gataḥ svargaṃ pitā naḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // Ram_2,98.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:5619: arthādānāc ca dhārmeṇa pitā nas tridivaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,98.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:5620: iṣṭvā bahuvidhair yajñair bhogāṃś cāvāpya puṣkalān /
GE09ram_02pu:5621: uttamaṃ cāyur āsādya svar gataḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // Ram_2,98.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:5622: sa jīrṇaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ parityajya pitā hi naḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5624: taṃ tu naivaṃvidhaḥ kaścit prājñaḥ śocitum arhati /
GE09ram_02pu:5625: tvadvidho yadvidhaś cāpi śrutavān buddhimattaraḥ // Ram_2,98.35 //
GE09ram_02pu:5627: varjanīyā hi dhīreṇa sarvāvasthāsu dhīmatā // Ram_2,98.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:5628: sa svastho bhava mā śoco yātvā cāvasa tāṃ purīm /
GE09ram_02pu:5629: tathā pitrā niyukto 'si vaśinā vadatāṃ vara // Ram_2,98.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:5631: tatraivāhaṃ kariṣyāmi pitur āryasya śāsanam // Ram_2,98.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:5632: na mayā śāsanaṃ tasya tyaktuṃ nyāyyam ariṃdama /
GE09ram_02pu:5633: tat tvayāpi sadā mānyaṃ sa vai bandhuḥ sa naḥ pitā // Ram_2,98.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:5634: evam uktvā tu virate rāme vacanam arthavat /
GE09ram_02pu:5635: uvāca bharataś citraṃ dhārmiko dhārmikaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,98.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:5636: ko hi syād īdṛśo loke yādṛśas tvam ariṃdama /
GE09ram_02pu:5637: na tvāṃ pravyathayed duḥkhaṃ prītir vā na praharṣayet // Ram_2,98.41 //
GE09ram_02pu:5638: saṃmataś cāsi vṛddhānāṃ tāṃś ca pṛcchasi saṃśayān /
GE09ram_02pu:5639: yathā mṛtas tathā jīvan yathāsati tathā sati // Ram_2,98.42 //
GE09ram_02pu:5640: yasyaiṣa buddhilābhaḥ syāt paritapyeta kena saḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5641: sa evaṃ vyasanaṃ prāpya na viṣīditum arhati // Ram_2,98.43 //
GE09ram_02pu:5643: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca buddhimāṃś cāsi rāghava // Ram_2,98.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:5644: na tvām evaṃ guṇair yuktaṃ prabhavābhavakovidam /
GE09ram_02pu:5646: proṣite mayi yat pāpaṃ mātrā matkāraṇāt kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:5647: kṣudrayā tad aniṣṭaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān mama // Ram_2,98.46 //
GE09ram_02pu:5649: hanmi tīvreṇa daṇḍena daṇḍārhāṃ pāpakāriṇīm // Ram_2,98.47 //
GE09ram_02pu:5651: jānan dharmam adharmiṣṭhaṃ kuryāṃ karma jugupsitam // Ram_2,98.48 //
GE09ram_02pu:5652: guruḥ kriyāvān vṛddhaś ca rājā pretaḥ piteti ca /
GE09ram_02pu:5653: tātaṃ na parigarheyaṃ daivataṃ ceti saṃsadi // Ram_2,98.49 //
GE09ram_02pu:5654: ko hi dharmārthayor hīnam īdṛśaṃ karma kilbiṣam /
GE09ram_02pu:5655: striyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ san kuryād dharmajña dharmavit // Ram_2,98.50 //
GE09ram_02pu:5657: rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā // Ram_2,98.51 //
GE09ram_02pu:5658: sādhvartham abhisaṃdhāya krodhān mohāc ca sāhasāt /
GE09ram_02pu:5659: tātasya yad atikrāntaṃ pratyāharatu tad bhavān // Ram_2,98.52 //
GE09ram_02pu:5660: pitur hi samatikrāntaṃ putro yaḥ sādhu manyate /
GE09ram_02pu:5661: tad apatyaṃ mataṃ loke viparītam ato 'nyathā // Ram_2,98.53 //
GE09ram_02pu:5662: tad apatyaṃ bhavān astu mā bhavān duṣkṛtaṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5663: abhipattā kṛtaṃ karma loke dhīravigarhitam // Ram_2,98.54 //
GE09ram_02pu:5664: kaikeyīṃ māṃ ca tātaṃ ca suhṛdo bāndhavāṃś ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5665: paurajānapadān sarvāṃs trātu sarvam idaṃ bhavān // Ram_2,98.55 //
GE09ram_02pu:5666: kva cāraṇyaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ kva jaṭāḥ kva ca pālanam /
GE09ram_02pu:5667: īdṛśaṃ vyāhataṃ karma na bhavān kartum arhati // Ram_2,98.56 //
GE09ram_02pu:5668: atha kleśajam eva tvaṃ dharmaṃ caritum icchasi /
GE09ram_02pu:5669: dharmeṇa caturo varṇān pālayan kleśam āpnuhi // Ram_2,98.57 //
GE09ram_02pu:5670: caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam /
GE09ram_02pu:5671: āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi // Ram_2,98.58 //
GE09ram_02pu:5672: śrutena bālaḥ sthānena janmanā bhavato hy aham /
GE09ram_02pu:5673: sa kathaṃ pālayiṣyāmi bhūmiṃ bhavati tiṣṭhati // Ram_2,98.59 //
GE09ram_02pu:5674: hīnabuddhiguṇo bālo hīnaḥ sthānena cāpy aham /
GE09ram_02pu:5675: bhavatā ca vinā bhūto na vartayitum utsahe // Ram_2,98.60 //
GE09ram_02pu:5676: idaṃ nikhilam avyagraṃ pitryaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam /
GE09ram_02pu:5677: anuśādhi svadharmeṇa dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ // Ram_2,98.61 //
GE09ram_02pu:5679: ṛtvijaḥ savasiṣṭhāś ca mantravan mantrakovidāḥ // Ram_2,98.62 //
GE09ram_02pu:5680: abhiṣiktas tvam asmābhir ayodhyāṃ pālane vraja /
GE09ram_02pu:5681: vijitya tarasā lokān marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ // Ram_2,98.63 //
GE09ram_02pu:5682: ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan /
GE09ram_02pu:5683: suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām // Ram_2,98.64 //
GE09ram_02pu:5685: adya bhītāḥ pālayantāṃ durhṛdas te diśo daśa // Ram_2,98.65 //
GE09ram_02pu:5686: ākrośaṃ mama mātuś ca pramṛjya puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02pu:5687: adya tatra bhavantaṃ ca pitaraṃ rakṣa kilbiṣāt // Ram_2,98.66 //
GE09ram_02pu:5689: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ // Ram_2,98.67 //
GE09ram_02pu:5690: atha vā pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vanam eva bhavān itaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5691: gamiṣyati gamiṣyāmi bhavatā sārdham apy aham // Ram_2,98.68 //
GE09ram_02pu:5692: tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyatā prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5693: na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān matiṃ pitus tadvacane pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:5694: tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5695: na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02pu:5696: tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca mātaraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5697: tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha //
GE09ram_02pu:5698: punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5700: upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvam evam abhāṣathāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5701: jātaḥ putro daśarathāt kaikeyyāṃ rājasattamāt // Ram_2,99.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5702: purā bhrātaḥ pitā naḥ sa mātaraṃ te samudvahan /
GE09ram_02pu:5704: devāsure ca saṃgrāme jananyai tava pārthivaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5705: samprahṛṣṭo dadau rājā varam ārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ // Ram_2,99.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5706: tataḥ sā saṃpratiśrāvya tava mātā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02pu:5707: ayācata naraśreṣṭhaṃ dvau varau varavarṇinī // Ram_2,99.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5708: tava rājyaṃ naravyāghra mama pravrājanaṃ tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:5709: tac ca rājā tathā tasyai niyuktaḥ pradadau varam // Ram_2,99.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5710: tena pitrāham apy atra niyuktaḥ puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02pu:5711: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi varadānikam // Ram_2,99.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5712: so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5713: śītayā cāpratidvandvaḥ satyavāde sthitaḥ pituḥ // Ram_2,99.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5714: bhavān api tathety eva pitaraṃ satyavādinam /
GE09ram_02pu:5715: kartum arhati rājendraṃ kṣipram evābhiṣecanāt // Ram_2,99.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5716: ṛṇān mocaya rājānaṃ matkṛte bharata prabhum /
GE09ram_02pu:5717: pitaraṃ trāhi dharmajña mātaraṃ cābhinandaya // Ram_2,99.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5718: śrūyate hi purā tāta śrutir gītā yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02pu:5719: gayena yajamānena gayeṣv eva pitṝn prati // Ram_2,99.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5720: puṃnāmnā narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5721: tasmāt putra iti proktaḥ pitṝn yat pāti vā sutaḥ // Ram_2,99.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5723: teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaścid gayāṃ vrajet // Ram_2,99.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5725: tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho // Ram_2,99.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5727: śatrughnasahito vīra saha sarvair dvijātibhiḥ // Ram_2,99.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5729: ābhyāṃ tu sahito rājan vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_2,99.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5730: tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ vanyānām aham api rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām /
GE09ram_02pu:5731: gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya samprahṛṣṭaḥ saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye // Ram_2,99.17
GE09ram_02pu:5732: chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ varṣatraṃ bharata karotu mūrdhni śītām /
GE09ram_02pu:5733: eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye //
GE09ram_02pu:5734: śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ saumitrir mama viditaḥ pradhānamitram
GE09ram_02pu:5735: catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ satyasthaṃ bharata carāma mā viṣādam
GE09ram_02pu:5737: uvāca rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmāpetam idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,100.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5738: sādhu rāghava mā bhūt te buddhir evaṃ nirarthakā /
GE09ram_02pu:5740: kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kim āpyaṃ kasya kenacit /
GE09ram_02pu:5741: yad eko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati // Ram_2,100.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5742: tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5743: unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kāciddhi kasyacit // Ram_2,100.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5744: yathā grāmāntaraṃ gacchan naraḥ kaścit kvacid vaset /
GE09ram_02pu:5745: utsṛjya ca tam āvāsaṃ pratiṣṭhetāpare 'hani // Ram_2,100.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5746: evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ pitā mātā gṛhaṃ vasu /
GE09ram_02pu:5747: āvāsamātraṃ kākutstha sajjante nātra sajjanāḥ // Ram_2,100.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5748: pitryaṃ rājyaṃ samutsṛjya sa nārhati narottama /
GE09ram_02pu:5749: āsthātuṃ kāpathaṃ duḥkhaṃ viṣamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam // Ram_2,100.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5751: ekaveṇīdharā hi tvāṃ nagarī sampratīkṣate // Ram_2,100.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5753: vihara tvam ayodhyāyāṃ yathā śakras triviṣṭape // Ram_2,100.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5754: na te kaścid daśaratas tvaṃ ca tasya na kaścana /
GE09ram_02pu:5755: anyo rājā tvam anyaś ca tasmāt kuru yad ucyate // Ram_2,100.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5756: gataḥ sa nṛpatis tatra gantavyaṃ yatra tena vai /
GE09ram_02pu:5757: pravṛttir eṣā martyānāṃ tvaṃ tu mithyā vihanyase // Ram_2,100.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5758: arthadharmaparā ye ye tāṃs tāñ śocāmi netarān /
GE09ram_02pu:5759: te hi duḥkham iha prāpya vināśaṃ pretya bhejire // Ram_2,100.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5761: annasyopadravaṃ paśya mṛto hi kim aśiṣyati // Ram_2,100.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5762: yadi bhuktam ihānyena deham anyasya gacchati /
GE09ram_02pu:5763: dadyāt pravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na tat pathy aśanaṃ bhavet // Ram_2,100.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5764: dānasaṃvananā hy ete granthā medhāvibhiḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5765: yajasva dehi dīkṣasva tapas tapyasva saṃtyaja // Ram_2,100.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5766: sa nāsti param ity eva kuru buddhiṃ mahāmate /
GE09ram_02pu:5767: pratyakṣaṃ yat tad ātiṣṭha parokṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuru // Ram_2,100.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5769: rājyaṃ tvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bharatena prasāditaḥ // Ram_2,100.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5770: jābāles tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyātmanāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5771: uvāca parayā yuktyā svabuddhyā cāvipannayā // Ram_2,101.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5772: bhavān me priyakāmārthaṃ vacanaṃ yad ihoktavān /
GE09ram_02pu:5775: mānaṃ na labhate satsu bhinnacāritradarśanaḥ // Ram_2,101.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5777: cāritram eva vyākhyāti śuciṃ vā yadi vāśucim // Ram_2,101.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5778: anāryas tv āryasaṃkāśaḥ śaucāddhīnas tathā śuciḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5779: lakṣaṇyavad alakṣaṇyo duḥśīlaḥ śīlavān iva // Ram_2,101.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5783: bahu maṃsyati māṃ loke durvṛttaṃ lokadūṣaṇam // Ram_2,101.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5784: kasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ kena vā svargam āpnuyām /
GE09ram_02pu:5786: kāmavṛttas tv ayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate /
GE09ram_02pu:5787: yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ // Ram_2,101.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5789: tasmāt satyātmakaṃ rājyaṃ satye lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // Ram_2,101.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5790: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca satyam eva hi menire /
GE09ram_02pu:5791: satyavādī hi loke 'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam // Ram_2,101.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5793: dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate // Ram_2,101.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5794: satyam eveśvaro loke satyaṃ padmā samāśritā /
GE09ram_02pu:5795: satyamūlāni sarvāṇi satyān nāsti paraṃ padam // Ram_2,101.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5796: dattam iṣṭaṃ hutaṃ caiva taptāni ca tapāṃsi ca /
GE09ram_02pu:5797: vedāḥ satyapratiṣṭhānās tasmāt satyaparo bhavet // Ram_2,101.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5798: ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam /
GE09ram_02pu:5799: majjaty eko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate // Ram_2,101.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5800: so 'haṃ pitur nideśaṃ tu kimarthaṃ nānupālaye /
GE09ram_02pu:5802: naiva lobhān na mohād vā na cājñānāt tamo'nvitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5803: setuṃ satyasya bhetsyāmi guroḥ satyapratiśravaḥ // Ram_2,101.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5805: naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam // Ram_2,101.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:5806: pratyagātmam imaṃ dharmaṃ satyaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ svayam /
GE09ram_02pu:5808: kṣātraṃ dharmam ahaṃ tyakṣye hy adharmaṃ dharmasaṃhitam /
GE09ram_02pu:5809: kṣudrair nṛśaṃsair lubdhaiś ca sevitaṃ pāpakarmabhiḥ // Ram_2,101.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:5810: kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā sampradhārya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:5811: anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam // Ram_2,101.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:5812: bhūmiḥ kīrtir yaśo lakṣmīḥ puruṣaṃ prārthayanti hi /
GE09ram_02pu:5813: svargasthaṃ cānubadhnanti satyam eva bhajeta tat // Ram_2,101.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:5814: śreṣṭhaṃ hy anāryam eva syād yad bhavān avadhārya mām /
GE09ram_02pu:5815: āha yuktikarair vākyair idaṃ bhadraṃ kuruṣva ha // Ram_2,101.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:5816: kathaṃ hy ahaṃ pratijñāya vanavāsam imaṃ guroḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5817: bharatasya kariṣyāmi vaco hitvā guror vacaḥ // Ram_2,101.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:5819: prahṛṣṭamānasā devī kaikeyī cābhavat tadā // Ram_2,101.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:5821: mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayan // Ram_2,101.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:5824: karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yac chubham /
GE09ram_02pu:5825: agnir vāyuś ca somaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ // Ram_2,101.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:5826: śataṃ kratūnām āhṛtya devarāṭ tridivaṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5827: tapāṃsy ugrāṇi cāsthāya divaṃ yātā maharṣayaḥ // Ram_2,101.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:5828: satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca bhūtānukampāṃ priyavāditāṃ ca /
GE09ram_02pu:5829: dvijātidevātithipūjanaṃ ca panthānam āhus tridivasya santaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:5830: dharme ratāḥ satpuruṣaiḥ sametās tejasvino dānaguṇapradhānāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5831: ahiṃsakā vītamalāś ca loke bhavanti pūjyā munayaḥ pradhānāḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:5832: kruddham ājñāya rāmaṃ tu vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02pu:5834: nivartayitukāmas tu tvām etad vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,102.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5836: sarvaṃ salilam evāsīt pṛthivī yatra nirmitā /
GE09ram_02pu:5837: tataḥ samabhavad brahmā svayambhūr daivataiḥ saha // Ram_2,102.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5838: sa varāhas tato bhūtvā projjahāra vasuṃdharām /
GE09ram_02pu:5839: asṛjac ca jagat sarvaṃ saha putraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ // Ram_2,102.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5841: tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,102.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5842: vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivasvataḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5843: sa tu prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,102.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5844: yasyeyaṃ prathamaṃ dattā samṛddhā manunā mahī /
GE09ram_02pu:5845: tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam // Ram_2,102.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5846: ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān kukṣir eveti viśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5847: kukṣer athātmajo vīro vikukṣir udapadyata // Ram_2,102.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5848: vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān /
GE09ram_02pu:5849: bāṇasya tu mahābāhur anaraṇyo mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,102.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5850: nānāvṛṣṭir babhūvāsmin na durbhikṣaṃ satāṃ vare /
GE09ram_02pu:5851: anaraṇye mahārāje taskaro vāpi kaścana // Ram_2,102.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5852: anaraṇyān mahābāhuḥ pṛthū rājā babhūva ha /
GE09ram_02pu:5854: sa satyavacanād vīraḥ saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,102.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5858: māndhātus tu mahātejāḥ susaṃdhir udapadyata // Ram_2,102.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5859: susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit /
GE09ram_02pu:5860: yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato ripusūdanaḥ // Ram_2,102.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5861: bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata /
GE09ram_02pu:5863: haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ // Ram_2,102.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5864: tāṃs tu sarvān prativyūhya yuddhe rājā pravāsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5865: sa ca śailavare ramye babhūvābhirato muniḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5866: dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ // Ram_2,102.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5868: tam ṛṣiṃ samupāgamya kālindī tv abhyavādayat // Ram_2,102.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5869: sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani /
GE09ram_02pu:5870: tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata // Ram_2,102.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5871: sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā /
GE09ram_02pu:5872: gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat // Ram_2,102.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:5873: sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat /
GE09ram_02pu:5874: iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ // Ram_2,102.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:5875: asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam /
GE09ram_02pu:5876: jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt // Ram_2,102.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:5879: bhagīrathāt kakutsthas tu kākutsthā yena tu smṛtāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5880: kakutsthasya tu putro 'bhūd raghur yena tu rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,102.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:5881: raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5882: kalmāṣapādaḥ saudāsa ity evaṃ prathito bhuvi // Ram_2,102.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:5884: yas tu tad vīryam āsādya sahaseno vyanīnaśat // Ram_2,102.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:5885: śaṅkhaṇasya tu putro 'bhūc chūraḥ śrīmān sudarśanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5887: śīghragasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ praśuśrukaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5890: nahuṣasya ca nābhāgaḥ putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ // Ram_2,102.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:5891: ajaś ca suvrataś caiva nābhāgasya sutāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02pu:5892: ajasya caiva dharmātmā rājā daśarathaḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,102.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:5893: tasya jyeṣṭho 'si dāyādo rāma ity abhiviśrutaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5894: tad gṛhāṇa svakaṃ rājyam avekṣasva jagan nṛpa // Ram_2,102.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:5895: ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ rājā bhavati pūrvajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5897: sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum arhasi /
GE09ram_02pu:5898: prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:5899: vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5900: abravīd dharmasaṃyuktaṃ punar evāparaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,103.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5902: ācāryaś caiva kākutstha pitā mātā ca rāghava // Ram_2,103.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5903: pitā hy enaṃ janayati puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha /
GE09ram_02pu:5904: prajñāṃ dadāti cācāryas tasmāt sa gurur ucyate // Ram_2,103.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5905: sa te 'haṃ pitur ācāryas tava caiva paraṃtapa /
GE09ram_02pu:5906: mama tvaṃ vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // Ram_2,103.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5907: imā hi te pariṣadaḥ śreṇayaś ca samāgatāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5908: eṣu tāta caran dharmaṃ nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // Ram_2,103.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5910: asyās tu vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // Ram_2,103.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5913: evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02pu:5915: yan mātāpitarau vṛttaṃ tanaye kurutaḥ sadā /
