GE09ram_02pu:5916: na supratikaraṃ tat tu mātrā pitrā ca yat kṛtam // Ram_2,103.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5918: nityaṃ ca priyavādena tathā saṃvardhanena ca // Ram_2,103.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5919: sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama /
GE09ram_02pu:5920: ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,103.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5921: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharataḥ pratyanantaram /
GE09ram_02pu:5923: iha me sthaṇḍile śīghraṃ kuśān āstara sārathe /
GE09ram_02pu:5924: āryaṃ pratyupavekṣyāmi yāvan me na prasīdati // Ram_2,103.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5926: śeṣye purastāc chālāyā yāvan na pratiyāsyati // Ram_2,103.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5927: sa tu rāmam avekṣantaṃ sumantraṃ prekṣya durmanāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5928: kuśottaram upasthāpya bhūmāv evāstarat svayam // Ram_2,103.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:5930: kiṃ māṃ bharata kurvāṇaṃ tāta pratyupavekṣyasi // Ram_2,103.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5931: brāhmaṇo hy ekapārśvena narān roddhum ihārhati /
GE09ram_02pu:5932: na tu mūrdhāvasiktānāṃ vidhiḥ pratyupaveśane // Ram_2,103.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5934: puravaryām itaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ yāhi rāghava // Ram_2,103.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:5935: āsīnas tv eva bharataḥ paurajānapadaṃ janam /
GE09ram_02pu:5936: uvāca sarvataḥ prekṣya kim āryaṃ nānuśāsatha // Ram_2,103.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:5937: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadā janāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5938: kākutstham abhijānīmaḥ samyag vadati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,103.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:5939: eṣo 'pi hi mahābhāgaḥ pitur vacasi tiṣṭhati /
GE09ram_02pu:5940: ata eva na śaktāḥ smo vyāvartayitum añjasā // Ram_2,103.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:5941: teṣām ājñāya vacanaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:5942: evaṃ nibodha vacanaṃ suhṛdāṃ dharmacakṣuṣām // Ram_2,103.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:5943: etac caivobhayaṃ śrutvā samyak saṃpaśya rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:5944: uttiṣṭha tvaṃ mahābāho māṃ ca spṛśa tathodakam // Ram_2,103.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:5945: athotthāya jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā bharato vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:5946: śṛṇvantu me pariṣado mantriṇaḥ śreṇayas tathā // Ram_2,103.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:5947: na yāce pitaraṃ rājyaṃ nānuśāsāmi mātaram /
GE09ram_02pu:5949: yadi tv avaśyaṃ vastavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca pitur vacaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5950: aham eva nivatsyāmi caturdaśa vane samāḥ // Ram_2,103.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:5951: dharmātmā tasya tathyena bhrātur vākyena vismitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5952: uvāca rāmaḥ samprekṣya paurajānapadaṃ janam // Ram_2,103.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:5953: vikrītam āhitaṃ krītaṃ yat pitrā jīvatā mama /
GE09ram_02pu:5954: na tal lopayituṃ śakyaṃ mayā vā bharatena vā // Ram_2,103.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:5955: upadhir na mayā kāryo vanavāse jugupsitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5956: yuktam uktaṃ ca kaikeyyā pitrā me sukṛtaṃ kṛtam // Ram_2,103.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:5958: sarvam evātra kalyāṇaṃ satyasaṃdhe mahātmani // Ram_2,103.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:5960: bhrātrā saha bhaviṣyāmi pṛthivyāḥ patir uttamaḥ // Ram_2,103.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:5961: vṛto rājā hi kaikeyyā mayā tadvacanaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:5962: anṛtān mocayānena pitaraṃ taṃ mahīpatim // Ram_2,103.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:5964: vismitāḥ saṃgamaṃ prekṣya samavetā maharṣayaḥ // Ram_2,104.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:5965: antarhitās tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5966: tau bhrātarau mahātmānau kākutsthau praśaśaṃsire // Ram_2,104.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:5967: sa dhanyo yasya putrau dvau dharmajñau dharmavikramau /
GE09ram_02pu:5968: śrutvā vayaṃ hi sambhāṣām ubhayoḥ spṛhayāmahe // Ram_2,104.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:5970: bharataṃ rājaśārdūlam ity ūcuḥ saṃgatā vacaḥ // Ram_2,104.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:5972: grāhyaṃ rāmasya vākyaṃ te pitaraṃ yady avekṣase // Ram_2,104.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:5973: sadānṛṇam imaṃ rāmaṃ vayam icchāmahe pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5974: anṛṇatvāc ca kaikeyyāḥ svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,104.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:5976: rājarṣayaś caiva tathā sarve svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ // Ram_2,104.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:5978: rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭavadanas tān ṛṣīn abhyapūjayat // Ram_2,104.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:5979: srastagātras tu bharataḥ sa vācā sajjamānayā /
GE09ram_02pu:5980: kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ punar abravīt // Ram_2,104.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:5982: kartum arhasi kākutstha mama mātuś ca yācanām // Ram_2,104.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:5983: rakṣituṃ sumahad rājyam aham ekas tu notsahe /
GE09ram_02pu:5984: paurajānapadāṃś cāpi raktān rañjayituṃ tathā // Ram_2,104.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:5985: jñātayaś ca hi yodhāś ca mitrāṇi suhṛdaś ca naḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5986: tvām eva pratikāṅkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ // Ram_2,104.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:5987: idaṃ rājyaṃ mahāprājña sthāpaya pratipadya hi /
GE09ram_02pu:5988: śaktimān asi kākutstha lokasya paripālane // Ram_2,104.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:5989: ity uktvā nyapatad bhrātuḥ pādayor bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:5990: bhṛśaṃ samprārthayāmāsa rāmam evaṃ priyaṃvadaḥ // Ram_2,104.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:5991: tam aṅke bhrātaraṃ kṛtvā rāmo vacanam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:5993: āgatā tvām iyaṃ buddhiḥ svajā vainayikī ca yā /
GE09ram_02pu:5994: bhṛśam utsahase tāta rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm api // Ram_2,104.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:5995: amātyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca buddhimadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:5996: sarvakāryāṇi saṃmantrya sumahānty api kāraya // Ram_2,104.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:5997: lakṣmīś candrād apeyād vā himavān vā himaṃ tyajet /
GE09ram_02pu:5998: atīyāt sāgaro velāṃ na pratijñām ahaṃ pituḥ // Ram_2,104.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:5999: kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:6000: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat // Ram_2,104.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:6004: ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ // Ram_2,104.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:6005: so 'dhiruhya naravyāghraḥ pāduke hy avaruhya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:6007: sa pāduke te bharataḥ pratāpavān svalaṃkṛte samparigṛhya dharmavit /
GE09ram_02pu:6008: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ cakāra caivottamanāgamūrdhani //
GE09ram_02pu:6009: athānupūrvyāt pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ gurūṃś ca mantriprakṛtīs tathānujau /
GE09ram_02pu:6010: vyasarjayad rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ sthitaḥ svadharme himavān ivācalaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:6011: taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭhyo duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6012: sa tv eva mātṝn abhivādya sarvā rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ //
GE09ram_02pu:6013: tataḥ śirasi kṛtvā tu pāduke bharatas tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:6014: āruroha rathaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // Ram_2,105.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:6015: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābāliś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6016: agrataḥ prayayuḥ sarve mantriṇo mantrapūjitāḥ // Ram_2,105.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:6017: mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā /
GE09ram_02pu:6018: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvāṇāś citrakūṭaṃ mahāgirim // Ram_2,105.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:6020: prayayau tasya pārśvena sasainyo bharatas tadā // Ram_2,105.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:6022: āśramaṃ yatra sa munir bharadvājaḥ kṛtālayaḥ // Ram_2,105.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:6023: sa tam āśramam āgamya bharadvājasya buddhimān /
GE09ram_02pu:6024: avatīrya rathāt pādau vavande kulanandanaḥ // Ram_2,105.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:6025: tato hṛṣṭo bharadvājo bharataṃ vākyam abravīt /
GE09ram_02pu:6026: api kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta rāmeṇa ca samāgatam // Ram_2,105.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:6027: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhīmatā /
GE09ram_02pu:6029: sa yācyamāno guruṇā mayā ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6030: rāghavaḥ paramaprīto vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,105.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:6031: pituḥ pratijñāṃ tām eva pālayiṣyāmi tattvataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6032: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi yā pratijñā pitur mama // Ram_2,105.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:6033: evam ukto mahāprājño vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GE09ram_02pu:6034: vākyajño vākyakuśalaṃ rāghavaṃ vacanaṃ mahat // Ram_2,105.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:6037: evam ukto vasiṣṭhena rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6038: pāduke hemavikṛte mama rājyāya te dadau // Ram_2,105.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:6040: ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe // Ram_2,105.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:6041: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6042: bharadvājaḥ śubhataraṃ munir vākyam udāharat // Ram_2,105.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:6044: yad āryaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhet tu nimne vṛṣṭim ivodakam // Ram_2,105.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:6045: amṛtaḥ sa mahābāhuḥ pitā daśarathas tava /
GE09ram_02pu:6046: yasya tvam īdṛśaḥ putro dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ // Ram_2,105.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:6047: tam ṛṣiṃ tu mahātmānam uktavākyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6048: āmantrayitum ārebhe caraṇāv upagṛhya ca // Ram_2,105.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:6049: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6050: bharatas tu yayau śrīmān ayodhyāṃ saha mantribhiḥ // Ram_2,105.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:6051: yānaiś ca śakaṭaiś caiva hayair nāgaiś ca sā camūḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6053: tatas te yamunāṃ divyāṃ nadīṃ tīrtvormimālinīm /
GE09ram_02pu:6054: dadṛśus tāṃ punaḥ sarve gaṅgāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm // Ram_2,105.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:6058: bharato duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sārathiṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,105.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:6059: sārathe paśya vidhvastā ayodhyā na prakāśate /
GE09ram_02pu:6062: ayodhyāṃ bharataḥ kṣipraṃ praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,106.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:6064: timirābhyāhatāṃ kālīm aprakāśāṃ niśām iva // Ram_2,106.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:6070: havirabhyukṣitāṃ paścāc chikhāṃ vipralayaṃ gatām // Ram_2,106.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:6072: hatapravīrām āpannāṃ camūm iva mahāhave // Ram_2,106.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:6075: tyaktāṃ yajñāyudhaiḥ sarvair abhirūpaiś ca yājakaiḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6076: sutyākāle vinirvṛtte vediṃ gataravām iva // Ram_2,106.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:6077: goṣṭhamadhye sthitām ārtām acarantīṃ navaṃ tṛṇam /
GE09ram_02pu:6078: govṛṣeṇa parityaktāṃ gavāṃ patnīm ivotsukām // Ram_2,106.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:6080: viyuktāṃ maṇibhir jātyair navāṃ muktāvalīm iva // Ram_2,106.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:6081: sahasā calitāṃ sthānān mahīṃ puṇyakṣayād gatām /
GE09ram_02pu:6082: saṃhṛtadyutivistārāṃ tārām iva divaś cyutām // Ram_2,106.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:6090: upayuktodakāṃ bhagnāṃ prapāṃ nipatitām iva // Ram_2,106.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:6092: bhūmau bāṇair viniṣkṛttāṃ patitāṃ jyām ivāyudhāt // Ram_2,106.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:6094: nikṣiptabhāṇḍām utsṛṣṭāṃ kiśorīm iva durbalām // Ram_2,106.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:6096: pracchannāṃ nīlajīmūtair bhāskarasya prabhām iva // Ram_2,106.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:6097: bharatas tu rathasthaḥ sañ śrīmān daśarathātmajaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6098: vāhayantaṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,106.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:6099: kiṃ nu khalv adya gambhīro mūrchito na niśamyate /
GE09ram_02pu:6102: dhūpitāgarugandhaś ca na pravāti samantataḥ // Ram_2,106.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:6105: nedānīṃ śrūyate puryām asyāṃ rāme vivāsite // Ram_2,106.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:6107: saṃpatadbhir ayodhyāyāṃ na vibhānti mahāpathāḥ // Ram_2,106.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:6108: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jalpan viveśa vasatiṃ pituḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6109: tena hīnāṃ narendreṇa siṃhahīnāṃ guhām iva // Ram_2,106.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:6110: tato nikṣipya mātṝn sa ayodhyāyāṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6111: bharataḥ śokasaṃtapto gurūn idam athābravīt // Ram_2,107.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:6113: tatra duḥkham idaṃ sarvaṃ sahiṣye rāghavaṃ vinā // Ram_2,107.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:6114: gataś ca hi divaṃ rājā vanasthaś ca gurur mama /
GE09ram_02pu:6115: rāmaṃ pratīkṣe rājyāya sa hi rājā mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,107.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:6116: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6117: abruvan mantriṇaḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaś ca purohitaḥ // Ram_2,107.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:6118: sadṛśaṃ ślāghanīyaṃ ca yad uktaṃ bharata tvayā /
GE09ram_02pu:6119: vacanaṃ bhrātṛvātsalyād anurūpaṃ tavaiva tat // Ram_2,107.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:6121: āryamārgaṃ prapannasya nānumanyeta kaḥ pumān // Ram_2,107.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:6123: abravīt sārathiṃ vākyaṃ ratho me yujyatām iti // Ram_2,107.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:6125: āruroha rathaṃ śrīmāñ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // Ram_2,107.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:6126: āruhya tu rathaṃ śīghraṃ śatrughnabharatāv ubhau /
GE09ram_02pu:6129: prayayuḥ prāṅmukhāḥ sarve nandigrāmo yato 'bhavat // Ram_2,107.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:6131: prayayau bharate yāte sarve ca puravāsinaḥ // Ram_2,107.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:6132: rathasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6133: nandigrāmaṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ śirasy ādhāya pāduke // Ram_2,107.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:6134: tatas tu bharataḥ kṣipraṃ nandigrāmaṃ praviśya saḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6135: avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gurūn idam uvāca ha // Ram_2,107.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:6136: etad rājyaṃ mama bhrātrā dattaṃ saṃnyāsavat svayam /
GE09ram_02pu:6138: tam imaṃ pālayiṣyāmi rāghavāgamanaṃ prati // Ram_2,107.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:6139: kṣipraṃ saṃyojayitvā tu rāghavasya punaḥ svayam /
GE09ram_02pu:6140: caraṇau tau tu rāmasya drakṣyāmi sahapādukau // Ram_2,107.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:6142: nivedya gurave rājyaṃ bhajiṣye guruvṛttitām // Ram_2,107.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:6144: rājyaṃ cedam ayodhyāṃ ca dhūtapāpo bhavāmi ca // Ram_2,107.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:6146: prītir mama yaśaś caiva bhaved rājyāc caturguṇam // Ram_2,107.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:6147: evaṃ tu vilapan dīno bharataḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6148: nandigrāme 'karod rājyaṃ duḥkhito mantribhiḥ saha // Ram_2,107.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:6150: nandigrāme 'vasad vīraḥ sasainyo bharatas tadā // Ram_2,107.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:6152: bhrātur vacanakārī ca pratijñāpāragas tadā // Ram_2,107.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:6154: bharataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ pādukābhyāṃ nyavedayat // Ram_2,107.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:6158: rāmam āśritya niratās tān alakṣayad utsukān // Ram_2,108.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:6159: nayanair bhṛkuṭībhiś ca rāmaṃ nirdiśya śaṅkitāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6160: anyonyam upajalpantaḥ śanaiś cakrur mithaḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,108.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:6161: teṣām autsukyam ālakṣya rāmas tv ātmani śaṅkitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6162: kṛtāñjalir uvācedam ṛṣiṃ kulapatiṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,108.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:6163: na kaccid bhagavan kiṃcit pūrvavṛttam idaṃ mayi /
GE09ram_02pu:6164: dṛśyate vikṛtaṃ yena vikriyante tapasvinaḥ // Ram_2,108.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:6165: pramādāc caritaṃ kaccit kiṃcin nāvarajasya me /
GE09ram_02pu:6168: pramadābhyucitāṃ vṛttiṃ sītā yuktaṃ na vartate // Ram_2,108.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:6169: atharṣir jarayā vṛddhas tapasā ca jarāṃ gataḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6172: calanaṃ tāta vaidehyās tapasviṣu viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,108.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:6173: tvannimittam idaṃ tāvat tāpasān prati vartate /
GE09ram_02pu:6174: rakṣobhyas tena saṃvignāḥ kathayanti mithaḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,108.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:6177: dhṛṣṭaś ca jitakāśī ca nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣādakaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6178: avaliptaś ca pāpaś ca tvāṃ ca tāta na mṛṣyate // Ram_2,108.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:6179: tvaṃ yadā prabhṛti hy asminn āśrame tāta vartase /
GE09ram_02pu:6180: tadā prabhṛti rakṣāṃsi viprakurvanti tāpasān // Ram_2,108.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:6181: darśayanti hi bībhatsaiḥ krūrair bhīṣaṇakair api /
GE09ram_02pu:6182: nānā rūpair virūpaiś ca rūpair asukhadarśanaiḥ // Ram_2,108.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:6184: pratighnanty aparān kṣipram anāryāḥ purataḥ sthitāḥ // Ram_2,108.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:6185: teṣu teṣv āśramasthāneṣv abuddham avalīya ca /
GE09ram_02pu:6188: kalaśāṃś ca pramṛdnanti havane samupasthite // Ram_2,108.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:6191: tat purā rāma śārīrām upahiṃsāṃ tapasviṣu /
GE09ram_02pu:6192: darśayanti hi duṣṭās te tyakṣyāma imam āśramam // Ram_2,108.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:6194: purāṇāśramam evāhaṃ śrayiṣye sagaṇaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,108.20 //
GE09ram_02pu:6195: kharas tvayy api cāyuktaṃ purā tāta pravartate /
GE09ram_02pu:6196: sahāsmābhir ito gaccha yadi buddhiḥ pravartate // Ram_2,108.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:6197: sakalatrasya saṃdeho nityaṃ yat tasya rāghava /
GE09ram_02pu:6198: samarthasyāpi hi sato vāso duḥkham ihādya te // Ram_2,108.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:6199: ity uktavantaṃ rāmas taṃ rājaputras tapasvinam /
GE09ram_02pu:6200: na śaśākottarair vākyair avaroddhuṃ samutsukam // Ram_2,108.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:6202: sa jagāmāśramaṃ tyaktvā kulaiḥ kulapatiḥ saha // Ram_2,108.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:6203: rāmaḥ saṃsādhya tv ṛṣigaṇam anugamanād deśāt tasmāccit kulapatim abhivādya rṣim /
GE09ram_02pu:6204: samyakprītais tair anumata upadiṣṭārthaḥ puṇyaṃ vāsāya svanilayam upasaṃpede // Ram_2,108.25
GE09ram_02pu:6205: āśramaṃ tv ṛṣivirahitaṃ prabhuḥ kṣaṇam api na jahau sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6206: rāghavaṃ hi satatam anugatās tāpasāś cārṣicaritadhṛtaguṇāḥ // Ram_2,108.26
GE09ram_02pu:6208: na tatrārocayad vāsaṃ kāraṇair bahubhis tadā // Ram_2,109.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:6209: iha me bharato dṛṣṭo mātaraś ca sanāgarāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6210: sā ca me smṛtir anveti tān nityam anuśocataḥ // Ram_2,109.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:6212: hayahastikarīṣaiś ca upamardaḥ kṛto bhṛśam // Ram_2,109.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:6213: tasmād anyatra gacchāma iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6214: prātiṣṭhata sa vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca saṃgataḥ // Ram_2,109.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:6215: so 'trer āśramam āsādya taṃ vavande mahāyaśāḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6216: taṃ cāpi bhagavān atriḥ putravat pratyapadyata // Ram_2,109.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:6217: svayam ātithyam ādiśya sarvam asya susatkṛtam /
GE09ram_02pu:6218: saumitriṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ sītāṃ ca samasāntvayat // Ram_2,109.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:6219: patnīṃ ca samanuprāptāṃ vṛddhām āmantrya satkṛtām /
GE09ram_02pu:6224: daśa varṣāṇy anāvṛṣṭyā dagdhe loke nirantaram // Ram_2,109.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:6225: yayā mūlaphale sṛṣṭe jāhnavī ca pravartitā /
GE09ram_02pu:6226: ugreṇa tapasā yuktā niyamaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtā // Ram_2,109.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:6228: anasūyāvratais tāta pratyūhāś ca nibarhitāḥ // Ram_2,109.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:6230: daśarātraṃ kṛtvā rātriḥ seyaṃ māteva te 'nagha // Ram_2,109.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:6232: abhigacchatu vaidehī vṛddhām akrodhanāṃ sadā // Ram_2,109.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:6233: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tathety uktvā sa rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6234: sītām uvāca dharmajñām idaṃ vacanam uttamam // Ram_2,109.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:6235: rājaputri śrutaṃ tv etan muner asya samīritam /
GE09ram_02pu:6236: śreyo'rtham ātmanaḥ śīghram abhigaccha tapasvinīm // Ram_2,109.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:6237: anasūyeti yā loke karmabhiḥ khyātim āgatā /
GE09ram_02pu:6238: tāṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvam abhigamyāṃ tapasvinīm // Ram_2,109.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:6239: sītā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavasya hitaiṣiṇī /
GE09ram_02pu:6240: tām atripatnīṃ dharmajñām abhicakrāma maithilī // Ram_2,109.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:6242: satataṃ vepamānāṅgīṃ pravāte kadalī yathā // Ram_2,109.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:6243: tāṃ tu sītā mahābhāgām anasūyāṃ pativratām /
GE09ram_02pu:6244: abhyavādayad avyagrā svaṃ nāma samudāharat // Ram_2,109.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:6245: abhivādya ca vaidehī tāpasīṃ tām aninditām /
GE09ram_02pu:6247: tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dharmacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02pu:6248: sāntvayanty abravīd dhṛṣṭā diṣṭyā dharmam avekṣase // Ram_2,109.21 //
GE09ram_02pu:6249: tyaktvā jñātijanaṃ sīte mānam ṛddhiṃ ca mānini /
GE09ram_02pu:6250: avaruddhaṃ vane rāmaṃ diṣṭyā tvam anugacchasi // Ram_2,109.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:6251: nagarastho vanastho vā pāpo vā yadi vāśubhaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6252: yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ // Ram_2,109.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:6253: duḥśīlaḥ kāmavṛtto vā dhanair vā parivarjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6254: strīṇām āryasvabhāvānāṃ paramaṃ daivataṃ patiḥ // Ram_2,109.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:6255: nāto viśiṣṭaṃ paśyāmi bāndhavaṃ vimṛśanty aham /
GE09ram_02pu:6256: sarvatra yogyaṃ vaidehi tapaḥ kṛtam ivāvyayam // Ram_2,109.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:6257: na tv evam avagacchanti guṇadoṣam asatstriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6259: prāpnuvanty ayaśaś caiva dharmabhraṃśaṃ ca maithili /
GE09ram_02pu:6260: akāryavaśam āpannāḥ striyo yāḥ khalu tadvidhāḥ // Ram_2,109.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:6262: striyaḥ svarge cariṣyanti yathā puṇyakṛtas tathā // Ram_2,109.28 //
GE09ram_02pu:6263: sā tv evam uktā vaidehī anasūyānasūyayā /
GE09ram_02pu:6264: pratipūjya vaco mandaṃ pravaktum upacakrame // Ram_2,110.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:6265: naitad āścaryam āryāyā yan māṃ tvam anubhāṣase /
GE09ram_02pu:6266: viditaṃ tu mamāpy etad yathā nāryāḥ patir guruḥ // Ram_2,110.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:6267: yady apy eṣa bhaved bhartā mamārye vṛttavarjitaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6268: advaidham upacartavyas tathāpy eṣa mayā bhavet // Ram_2,110.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:6269: kiṃ punar yo guṇaślāghyaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6271: yāṃ vṛttiṃ vartate rāmaḥ kausalyāyāṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6272: tām eva nṛpanārīṇām anyāsām api vartate // Ram_2,110.5 //
GE09ram_02pu:6273: sakṛd dṛṣṭāsv api strīṣu nṛpeṇa nṛpavatsalaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6274: mātṛvad vartate vīro mānam utsṛjya dharmavit // Ram_2,110.6 //
GE09ram_02pu:6275: āgacchantyāś ca vijanaṃ vanam evaṃ bhayāvaham /
GE09ram_02pu:6276: samāhitaṃ hi me śvaśrvā hṛdaye yat sthitaṃ mama // Ram_2,110.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:6277: pāṇipradānakāle ca yat purā tv agnisaṃnidhau /
GE09ram_02pu:6278: anuśiṣṭā jananyāsmi vākyaṃ tad api me dhṛtam // Ram_2,110.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:6279: navīkṛtaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ vākyais te dharmacāriṇi /
GE09ram_02pu:6280: patiśuśrūṣaṇān nāryās tapo nānyad vidhīyate // Ram_2,110.9 //
GE09ram_02pu:6282: tathā vṛttiś ca yātā tvaṃ patiśuśrūṣayā divam // Ram_2,110.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:6283: variṣṭhā sarvanārīṇām eṣā ca divi devatā /
GE09ram_02pu:6284: rohiṇī ca vinā candraṃ muhūrtam api dṛśyate // Ram_2,110.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:6286: devaloke mahīyante puṇyena svena karmaṇā // Ram_2,110.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:6288: śirasy āghrāya covāca maithilīṃ harṣayanty uta // Ram_2,110.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:6289: niyamair vividhair āptaṃ tapo hi mahad asti me /
GE09ram_02pu:6290: tat saṃśritya balaṃ sīte chandaye tvāṃ śucivrate // Ram_2,110.14 //
GE09ram_02pu:6291: upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca vacanaṃ tava maithili /
GE09ram_02pu:6292: prītā cāsmy ucitaṃ kiṃ te karavāṇi bravīhi me /
GE09ram_02pu:6293: kṛtam ity abravīt sītā tapobalasamanvitām // Ram_2,110.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:6294: sā tv evam uktā dharmajñā tayā prītatarābhavat /
GE09ram_02pu:6295: saphalaṃ ca praharṣaṃ te hanta sīte karomy aham // Ram_2,110.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:6296: idaṃ divyaṃ varaṃ mālyaṃ vastram ābharaṇāni ca /
GE09ram_02pu:6297: aṅgarāgaṃ ca vaidehi mahārham anulepanam // Ram_2,110.17 //
GE09ram_02pu:6298: mayā dattam idaṃ sīte tava gātrāṇi śobhayet /
GE09ram_02pu:6299: anurūpam asaṃkliṣṭaṃ nityam eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,110.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:6301: śobhayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ yathā śrīr viṣṇum avyayam // Ram_2,110.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:6302: sā vastram aṅgarāgaṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni srajas tathā /
GE09ram_02pu:6304: pratigṛhya ca tat sītā prītidānaṃ yaśasvinī /
GE09ram_02pu:6307: vacanaṃ praṣṭum ārebhe kathāṃ kāṃcid anupriyām // Ram_2,110.22 //
GE09ram_02pu:6308: svayaṃvare kila prāptā tvam anena yaśasvinā /
GE09ram_02pu:6309: rāghaveṇeti me sīte kathā śrutim upāgatā // Ram_2,110.23 //
GE09ram_02pu:6310: tāṃ kathāṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa ca maithili /
GE09ram_02pu:6311: yathānubhūtaṃ kārtsnyena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // Ram_2,110.24 //
GE09ram_02pu:6312: evam uktā tu sā sītā tāṃ tato dharmacāriṇīm /
GE09ram_02pu:6313: śrūyatām iti coktvā vai kathayāmāsa tāṃ kathām // Ram_2,110.25 //
GE09ram_02pu:6315: kṣatradharmaṇy abhirato nyāyataḥ śāsti medinīm // Ram_2,110.26 //
GE09ram_02pu:6317: ahaṃ kilotthitā bhittvā jagatīṃ nṛpateḥ sutā // Ram_2,110.27 //
GE09ram_02pu:6320: anapatyena ca snehād aṅkam āropya ca svayam /
GE09ram_02pu:6321: mameyaṃ tanayety uktvā sneho mayi nipātitaḥ // Ram_2,110.29 //
GE09ram_02pu:6322: antarikṣe ca vāg uktā pratimāmānuṣī kila /
GE09ram_02pu:6323: evam etan narapate dharmeṇa tanayā tava // Ram_2,110.30 //
GE09ram_02pu:6324: tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā pitā me mithilādhipaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6325: avāpto vipulām ṛddhiṃ mām avāpya narādhipaḥ // Ram_2,110.31 //
GE09ram_02pu:6327: tayā saṃbhāvitā cāsmi snigdhayā mātṛsauhṛdāt // Ram_2,110.32 //
GE09ram_02pu:6328: patisaṃyogasulabhaṃ vayo dṛṣṭvā tu me pitā /
GE09ram_02pu:6329: cintām abhyagamad dīno vittanāśād ivādhanaḥ // Ram_2,110.33 //
GE09ram_02pu:6330: sadṛśāc cāpakṛṣṭāc ca loke kanyāpitā janāt /
GE09ram_02pu:6331: pradharṣaṇām avāpnoti śakreṇāpi samo bhuvi // Ram_2,110.34 //
GE09ram_02pu:6334: ayonijāṃ hi māṃ jñātvā nādhyagacchat sa cintayan /
GE09ram_02pu:6335: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca mahīpālaḥ patiṃ mama // Ram_2,110.36 //
GE09ram_02pu:6336: tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā cintayānasya saṃtatam /
GE09ram_02pu:6337: svayaṃ varaṃ tanūjāyāḥ kariṣyāmīti dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,110.37 //
GE09ram_02pu:6339: dattaṃ dhanurvaraṃ prītyā tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau // Ram_2,110.38 //
GE09ram_02pu:6340: asaṃcālyaṃ manuṣyaiś ca yatnenāpi ca gauravāt /
GE09ram_02pu:6341: tan na śaktā namayituṃ svapneṣv api narādhipāḥ // Ram_2,110.39 //
GE09ram_02pu:6342: tad dhanuḥ prāpya me pitrā vyāhṛtaṃ satyavādinā /
GE09ram_02pu:6343: samavāye narendrāṇāṃ pūrvam āmantrya pārthivān // Ram_2,110.40 //
GE09ram_02pu:6344: idaṃ ca dhanur udyamya sajyaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6345: tasya me duhitā bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,110.41 //
GE09ram_02pu:6346: tac ca dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ gauravād girisaṃnibham /
GE09ram_02pu:6347: abhivādya nṛpā jagmur aśaktās tasya tolane // Ram_2,110.42 //
GE09ram_02pu:6349: viśvāmitreṇa sahito yajñaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ // Ram_2,110.43 //
GE09ram_02pu:6351: viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā mama pitrā supūjitaḥ // Ram_2,110.44 //
GE09ram_02pu:6354: ity uktas tena vipreṇa tad dhanuḥ samupānayat // Ram_2,110.45 //
GE09ram_02pu:6356: jyāṃ samāropya jhaṭiti pūrayāmāsa vīryavān // Ram_2,110.46 //
GE09ram_02pu:6357: tena pūrayatā vegān madhye bhagnaṃ dvidhā dhanuḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6358: tasya śabdo 'bhavad bhīmaḥ patitasyāśaner iva // Ram_2,110.47 //
GE09ram_02pu:6360: udyatā dātum udyamya jalabhājanam uttamam // Ram_2,110.48 //
GE09ram_02pu:6361: dīyamānāṃ na tu tadā pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6362: avijñāya pituś chandam ayodhyādhipateḥ prabhoḥ // Ram_2,110.49 //
GE09ram_02pu:6363: tataḥ śvaśuram āmantrya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam /
GE09ram_02pu:6364: mama pitrā ahaṃ dattā rāmāya viditātmane // Ram_2,110.50 //
GE09ram_02pu:6366: bhāryārthe lakṣmaṇasyāpi dattā pitrā mama svayam // Ram_2,110.51 //
GE09ram_02pu:6367: evaṃ dattāsmi rāmāya tadā tasmin svayaṃvare /
GE09ram_02pu:6368: anuraktā ca dharmeṇa patiṃ vīryavatāṃ varam // Ram_2,110.52 //
GE09ram_02pu:6369: anasūyā tu dharmajñā śrutvā tāṃ mahatīṃ kathām /
GE09ram_02pu:6370: paryaṣvajata bāhubhyāṃ śirasy āghrāya maithilīm // Ram_2,111.1 //
GE09ram_02pu:6372: yathā svayaṃvaraṃ vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ hi śrutaṃ mayā // Ram_2,111.2 //
GE09ram_02pu:6373: rame 'haṃ kathayā te tu dṛḍhaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇi /
GE09ram_02pu:6374: ravir astaṃ gataḥ śrīmān upohya rajanīṃ śivām // Ram_2,111.3 //
GE09ram_02pu:6376: saṃdhyākāle nilīnānāṃ nidrārthaṃ śrūyate dhvaniḥ // Ram_2,111.4 //
GE09ram_02pu:6382: viprakṛṣṭe 'pi ye deśe na prakāśanti vai diśaḥ // Ram_2,111.7 //
GE09ram_02pu:6384: tapovanamṛgā hy ete veditīrtheṣu śerate // Ram_2,111.8 //
GE09ram_02pu:6388: kathayantyā hi madhuraṃ tvayāhaṃ paritoṣitā // Ram_2,111.10 //
GE09ram_02pu:6389: alaṃkuru ca tāvat tvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mama maithili /
GE09ram_02pu:6390: prītiṃ janaya me vatsa divyālaṃkāraśobhinī // Ram_2,111.11 //
GE09ram_02pu:6392: praṇamya śirasā tasyai rāmaṃ tv abhimukhī yayau // Ram_2,111.12 //
GE09ram_02pu:6393: tathā tu bhūṣitāṃ sītāṃ dadarśa vadatāṃ varaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6394: rāghavaḥ prītidānena tapasvinyā jaharṣa ca // Ram_2,111.13 //
GE09ram_02pu:6395: nyavedayat tataḥ sarvaṃ sītā rāmāya maithilī /
GE09ram_02pu:6397: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavad rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6398: maithilyāḥ satkriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā mānuṣeṣu sudurlabhām // Ram_2,111.15 //
GE09ram_02pu:6399: tatas tāṃ śarvarīṃ prītaḥ puṇyāṃ śaśinibhānanaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6400: arcitas tāpasaiḥ siddhair uvāsa raghunandanaḥ // Ram_2,111.16 //
GE09ram_02pu:6403: tāv ūcus te vanacarās tāpasā dharmacāriṇaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6404: vanasya tasya saṃcāraṃ rākṣasaiḥ samabhiplutam // Ram_2,111.18 //
GE09ram_02pu:6405: eṣa panthā maharṣīṇāṃ phalāny āharatāṃ vane /
GE09ram_02pu:6406: anena tu vanaṃ durgaṃ gantuṃ rāghava te kṣamam // Ram_2,111.19 //
GE09ram_02pu:6407: itīva taiḥ prāñjalibhis tapasvibhir dvijaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ paraṃtapaḥ /
GE09ram_02pu:6408: vanaṃ sabhāryaḥ praviveśa rāghavaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ sūrya ivābhramaṇḍalam //
